Dr Abdullah Ali Al Shahrani 1970, dọkịta si Al Serhan
Al-Shamal Stadium (Arabic) bụ ámá egwuregwu bọọlụ a tụrụ aro ya na Ash-Shamel, Qatar
A tụụrụ ya aro dị ka akụkụ nke Qatar 2022 FIFA World Cup bid, ọ gaara enwe ikike nke 45,120
Mgbe asọmpi iko mba ụwa gasịrị, a ga-ebelata ámá egwuregwu ahụ ruo 25,000
E wurughị ámá egwuregwu ahụ, ebe ndị ọzọ ga-enwekwa egwuregwu na Qatar 2022
Ọ bụ Albert Speer & Partners mere atụmatụ ahụ, ma sitere na dhow ọdịnala, ụgbọ mmiri ịkụ azụ nke a na-ejikarị eme ihe na Arab States nke Persian Gulf
Àtụ 2022 FIFA World Cup stadiums
Al-Shamrani bụ aha nna Arabic nke a na-enye ndị so n'ebo Arabic a maara dị ka 意Shamraná nke dị n'akụkụ ndịda nke obodo Saudi Arabia nke oge a
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia

al-Shehri (Arabic الشهري, ash-Shehrī, nke a na-akpọkwa Alshehri, Shehri, ma ọ bụ Shihri) bụ aha ezinụlọ na Arabic nke na-egosi onye otu Bani Shehr, mgbe mkpụrụ edemede anyanwụ sochiri ya, l na al na-ejikọta na ụdaume mbụ nke aha na-esonụ, na-akpata ụdaume abụọ
Aha nna Al-Sheikh ma ọ bụ Al-Shaykh sitere Arabic
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Al-Shymaa Kway-Geer (amụrụ n'afọ 1960) bụ onye otu ndị ome iwu, National Assembly, nke Tanzania
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri anọ na asatọ onye isi ala Jakaya Kikwete họpụ tara na Nzukọ ahụ
A họpụtara ya n'afọ 2008

A na-ebo onye bụbu onye na-arụ ọrụ na ụgbọelu, Kway-Geer, onye nwere ọrịa albinism, ebubo imeziwanye ọgwụgwọ nke ndị dị otú ahụ na Tanzania, ebe ọtụtụ kwenyere na ọnọdụ ahụ bụ ọbụbụ ọnụ ma ọ bụ isi iyi nke ike anwansi
Mkpagbu nke ndị nwere albinism bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị n'ógbè ahụ, gụnyere igbu ọchụ, igbu ọchukwu na iwepụta akụkụ ahụ
Al-Sijistani na-ezo aka na ndị si n'ógbè Sijistan nke akụkọ ihe mere eme na Sistan nke oge a, mpaghara ókèala nke ọwụwa anyanwụ Iran na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke mba Afghanistan
Ndị ama ama a na-akpọ Al-Sijistani gụnyere ndia
Aha Tabari ma ọ bụ al-Tabari pụtara naanị 'site na Tabaristan', mpaghara mba Iran nke kwekọrọ na akụkụ nke mpaghara Mazandaran nke Iran nke oge a
Ọ pụkwara izo aka na ndia
Nisbah Arabic, aha njirimara, al-Tiflisi ma ọ bụ al-Taflisi na-egosi mmalite sitere na ma ọ bụ mkpakọrịta ya na obodo Tbilisi, Georgia (Arabic Tiflis, Taflis)
Arabic nisba al-Tikriti na-ezo aka na ndị amụrụ na ma ọ bụ ndị ezinụlọ ha sitere na obodo Iraq nke Tikrit Karịsịa ọ nwere ike na-ezo aka
al-Turk ma ọ bụ el-Turk na casings ha dị iche iche, bụ akụkụ nke aha Arabik, nke a na-anabatakarị dị ka aha ikpeazụ (ma ọ bụ na-emeso ya dị ka nke a) na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ
Al-Tusi ma ọ bụ Tusi bụ aha ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta Iran amụrụ n'obodo Tous na Khorasan
Ụfọdụ ndị ọkà mmụta nwere aha al-Tusi gụnyere
Aha nna Al-Wazir (Arabic) sitere Arabic
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Al-Zahabi ( الذهبي) bụ aha nna Arabic nke pụtara ọlaedo / ọlaedo
Ezinụlọ Alzahabi ma ọ bụ Ụlọ Gold (بيت الذهبي) dị ka a maara ha na Siria, bụ ezinụlọ nke asaa kacha baa ọgaranya na Damaskọs, isi obodo Siria
Ha bụ otu n'ime ezinụlọ asaa kachasị ochie mejupụtara Damaskọs
Ezinụlọ ahụ nwetara aha ha site na azụmaahịa ha dị ka ndị na-ere ahịa ọla edo ma bụrụ ndị a ma ama maka ntutu mara mma na cha cha cha cha

Ezinụlọ ahụ ka na-azụ ahịa n'ụwa niile site na ụlọ ahịa ha dị na al-Hamidiyah Souq (Arabic سوق الحميدية), nke kachasị na etiti souk na Syria, nke dị n'ime obodo Damaskọs ochie nwere mgbidi n'akụkụ Citadel
Souq na-amalite n'okporo ámá Al-Thawra wee kwụsị na Umayyad alakụba plaza
Aha Al-Zahrani, al-Zahrania ma Alzahrani (Arabic الزهراني na-egosi mmekọrịta ya na agbụrụ Zahran); bụ aha nna na Saudi Arabia maka ndị ezinụlọ eze nke atọ
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Al-Zayani (Arabic) bụ ezinụlọ Sunni Muslim nke dị na Bahrain, Saudi Arabia, na Kuwait
Ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke ezinụlọ na Bahrain bịara n'etiti narị afọ nke 19 na agbụrụ Utub, nke sokwa na Al-Khalifa, ezinụlọ eze na Alaeze Bahrain
E nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke ezinụlọ Al-Zayani na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Saudi Arabia na akụkụ Riyadh
Otu onye ama ama n'ezinụlọ Al-Zayani bụ onye nkuzi Saudi a ma ama Khalil Al-Zyani na Abdullatif bin Rashid Al Zayani, minista mba ọzọ nke Bahrain
Ezinụlọ Zayani si na ebo Bani Adwan
Ekwenyere na aha Zayani sitere na obodo a na-akpọ 'Zayanh', bụ obodo ezinụlọ nke dị na mpụga Mecca
N'ihi ya, aha Al-Zayani
A maara ha dị ka ndị ọchụnta ego kemgbe mmalite narị afọ nke 20
Ọganihu nke Pearl Diving nyeere aka ịkpụzi aha ezinụlọ na Bahrain
Ezinụlọ ahụ nwere ọtụtụ ebe a na-ere ụgbọ ala, ihe owuwu, njem, na azụmaahịa ndị ọzọ dị iche iche

Aha Al-Zoubi, El-Zoufi, Zoubi, Zouabi, El- Zaabi, Zoabi ma ọ bụ Zuabi (Arabic ) bụ ezinụlọ Levantine a ma ama nke a na-ahụ ndị otu ya n'ụwa ndị Arab, mana ha kacha lekwasị anya na Northern Jordan, Ndịda Syria, na Palestine
Ezinụlọ ahụ bụ ezinụlọ Hasanite, Hashemite nke na-achọpụta agbụrụ ya na Hanbali Sunni Saint Abdul Qadir Al Gilani
Al (Alec) Debbo (22 June 1924 na 13 July 2011) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe ọchị, na-agụ egwu na onye na-emeeme ihe nkiri
Dị ka otu n'ime ndị omenkà a ma ama nke ọgbọ ya, o nyere aka dị ukwuu na egwu na ọdịbendị Afrikaner
A mụrụ Alec Debbo, nwa nne na nna Lebanọn, na Bloemfontein, South Africa
Dịka nwatakịrị, ọ ghaghị inyere ndị mụrụ ya aka n'ụlọ ahịa
Nne na nna ya kụziiri ya Lebanese Arabic na Bekee mana ọ mụtara Afrikaans mgbe ọ dị obere, n'ihi na Afrikaans bụ asụsụ kachasị na Bloemfontein
N'egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ, o gosipụtara nkà maka ime ka ndị mmadụ chịa ọchị mana ọ hụghị ihe ọchị dịka ọrụ dị irè, yabụ mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ ruru eru dịka onye na-arụ ọrụ na pọmpụ
Ịbụ abụ na ime ihe ọchị nọgidere na-abụ ihe ntụrụndụ ya ma ọ na-eme na mmemme na agbamakwụkwọ
N'afọ 1947, ihe niile gbanwere mgbe ndị enyi ya mere ka ọ sonye na asọmpi nkà nke mba ahụ, nke metụtara South African Industries Fair, nke ọ meriri
N'ihi ya, ọ nwetara ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya na Die Kaskenades van Dokter Kwak
Ọ were naanị nkeji atọ mana o zuru iji nweta nkwado mba
Debbo mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na Die Kaskenades van Dokter Kwak n'afọ 1949

Mgbe ọ nwesịrị ihe ịga nke ọma na ihe nkiri dịka Alles sal regkom (1951) (Ihe niile ga-eme nke ọma), Dislen om te lewe (1957) (Ọ dị mma ịdị ndụ) na Fratse in die vloot (1958), o mere nke mbụ ya dịka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri afọ 1961 Boerboel de Wet

N'afọ 1969, o mepụtara ihe nkiri Stadig oor die klippe (Na-agafe nkume), mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dịka Boetie Flenters (anya onwe onye na-adịghị mma nke Pink Panther n'ụzọ ụfọdụ ka jisiri ike nweta ndị ọjọọ)
Otú ọ dị, Al na-eche mgbe niile na Donker Afrika (1957) (Dark Afrika) bụ ihe nkiri ya kachasị mma
Ọ pụtara na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri iri abụọ, na ọrụ ihe nkiri nke gafere ihe karịrị afọ iri isii
Ọ pụtara ikpeazụ na ihe nkiri afọ 2004, Oh Schuks
Abụ m Gatvol (Oh Shucks, agwụla m ike), nke Leon Schuster duziri
N'afọ 1968, Al nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na nsụgharị ya nke Hasie, abụ nke Nico Carstens na Anton de Waal dere
Mgbe nke a gasịrị, nwoke ahụ nwere anya na-agbagharị agbagharị, okpu na-atọ ọchị na enyo anya buru ibu mechara abọm egwu iri na otu
N'afọ 1996 o wepụtara abọm nke abụọ ikpeazụ ya (ma ọ bụ nke ikpeazụ ya na ihe ọhụrụ), nke akpọrọ Ek lewe nog (M ka dị ndụ)
Afọ anọ ka e mesịrị, n'afọ 2000, abọm ya 'nke kachasị egwu' pụtara, nke a na-akpọ Pieringoog Potpourri Al Debbo sê dankie (Saucer Eye Potpourri al Debbo kwuru Thank You)
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị kasị mma Debbo mere bụ
N'afọ 2011, e nyere Al Debbo ihe nrite Comics Choice Awards maka onyinye ya na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ South Africa
A nabatara Debbo na Bloemfontein Medi-Clinic n'ọnwa June afọ 2011 maka ọgwụgwọ nke ọrịa akpa ume na ọnọdụ obi
Ọ nwụrụ izu atọ ka e mesịrị n'ụlọ ọgwụ, n'ọnwa 13 Julaị afọ 2011, mgbe ọ dị afọ 87
Al McKay (amụrụ na Febụwarị 2, 1948) bụ ónyé America na-akpọ ụbọ akwara, ónyé na-ede egwu, na ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
Ọ bụbu onye otu The Watts 103rd Rhythm Street Band na Earth, Wind & Fire, nke a kpọbatara ya na Rock and Roll Hall of Fame n'afọ 2000
McKay na-eduga otu nke ya a na-akpọ Al McKay All Stars ugbu a
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na New Orleans, Louisiana, United States, ọrụ ọkachamara mbụ McKay bụ dị ka ónyé na-akpọ ụbọ maka Ike & Tina Turner Revue
Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ ónyé otu The Watts 103rd Rhythm Street Band
McKay mechara sonye n'òtù Earth, Wind & Fire na 1973
O mechara hapụ otu ahụ n'afọ 1981
McKay na-eme ihe ugbu a na ndị otu ya, The Al McKay Allstars, na-eme ngosi a na-akpọ The Earth, Wind & Fire Experience
N'afọ 2001, otu ahụ wepụtara abọm studio akpọrọ Al Dente
E weputara abọm a kpọrọ Live at Mt
Fuji n'afọ 2003

Mc Kay gbakwara egwu na abọm Gene Harris nkè 1976 In a Special Way, Eddie Henderson nke 1977 LP Comin' Through, Patrice Rushen nké 1977 LP Shout It Out, Patrice nke 1978, Pizzazz nke 1979 na abọmpi studio ya nkè 1980, Posh
Ọzọkwa, McKay rụrụ ọrụ na Ramsey Lewis' 1980 LP Routes, Herbie Hancock's 1981 album Magic Windows na A Taste of Honey's 1982 LP Ladies of the Eighties
McKay sokwa mepụta The Temptations na 1984 studio LP Truly for You, ma mepụta Shirley Jones na album ya nkè 1986, Always in the Mood
O mechara kpọọ egwu na album Norman Brown nke 1992 Just Between Us na Ramsey Lewis ' 1993 LP Sky Islands
Al-Shamal Islamic Bank nke Khartoum, nke hibere na 1983, bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ego bụ isi nke Sudan, yana otu n'ime ụlọ akụ Islam na-eduga n'ụwa niile
Ụlọ akụ ahụ gbanwere akara ya na Balad Bank ụbọchị 3 nke Ọgọst 2018
Dị ka ndekọ ọha na eze si kwuo, n'etiti ndị na-etinye ego na Al Shamal Islamic Bank gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọrụ ego na Geneva nke Mohammed al Faisal, nwa Eze Faisal nwụrụ anwụ, duziri
Ụlọ akụ ahụ n'onwe ya nke n'etiti 'ndị isi guzobere' ya ise na ndị isi na-ekere òkè bụ ụlọ akụ Khartoum ọzọ, Faisal Islamic Bank of Sudan
Dị ka ndekọ ọha na eze si kwuo, pasent 19 nke Faisal Islamic Bank bụ nke Dar Al-Maal Al-Islami Trust, ma ọ bụ naanị DMI Trust, nke Prince Faisal na-eduzi
E guzobere DMI Trust nke ijeri $ 35 na 1981 iji kwalite mgbasa nke ụlọ akụ Alakụba n'ụwa ndị Alakụba
Ndị isi ya iri na abụọ gụnyere Haydar Mohamed Bin Laden, nwanne Osama bin Laden, dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuchitere DMI si kwuo
Ndị nwe oke ndị ọzọ gụnyere
Àtụ Earthquakes
Ala ọmajiji (nke a makwaara dị ka ala ọmajiji, ịma jijiji ma ọ bụ temblor) bụ ịma jijiji nke elu ụwa nke sitere na ntọhapụ ike na mberede na lithosphere nke ụwa nke na-emepụta ebili mmiri seismic

Ala ọmajiji nwere ike na-esiwanye ike, site na ndị na-esighị ike nke na a pụghị inwe mmetụta, ruo na ndị na-eme ihe ike na-eme ka ihe na ndị mmadụ banye n'ikuku, mebie akụrụngwa dị oke mkpa, na imebi mbibi n'obodo niile
Ọrụ seismic nke mpaghara bụ ugboro, ụdị, na nha nke ala ọma jijiji nwere n'otu oge
Seismicity n'otu ebe dị n'ụwa bụ nkezi ọnụego ntọhapụ ike seismic kwa otu olu
A na-ejikwa okwu ahụ ịma jijiji mee mkpọtụ seismic na-abụghị nke ala ọma jijiji
N'elu ụwa, ala ọma jijiji na-egosipụta onwe ha site na ịma jijiji na ịkwagharị ma ọ bụ ịkpaghasị ala
Mgbe isi mmalite nke nnukwu ala ọma jijiji dị n'ikpere mmiri, enwere ike ịkwaga ala ala nke ọma iji bute mbufịt mbufịt
Ala ọmajiji nwekwara ike ịkpalite mbuze
N'echiche ya n'ozuzu ya, a na-eji okwu ala ọma jijiji kọwaa ihe omume ọ bụla nke seismic—ma ọ̀ bụ ihe okike ma ọ bụ nke mmadụ kpatara—nke na-ebute ebili mmiri seismic
Ihe na-akpatakarị ala ọma jijiji bụ nbibi nke ebe ọdịda ala kamakwa site na ihe omume ndị ọzọ dị ka mgbawa ugwu, mbuze ala, mgbawa ogbunigwe, na nnwale nuklia
A na-akpọ ebe ala ọma jijiji mbụ gbawara agbawa ya hypocenter ma ọ bụ na-elekwasị anya ya
Ebe etiti bụ ebe dị n'ọkwa ala ozugbo n'elu hypocenter
Ala ọmajiji tectonic na-eme n'ebe ọ bụla n'ụwa ebe enwere ike na-agbanwe agbanwe zuru oke iji mee ka mgbaji gbajie n'akụkụ ụgbọ elu nwere mmejọ
Akụkụ nke mmejọ na-agafe ibe ya nke ọma na nke ọma naanị ma ọ bụrụ na enweghị mmebi ma ọ bụ ihe na-adịghị mma n'akụkụ ebe mmejọ ahụ na-abawanye nguzogide esemokwu
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ndị na-adịghị mma nwere ihe ndị dị otú ahụ, nke na-eduga n'ụdị omume mkpisi aka
Ozugbo ekpochila mmejọ ahụ, ịga n'ihu na mmegharị n'etiti efere ndị ahụ na-eduga n'ịbawanye nchekasị na, ya mere, na-echekwa ike ike n'ime olu gburugburu ebe mmejọ ahụ
Nke a na-aga n'ihu ruo mgbe nrụgide ahụ bilitere nke ọma iji mebie agụụ ahụ, na-enye ohere na mberede na-agafe akụkụ nke mmejọ ahụ, na-ahapụ ike echekwara
A na-ewepụta ike a dị ka ngwakọta nke ebili mmiri seismic na-agbanwe agbanwe na-egbuke egbuke, ikpo ọkụ nke elu ahụ mebiri emebi, na mgbawa nke nkume, si otú ahụ na-akpata ala ọma jijiji
Usoro a nke ji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-ewulite nsogbu na nrụgide na-akpata site na ọdịda ala ọma jijiji mgbe ụfọdụ na-ezo aka dị ka echiche na-agbanwe agbanwe
A na-eme atụmatụ na ọ bụ nanị pasent 10 ma ọ bụ ihe na-erughị nke ike ala ọma jijiji na-eme ka ike seismic
A na-eji ihe ka ukwuu n'ike ala ọmajiji ahụ na-eme ka ọganihu nke mgbaji ala ọma jijiji ahụ pụta ma ọ bụ ghọọ okpomọkụ nke esemokwu na-ebute

Ya mere, ala ọmajiji na-ebelata ike ngbanwe nke ụwa dị ma welie okpomọkụ ya, ọ bụ ezie na mgbanwe ndị a adịghị emetụta ma e jiri ya tụnyere ihe na-eduzi na convective eruba nke okpomọkụ si n'ime ime ụwa
Enwere ụdị mmejọ atọ bụ isi, ha niile nwere ike ibute ala ọma jijiji n'etiti nkịtị, tụgharịa (ntụgharị), na mwepu
Mmejọ nkịtị na nke ọzọ bụ ihe atụ nke mwepu-slip, ebe nchụpụ n'akụkụ mmejọ ahụ dị na ntụzịaka nke itinye na ebe mmegharị na ha gụnyere akụkụ kwụ ọtọ
Ọtụtụ ala ọma jijiji na-ebute site na mmegharị na mmejọ ndị nwere akụkụ nke ma mwepu-slip na iku-slip; A maara nke a dị ka oblique slip

Akụkụ kachasị elu, nke na-agbaji agbawa nke eriri ụwa, na slabs dị jụụ nke tectonic plates ndị na-agbada n'ime uwe mwụda na-ekpo ọkụ, bụ nanị akụkụ nke mbara ala anyị nke nwere ike ịchekwa ike na-agbanwe ma hapụ ya na mgbawa
Nkume dị ọkụ karịa ihe dị ka 300 °C (572 °F) na-asọpụta na nzaghachi nrụgide; ha adịghị agbawa na ala ọmajiji
Ogologo oke mgbawa na mmejọ nke eserese (nke nwere ike ịgbaji n'otu mgbawa) dị ihe dịka 1,000 km (620 mi)
Ọmụmaatụ bụ ala ọma jijiji ndị dị na Alaska (1957), Chile (1960), na Sumatra (2004), ha niile dị na mpaghara subduction

Ala ọmajiji kachasị ogologo na-agbawa na mmejọ mpụ, dị ka San Andreas Fault (1857, 1906), North Anatolian Fault in Turkey (1939), na Denali Fault na Alaska (2002), dị ihe dị ka ọkara ruo otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ ogologo oge
Ogologo ya na-ebelata akụkụ efere, na ndị na-adịghị mma na-adị ọbụna mkpụmkpụ
Mmejọ nkịtị na-abụkarị n'ebe a na-agbatị eriri ahụ dịka oke dị iche
Ala ọma jijiji jikọtara na nkịtị mmejọ bụ n'ozuzu ihe na-erughị ịdị ukwuu 7
Oke ịdị ukwuu tinyere ọtụtụ nkịtị mmejọ bụ ọbụna karịa n'ihi na ọtụtụ n'ime ha na-emi odude tinyere na-agbasa ebe, dị ka Iceland, ebe ọkpụrụkpụ nke kenkuwa oyi akwa bụ nanị banyere isii kilomita (37)
mi)

Ọ bụ ezie na a na-ewerekarị amụma dị ka ụdị amụma, amụma ala ọma jijiji na-adịkarị iche na amụma ala ọmajiji
Ịma amụma ala ọma jijiji na-emetụta ntule nke puru omume nke ihe egwu ala ọmajiji izugbe, gụnyere ugboro na oke ala ọmajiji na-emebi ihe n'otu mpaghara n'ime afọ ma ọ bụ iri afọ

E mepụtala usoro ịdọ aka ná ntị nke ala ọma jijiji nke nwere ike inye ọkwa mpaghara banyere ala ọma jijiji na-aga n'ihu, ma tupu elu ala amalitela ịkwaga, nwere ike ikwe ka ndị nọ n'ime usoro ahụ nwee ike ịchọ ebe obibi tupu enwe mmetụta ala ọma jijiji ahụ

Ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu nwekwara ike ịme usoro njikere dị ka ichekwa ihe ndị na-ekpo ọkụ mmiri na ihe ndị dị arọ nwere ike imerụ mmadụ ahụ, ịchọta ebe a na-emechi emechi maka ụlọ ọrụ, na ịkụziri ya ihe ha ga-eme mgbe ịma jijiji malitere
Maka mpaghara dị nso na nnukwu mmiri, ịdị njikere ala ọma jijiji gụnyere ohere nke mbufịt nke nnukwu ala ọma jijiji kpatara

Malite n’oge ndụ onye ọkà ihe ọmụma Gris bụ́ Anaxagoras na narị afọ nke ise TOA ruo na narị afọ nke 14 OA, a na-ekwukarị na ala ọma jijiji sitere na “ikuku (vapors) dị n’oghere dị n’ụwa” Thales nke Miletus (625-547 TOA) bụ naanị onye edere nke kwenyere na ọ bụ esemokwu dị n'etiti ụwa na mmiri kpatara ala ọma jijiji
Echiche ndị ọzọ dị, gụnyere ndị ọkà ihe ọmụma Gris Anaxamines' (585-526 TOA) nkwenkwe na mkpirisi nhụsianya nke nkụchi na mmiri mmiri kpatara ọrụ seismic
Onye ọkà ihe ọmụma Gris bụ Democritus (460-371 TOA) boro mmiri n'ozuzu ya ụta maka ala ọma jijiji
Pliny the Elder kpọrọ ala ọmajiji “igwe ojii n'okpuru ala”
Na akụkọ ifo Norse, a kọwara ala ọma jijiji dị ka mgba ime ihe ike nke chi Loki
Mgbe Loki, chi nke ajọ omume na esemokwu, gburu Baldr, bụ chi nke ịma mma na ìhè, a tara ya ahụhụ site n'iji agwọ na-egbu egbu kee ya n'ọgba ahụ n'elu isi ya na-asọpụta nsị

Nwunye Loki, Sigyn, ji nnukwu efere guzoro n'akụkụ ya iji jide nsi ahụ, mana mgbe ọ bụla ọ ga-awụsa efere ahụ nsi na-asọsa n'ihu Loki, na-amanye ya ịkwapụ isi ya wee tie agbụ ya, nke mere ka ụwa maa jijiji
Na akụkọ ifo ndị Gris, Poseidon bụ ihe kpatara na chi nke ala ọma jijiji
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ ọjọọ, o ji ụzọ atọ tie ala, kpata ala ọma jijiji na ọdachi ndị ọzọ
O jikwa ala ọma jijiji taa ahụhụ na ime ka ụjọ jide ndị mmadụ dị ka imegwara

Namazu bi n'ime apịtị dị n'okpuru ụwa, chi Kashima na-echekwa ya nke na-eji nkume jide azụ ahụ
Mgbe Kashima kwere ka onye nche ya daa, Namazu na-ama jijiji, na-ebute oke ala ọma jijiji
N’ọdịnala ndị na-ewu ewu n’oge a, a na-eji ihe atụ nke ala ọma jijiji eme site n’icheta nnukwu obodo ndị a tọgbọrọ n’efu, dị ka Kobe na 1995 ma ọ bụ San Francisco na 1906
Ala ọma jijiji akụkọ ifo na-adakarị na mberede na-enweghị ịdọ aka ná ntị

N'ihi nke a, akụkọ banyere ala ọma jijiji na-amalitekarị site na ọdachi ahụ ma lekwasị anya na nso nso a, dị ka na Short Walk to Daylight (1972), The Ragged Edge (1968) ma ọ bụ Aftershock Ala ọma jijiji na New York (1999)
Otu ihe atụ pụtara ìhè bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ Heinrich von Kleist kpochapụrụ, Ala ọmajiji na Chile, nke na-akọwa mbibi nke Santiago na 1647
Mkpirisi akụkọ ifo nke Haruki Murakami Mgbe ala ọmajiji ahụ gasịrị, gosipụtara nsonaazụ nke ala ọmajiji Kobe nke 1995

Otu ala ọma jijiji kachasị ewu ewu na akụkọ ifo bụ echiche 'Big One' a na-atụ anya na California San Andreas Fault otu ụbọchị, dị ka e gosiri na akwụkwọ akụkọ Richter 10 (1996), Goodbye California (1977), 2012 (2009) na San Andreas (2015) n'etiti
ọrụ ndị ọzọ
Appel nke ọtụtụ ebe, A Comparative Seismology, gosipụtara onye na-ese ihe na-eme ka otu agadi nwanyị kwenye na ala ọma jijiji nke apocalyptic dị nso

Ihe ngosi nke oge a nke ala ọma jijiji na ihe nkiri na-agbanwe agbanwe n'ụzọ ha si egosipụta mmeghachi omume mmetụta uche nke mmadụ maka nhụsianya n'ezie nwere ike ịkpatara ezinaụlọ na ndị ha hụrụ n'anya na-ata ahụhụ ozugbo

Nchọpụta nzaghachi ahụike uche nke ọdachi na-emesi ike mkpa ọ dị ịmara maka ọrụ dị iche iche nke ọnwụ nke ezinaụlọ na ndị isi obodo, mfu nke ụlọ na gburugburu ebe ama ama, na ọnwụ nke akụrụngwa na ọrụ dị mkpa iji nọgide na-adị ndụ

Karịsịa maka ụmụaka, ndị okenye na-ahụ maka nlekọta doro anya nwere ike ichebe, na-azụ ha, na uwe ha mgbe ala ọma jijiji gasịrị, na inyere ha aka ịghọta ihe dakwasịrị ha egosiwo ọbụna ihe dị mkpa maka ahụ ike mmetụta uche na anụ ahụ ha karịa
ihe dị mfe inye ihe

Dị ka a hụrụ mgbe ọdachi ndị ọzọ metụtara mbibi na ọnwụ nke ndụ na ihe ngosi mgbasa ozi ha, nke a na-ahụ n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na ala ọma jijiji nke Haiti 2010, ọ dịkwa mkpa ka ọ ghara imebi mmeghachi omume nke ọnwụ na nchụpụ ma ọ bụ nkwụsị nke nchịkwa na ọrụ gọọmentị, kama iji kwado ya
mmeghachi omume ndị a, iji kwado nsogbu na-edozi nsogbu na ntụgharị uche maka otu mmadụ nwere ike isi meziwanye ọnọdụ ndị ọ metụtara

Ala ọma jijiji kunlun nke afọ 2001 a makwaara dị ka Ala ọma jijiji Kokoxili nke afọ 2001, mere n'abalị iri na-anọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2001 mgbe oji nkeji iri abụọ na isi gafee elekere itoolu nke abalị n'oge ahaziri n'eluigwe n'ala (na mgbe oji nkeji iri abụọ na isii gafee elekere ise nke uhuruchi n'oge obodo), n'ebe Etiti Alaaọma jijiji a gbadoro anya n'elu ala nke dị nso na Kokoxili, dị kwa nso n'ókè-ala n'etiti Qinghai na Xinjiang nọ na mpaghara ime ime obodo bụ ugwu ugwu
Site na ịdị ukwuu nke 78 M ọ bụ ala ọma jijiji kachasị ike na China ruo afọ iri ise
Enweghị mkpesa ọ bụla a kọrọ, ikekwe n'ihi obere ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ na kwa enweghị ụlọ dị elu
Ala ọma jijiji ka e jikọtara ya na n'elu-agbawa kacha too ogologo nke mere n-elu ala, ~ kilomita narị ano na iri na ise
Mmejọ Kunlun bụ otu n'ime nnukwu ihe mmife ngọngọ abụọ gara aka nri na-aka ekpe nke ihe owuwu bụ ebe obibi nye ngagharị ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ala dị larịị nke Tibet gbasara efere nke Eurasia
Ngagharị a na -esite n'aka mgbasa akụkụ nke mpaghara gbara ọkpụrụkpụ jikọrọ ọnụ nke metụtara ya na nkụkọta dị n'etiti efere India na Eurasia
Mgbawa ala ọma jijiji bidoro na obere nkutu na njedebe ọdịda anyanwụ nke mmejọ Kunlun na mpaghara ugwu ugwu Buka Daban Feng
Mwepu ahụ gbasara n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ site na mgbatị ogologo oge tupu ịgbaso eriri mmejọ Kunlun
Mpaghara nke nrụrụ mmịpụ n'eme na mmalite ala ọma jijiji (ya bụ, nke mere n'oge ala ọma jijiji a) buru nnukwu ibu, yana nnukwu mmejọ nke ahụrụ ruo Kilomita iri isii site na isi ihe mgbawa ahụ
Nrụrụ a na-eme na ụzọ abụọ, ihe dịka Kilomita iri abụọ na kilomita iri isii site n'isi ntụpọ ahụ
Njirimara pụrụ iche na ọmụmụ njirimara ihe ndị ana ahụ anya n'elu ụwa dịbu adị tụrụ alo na ala ọma jijiji a kpalitere Nkwagharị me na mmejọ ndị dị adị

Mmịpụ a n'eme na mmalite ala ọma jijiji nke mgbawa elu ala gbatịrị ruo ihe karịrị narị kilomita anọ, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ mpaghara kacha ogologo nke Mmịpụ n'eme na mmalite ala ọma jijiji nke mgbawa elu ala nke ahụrụ anya ruo ugbu a

Nnyocha nke ọsọ ịgbasa na-egosi na mgbawa ahụ na-agbasa na ọsọ ọsọ n'akụkụ akụkụ mbụ, mana ọ na-abawanye na ọsọ ọsọ karịa ọsọ ọsọ S- elu mgbe mwụsịrị gafere steepụ ịgbatị ma gaa n'ihu na ọsọ ahụ ruo mgbe mgbasa kwụsịrị
Nke a na -eme ka ala ọma jijiji Kunlun bụrụ akwụkwọ kacha mma edepụtara maka ala ọma jijiji nke oke elu
A tụwo aro na mpaghara na-adịghị ahụkebe nke nrụrụ co-seismic bụ nsonaazụ sitere na mgbawa mgbawa nke oke elu
N'ihi ịdị anya ma idị n'ime ime nke mpaghara ahụ, ọtụtụ akụkọ banyere mbibi sitere na mpaghara narị kwuru narị kilomita site na ebe mbụ ala ọma jijiji a bidoro
Ebe etiti obodo kacha nso, bụ obodo Golmud, nke kwuru maka mkpatụ siri ike mana ọ nweghị ụlọ dara
A kọrọ ụfọdụ mmebi na ebe a na-ewu ihe owuwu ụgbọ okporo ígwè Qingzang (ụgbọ okporo ígwè Qinghai-Tibet) na n'akụkụ okporo ụzọ Qinghai-Tibet

Dot Earth bụ blọọgụ gburugburu ebe obibi nke ónyé édémédé sayensị Andrew Revkin jikọtara ya na mgbasa ozi site n'afo 2007 ruo afọ 2016 màkà The New York Times Ebumnuche nke blọọgụ ahụ bụ inyocha mbọ iji mee ka ihe omume mmadụ na njedebe nke ụwa dị mma

Na-egosi vidiyo, ajụjụ ọnụ na ụdị ozi ndị ọzọ dị ka nsogbụ gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi na mgbanwe ihu igwe, gụnyere iwu ike, nchekwa, ụdị dị iche iche, na nkwado, a kọwakwuru Dot Earth dị ka 'nnyocha mmekọrịta nke usoro na echiche na ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ na ndị ọkachamara'
E bipụtara ya n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'ubochi irí abụọ na ise, afo 2007, ntinye mbụ Revkin na Dot Earth bụ na 'Cutting Greenhouse Gases for Cash Prizes'
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2010, 'mgbe postu narị itoolu na iri anọ dị ka blọọgụ akụkọ', The New York Times kwagara Dot Earth na 'akụkụ echiche' nke saịtị ya n'ịntanetị
Mgbanwe a so Revkin si n'ọnọdụ zuru oke gaa na nke ónyé nweere onwé ya, na-eme njem iji mee ka akara dị n'etiti ụdị abụọ ahụ doo anya
Mgbè afọ itoolu na postu puku abụọ na narị asatọ na iri gasịrị, Revkin kwụsịrị blog ahụ n'ubochi ise n'onwa Disemba afọ 2016, obere oge tupu ọ malite ọrụ dị ka ónyé nta akụkọ dị elu màkà ProPublica
Dị ka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke Mahadum Pace si kwuo nke ónyé dere blọọgụ ahụ na ya nwèrè njikọ, blọọgụ 'bụ
ọtụtụ nde mmadụ na-agụ ya n'ihe karịrị mba narị abụọ site na Brazil ruo China'
Ala mesotrophic bụ ala nwere ọmụmụ dị mma
Ihe na-egosi na ala na-eme nri bụ ọnọdụ ntọala ya, nke a na-egosipụta dị ka oke na-ejikọta isi ihe na-edozi ahụ (calcium, magnesium, potassium na sodium) achọtara n'ebe ahụ na pasent ụrọ nke ala
A na-egosipụtakarị nke a n'ọtụtụ narị ahịrị ahịrị cation kwa kilogram ụrọ ya bụ cmol (+) kg−1 ụrọ

Alaa Mohammed Hosni El Sayed Mubarak ( Arabic ) ( Arabic pronunciation حسني السيد مبارك; Egyptian Arabic pronunciation ( ′e)sˈsæjjed moˈbɑː'ɑk] ) (amụrụ na 26 Nọvemba 1960 na Cairo ) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Ijipt na okenye nke ụmụ nwoke abụọ nke Hosni Mubarak, onye bụbu onye isi ala Ijipt nke jere ozi site na 1981 ruo 2011, na nwunye ya Suzanne Mubarak
A mụrụ Alaa Mubarak na Cairo nye Suzanne Mubarak na Hosni Mubarak, onye ghọrọ onye isi ala Ijipt na 1981, chụpụrụ ya na 2011
Alaa gara St
George's College, Cairo ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum America dị na Cairo
Mubarak edebewo ọkwa dị ala karịa nwanne ya nwoke nke nta, Gamal onye tinyere aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị tupu mgbanwe ndị Ijipt nke afọ 2011
N'afọ 2011, e jidere ya na nna ya na nwanne ya nwoke na mmadụ atọ n'ime ha mechara maa ikpe maka nrụrụ aka n'afọ 2014
A tọhapụrụ Alaa na nwanne ya nwoke n'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2015 mgbe ha mechara mkpọrọ afọ anọ, nke gụnyere oge ha jere ozi
EU enyela ha atọ iwu, ma kpọchie akụ niile Mubarak kpughere
A kpọrọ Alaa Mubarak aha na njikọ ya na Panama Papers

N'afọ 2013, ndị ọrụ ego nke British Virgin Islands chọpụtara na Alaa Mubarak nwere 'Pan World Investments', ego itinye ego maka ezinụlọ Mubarak nke ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ijeri $ 1 nke Mossack Fonseca tinyere, onye kwuru na Credit Suisse kpọbatara ya na ha
Na Septemba 2018, e jidere Alaa na nwanne ya nwoke Gamal, ma bo ya ebubo na ọ na-achịkwa ahịa ahịa
Ikpe nrụrụ aka nke Alaa, tinyere ikpe nrụrụ aka nke nna ya na nwanne ya nwoke, ka Ụlọikpe Cassation nke Egypt kwadoro n'otu ọnwa ahụ
E mechara tọhapụ Alaa na nwanne ya nwoke na Febụwarị 2020 maka ebubo ịzụ ahịa òkè na-akwadoghị nke afọ 2018
Na 12 Machị 2021, European Union kagburu mmachibido iwu megide ndị Ijipt itoolu gụnyere ezinụlọ Mubarak, nke a nakweere kemgbe 2011
Mubarak lụrụ Heddy Rasekh, onye ya na ya mụrụ ụmụ nwoke abụọ, Muhammad na Omar Alaa Mubarak
Muhammad nwụrụ na 18 Mee 2009, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ
A mara ọkwa na ọ tara ahụhụ 'nsogbu ahụike siri ike', nke a chọpụtara dị ka ọbara ọgbụgba ụbụrụ
E nyochara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ ndị agha Maadi ruo awa ole na ole tupu a kpọga ya Paris maka nlekọta ọzọ, ebe o mechara nwụọ
E weghachiri ozu ya ma lie ya na Cairo
Alaa Shoier bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, a mụrụ na Cairo, Egypt na 15 Ọktoba 1992, a maara maka ọrụ ya na Nesr El Saeed (Eagle of Upper Egypt) na Khat Sakhen (Hotline) usoro wepụtara n'afọ 2018
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ọrụ dị ka Dream na 9th Street, nke a ka ga-egosi
Alaa Shoier gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mass Media and Communication na American College of Greece na masters ya na Leadership and Innovation in Contemporary Media na American University na Dubai
Alaa Shoier malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya n'afọ 2018 site na ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn Egypt

Alaba-Kʼabeena (Alaaba, Alaba, Allaaba, Halaba), nkè á makwaara dị kà Wanbasana, bụ asụsụ Highland East Cushitic nkè ndị Alaba na Kebena na-asụ ná Ethiopia ná Great Rift Valley ná ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nkè Ọdọ Mmiri Shala, ọkachasị ná mpaghara Alaba pụrụ iche, mpaghara Kebena nkè mpaghara Gurage, ná mpaghara Goro nkè Ógbè Oromia
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-asụ asụsụ há n'okpuru 1%, ébé ọnụ ọgụgụ há na-asụrụ asụsụ nkè abụọ bụ 86%; Á na-akụzi Alaba-Kʼabeena n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị
O nwere 81% ókwú yiri Kambaata
Otú ọ dị, Fleming (1976) kewara Kʼabeena (nkè á na-akpọkwa 'Qebena' mà ọ bụ 'Kebena') dị kà olumba nkè Kambaata, ná Blench (2006) kewara há abụọ dị kà olulu nkè Kambata
Ọnụ ọgụgụ 2007 na Ethiopia depụtara Alaba na Qebena dị ka asụsụ dị iche iche
E bipụtara nchịkọta nkè ìhè karịrị ilu 400 n'asụsụ á ná nsụgharị Bekee
Alaba International Market bụ ahịa eletrọniki dị na Ojo, Steeti Lagos, Naijiria
Ọ bụ ahịa eletrọniki kachasị ukwuu na Naịjirịa
Ewezuga ire ngwaahịa eletrọniki, ahịa ahụ na-arụkwa ọrụ na nrụzi nke ngwa ụlọ
Ahịa na ọrụ azụmahịa ya dịgasị iche iche na-enye ohere maka ndị injinia eletrik na ndị ọkachamara na nrụzi nke ngwa ụlọ mebiri emebi iji soro ndị na-ere ahịa eletrọniki na-azụ ahịa
A na-emeghe ahịa kwa ụbọchị ma e wezụga na Sọnde na ezumike ọha

Mmekọrịta azụmahịa a na ewu ewu kwa ụbọchị adọtawo ndị na-etinye ego ọhụrụ na ndị na-ere ngwá electronic gafee Africa si otú a gbasaa ọnụ ọgụgụ ahịa na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na akụ na ụba nke Lagos State
Alaba mba ụwa bụ ahịa zuru oke nke ọ dịghị onye na-ere ahịa na-emetụta ọnụahịa nke ngwaahịa eletrọniki ọ na-azụta ma ọ bụ na-ere n'ime ahịa na-enweghị ihe mgbochi ịbanye na ịpụ

Ahịa ahụ nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke ndị na-ere ahịa na ndị na-azụ ahịa nwere njikere ịzụta ngwaahịa na ọnụahịa ụfọdụ dabere na mkpa na ego ha na-enweta, na-eme ka mgbanwe ogologo oge gbanwee ọnọdụ ahịa
Alaba Jonathan (a mụrụ n'ọnwa 1 June 1992 Calabar, Nigeria ) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijiria
Alaba Jonathan malitere ọrụ ya n'oge ntorobịa nke ndị mmụọ ozi Navy
Mgbe ọ tozuru oke maka ndị otu ndị otu mmụọ ozi Navy, ọ kwagara na Pelican Stars na mmiri 2010 ebe ọ ka nọ n'okpuru nkwekọrịta
Jonathan bụ onye otu mba Naijiria ma gbaa otu egwuregwu bọọlụ opekata mpe
Jonathan nọchitere anya obodo ya dị ka onye mgbaru ọsọ nke atọ na asọmpi iko mba ụwa nke FIFA 2011 na Germany
Na mbụ n'afọ 2010, o sonye na iko mba ụwa nke U-20 maka ndị Naijiria U-20
Chief Alaba Lawson (onye amụrụ Alaba Oluwaseun Lawson na Jenụwarị 18, 1951) bụ onye ama ama na Naijiria, onye ọchụnta ego na onye mmụta
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye isi nwanyị mbụ nke NACCIMA na Onye isi oche nke mbadamba nke Kansul, Moshood Abiola Polytechnic, Ogun steeti
Chief Lawson bụkwa onye isi ala nke ụlọ ọrụ Nzukọ nke Nwaanyị onye ochichi Omenala na Naijiria

N'ịbụ onye amụrụ na ezinụlọ Jiboku-Taiwo nke Abeokuta, isi obodo nke Ogun Steeti, Alaba Lawson bụ onye ikwu nke ndị a ma ama na Naịjirịa dịka minista ahụike Olikoye Ransome-Kuti na onye ọsụ ụzọ Afrobeat Fela Anikulapo Kuti
Ọ gụsịrị agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị na St
James 'African Primary School, Idi-Ape, Abeokuta n'etiti 1957 na 1962 na Abeokuta Girls Grammar School, Abeokuta, na-ahapụ na 1968 tupu ọ gawa St
Nicholas Montessori Teachers' Collegelọ Akwụkwọ Ọzụzụ na Prince's Gate, England na 1973 ebe ọ nwetara diplọma nke klas mbu na Education

Ọ malitere ọrụ nkuzi ya na 1969 na Children House School, Ibara na mgbe ọ nọ n'England, ọ kuziri nkuzi na Queen's Gate Montessori Nursery School na Mill Hill Nursery na Junior School tupu ọ laghachite na Naịjirịa na 1977 iji guzobe ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ya akpọrọ Lawson's Childcare Nursery na praịmarị ebe ọ malitere naanị ụmụ akwụkwọ atọ ma toro ugbu a ịbụ otu nke ulo akwukwo nke Lawson
O mechara guzobe ụlọ ọrụ na-ere ahịa / nkesa nke a maara dị ka Capricorn Stores Ltd, n'etiti 1968 - 1996
ebe o kesara ụlọ ọrụ na Nigerian Breweries Ltd, Nigerian Bottling Company Ltd, Guinness Nigeria Ltd, West African Portland Cement Ltd
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Azụmaahịa Abeokuta na 1995 ma mesịa bụrụ Onye isi nke Kansul nke onye isi oche nke Azụmaahịa na Ogun n'afọ 2000 wee duzie ya ruo 2002
Na 2009 o guzobere ulo aku a maara dịka Abestone Microfinance Bank iji bulie SMES
Na May 25, 2017, Alaba ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara ịbụ Onye isi ala nke National Association Of Chambers of Commerce, Industry, Mines And Agriculture (NACCIMA) na-esochi njedebe nke oge Dr

Alabama bu otu state no na Njikota Obodo Amerika (USA)
Alabama Department of Conservation and Natural Resources(ADCNR) bụ ụlọ ọrụ steeti na-ahụ maka nchekwa na njikwa akụ ala Alabama gụnyere ogige ntụrụndụ steeti, ala steeti, anụ ọhịa na akụrụngwa mmiri
ADCNR na-enyekwa ikike ịchụ nta na ịkụ azụ maka steeti ahụ
Ngalaba ahụ na-akwalite ọrụ nlekọta amamihe na ịnụ ụtọ akụ sitere n'okike steeti site na ngalaba ise akụrụngwa mmiri, ala steeti, ogige steeti na anụ ọhịa na azụ azụ mmiri
Ịkwado ngalaba ndị ahụ bụ ngalaba nkwado asaa Akaụntụ, Diversity na Recruiting, Engineering, Information and Education, Information Technology, Legal, and Personnel and Payroll
Otu onye kọmishọna na-edu ngalaba a bụ onye gọvanọ họpụtara, ma nyekwa ya ndụmọdụ site n'aka ndị kọmiti Conservation Advisory nwere mmadụ iri
Ọ bụ gọvanọ na-ahọpụta ndị otu ndụmọdụ ndụmọdụ maka afọ isii

Gọvanọ, Kọmịshọna Agriculture na Industries, yana Alabama Cooperative Extension System Director na-eje ozi dị ka ndị otu ndụmọdụ ndụmọdụ, ebe ADCNR Commissioner na-eje ozi dị ka onye bụbu odeakwụkwọ officio
Ngalaba ahụ anaghị enweta ego sitere na ego izugbe steeti
A na-enweta ego site n'ịre ikike ịchụ nta na ịkụ azụ, ụgwọ ndebanye aha ụgbọ mmiri, ikike mmanụ na gas sitere na mgbazinye ala steeti, na ụgwọ ojiji Ogige Steeti
A na-agbakwunye ego ndị ahụ na ego dabara na gọọmenti etiti
Ọrụ bụ isi nke ngalaba ahụ bụ ijikwa anụ ọhịa na ala ọha nke Alabama

Nke a gụnyere ogige ntụrụndụ steeti iri abụọ na abụọ, ọdọ mmiri ịkụ azụ ọha 23, ebe a na-akụ azụ mmiri atọ, mpaghara nlekọta anụ ọhịa 34, ebe mgbaba mmiri mmiri abụọ, ebe nsọ anụ ọhịa abụọ, ebe a na-azụ anụ nwere ọdọ mmiri 35, na acres 645,000 (2,610 km2) nke ntụkwasị obi ejiri maka ya
uru nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ steeti, General Fund na Alabama Trust Fund
Ngalaba ahụ na-arụkwa ọrụ iji nweta ala ọzọ maka iji ọha na eze mee ihe n'okpuru Mmemme Anụ ọhịa ruo mgbe ebighị ebi ma na-enye akụrụngwa agụmakwụkwọ ọha
Alabama nwere ogologo akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nchekwa anụ ọhịa nke malitere na 1867
N'afọ ahụ ewepụtara iwu mbụ na steeti ahụ iji chịkwaa ịchụ nta na ịkụ azụ
Onye nnochite anya steeti John Wallace nke Madison County ka a họpụtara dịka kọmishọna mbụ nke ngalaba ahụ
Ọrụ ngalaba ahụ gụnyere ịhazi nnụnụ ọhịa na iwe ihe ubi, idebe oge ịchụ nta na oke owuwe ihe ubi, na inye asambodo maka ọmụmụ sayensị banyere nnụnụ
Na mmalite 1900s ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ udo Alabama chọrọ ndị omebe iwu steeti ka ha rụọ ọrụ dị ka ndị na-ahụ maka egwuregwu na ndị na-elekọta azụ na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ha na-arụ mgbe niile
Nke ahụ gbanwere na November 1907 mgbe HM Henderson na WF
A họpụtara Sirmon ka ọ bụrụ ndị nlekọta egwuregwu steeti mbụ, nke mekwara ka ha bụrụ ndị ọrụ mmanye iwu steeti mbụ na Alabama
N'oge na-adịghị anya, agbakwunyere ndị ọrụ ọrụ iri isii na ise na-abụghị ụgwọ ọnwa, na ka ọ na-erule 1922, a na-akwụ ndị na-elekọta egwuregwu ụgwọ ụgwọ ma were ha n'ọrụ site na nyocha na usoro ọzụzụ
Ngalaba ahụ ga-enwe ọtụtụ mgbanwe aha dị ka elekwasị anya na n'ozuzu oke nke ọrụ malitere ruo mgbe edozi aha ya ugbu a, Alabama Department of Conservation and Natural Resources, na 1971
Ngalaba ahụ ebipụtala akwụkwọ akụkọ kemgbe 1929
Site na 1929 ruo 1940, a na-akpọ magazin ahụ Alabama Game and Fish News
Mgbe ahụ na 1940 aha gbanwere na Alabama Conservation ruo mgbe ọ gbanwere na Outdoor Alabama na 1995
Ebe ọ bụ na magazin malitere, ọ na-akọwapụta anụ ọhịa nke steeti, ọdịdị dị iche iche nke okike, ohere ntụrụndụ n'èzí na ịma mma mara mma
Marine Resources
Ngalaba akụrụngwa mmiri na-ahụ maka akụrụngwa mmiri steeti site na nyocha na mmemme mmanye
Na 2013, ndị uwe ojii mbụ bụ ndị mmiri mmiri jikọtara na Alabama Law Enforcement Agency dị ka Marine Patrol
Ala steeti
Ngalaba ala steeti na-ahụ maka ala ndị steeti nwebeghị emepe emepe, ọtụtụ n'ime ya bụ nke a na-atụkwasị obi maka ebumnuche ọha
Ngalaba ala steeti bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmanye iwu nwere ikike ndị uwe ojii na steeti niile
Ogige Ntụrụndụ Steeti
Ngalaba Ogige Ntụrụndụ steeti bụ nkewa nke ọha na eze mara nke ọma n'ihi ọrụ nke idobe na ịrụ ọrụ ogige ogige ala Alabama
A na-ebo nkewa ahụ ụgwọ inweta na ichekwa ebe okike, ijikwa mpaghara ndị ahụ maka ọdịmma ọha, na ịkụziri ọha na eze gburugburu Alabama
Anụ Ọhịa na Ịkụ Azụ Mmiri Dị Mmị
Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Anụ Anụ ọhịa na nke Freshwater na-ahụ maka ma na-echekwa anụ ọhịa na akụrụngwa mmiri dị ọhụrụ na Alabama ma na-ahụ maka njikwa mpaghara Alabama's Wildlife Management Area (WMAs)
Ngalaba Azụ Anụ ọhịa na Freshwater bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmanye iwu nwere ikike ndị uwe ojii na steeti niile
Nkewa Nchịkwa
Ngalaba nchịkwa na-enye ọrụ nkwado dị ka akụrụngwa mmadụ, iwu, na ụgwọ ọrụ na ngalaba ọrụ
Ndozi 543 nke Iwu Alabama nke 1901 guzobere Forever Wild Land Trust na 1992
Na-agba ọsọ site na Ngalaba State Lands Division, ntụkwasị obi na-enye ohere maka ịzụrụ ala maka ntụrụndụ ọha na eze, ịmepụta ihe na-echekwa ọdịdị, mgbakwunye na mpaghara nchịkwa anụ ọhịa
na ogige ntụrụndụ steeti, yana dịka ụzọ isi chekwaa ihe nketa okike Alabama
N'ime Jenụwarị 2009 Forever Wild enwetala traktị ala 67 na-agbakọta acres 139,844 (5659 km2)
Nke ngalaba ngalaba anụ ọhịa na nke Freshwater Fisheries na-agba ọsọ, AABC bụ mmemme mgbake na-abụghị egwuregwu steeti na United States
N'ịbụ nke dị na Marion, ebumnuche etiti a bụ ịkwalite nchekwa na mweghachi nke ụdị mmiri dị ụkọ na Alabama na n'aka nke ya weghachite mmiri dị ọcha n'ụzọ mmiri steeti
Ọrụ ndị na-adịbeghị anya gụnyere mgbalị siri ike iji weghachi ọnụ ọgụgụ mmiri mollusk dị iche iche na steeti ahụ bụ ndị dara ada n'ihi ihe dị iche iche gburugburu ebe obibi
Osimiri Mobile River ga-abụ isi mmalite mbụ nke mbọ mweghachi nke mollusk
N'ihe dị ka 1,200 square kilomita (3,100 km2) nke mmiri dị n'ikpere mmiri gụnyere n'ime Mmemme Ọdụdọ Artificial Reef nke Alabama ọ bụ ugbu a nke kachasị na United States
Ihe omume a bụ ngwaahịa nke nkwekọrịta nkwado n'etiti US Army Corps of Engineers na Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Mmiri mmiri
Malite na 1953, mmemme ahụ na-aga n'ihu na-agbasawanye na-enyere aka mee ka ụdị mmiri dị iche iche nke mmiri dị na Gulf sikwuo ike
Sistemu Parks steeti Alabama nwere ihe dịka 48,000 acres (190 km2) nke ala na mmiri na Alabama
Ihe omume ogige na ebe obibi gụnyere hotels na motels, tent na ebe a na-ama ụlọikwuu RV, ịkwọ ụgbọ mmiri, ịga njem, igwu mmiri, egwuregwu gọọlfụ ọkwa asọmpi, na ihe omume ndị ọzọ
Gburugburu ogige dị site na osimiri Gulf Coast ruo n'Ugwu Appalachian, nke na-egosipụta ụdị ọdịdị dị iche iche nke steeti ahụ
Isi akụkụ nke ọrụ ngalaba ahụ bụ agụmakwụkwọ

Ngalaba uwe ojii mmiri nke ngalaba ahụ, na mmekorita ya na ngalaba Alabama State Department of Education, Ngalaba Mmụta Ọkwọ ụgbọ ala, na-akụzi nkuzi ịkwọ ụgbọ mmiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha dịka iwu Alabama Boating Safety Reform Act chọrọ nke 1994
Iwu ahụ gbatịrị otu iwu ndị metụtara ịnya ụgbọ ala
ụgbọ ala ma ọ bụ ụgbọ ala ndị ọzọ na-akwọ ụgbọ mmiri
Na 2008 State Land Division mepere ebe 5 Rivers Delta Resource Center
Ebe agụmakwụkwọ nchekwa ahụ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka ebe ntụrụndụ n'èzí na Mobile-Tensaw River Delta na South Alabama
Na mgbakwunye na mmemme mmụta ịchụ nta na ịkwọ ụgbọ mmiri ngalaba anụ ọhịa na Freshwater Fisheries na-eduzi ọtụtụ mmemme izisa ozi dịka ịgba ụta n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na klaasị mmụta ịkụ azụ dị iche iche

Ndị ọkà mmụta ihe ọmụmụ ngalaba na-eduzi ọmụmụ sayensị dịgasị iche iche nke ụdị osisi na anụmanụ nke Alabama gụnyere nlekota nke anụ ọhịa na ụdị mmiri dị iche iche yana ọmụmụ ebe obibi nke ga-agwa omume nlekọta n'ọdịnihu
Ndị ọkà mmụta ihe ọmụmụ ngalaba na-enyekwa aka mgbe niile na magazin Alabama Outdoor

Na mgbakwunye na-ebipụta n'èzí Alabama, Ngalaba Ozi na Education ngalaba kwa afọ na-eduzi ọtụtụ ndị nkuzi nkuzi ogbako e mere iji nyere ndị nkụzi incorporate nchekwa na ihe onwunwe mmụta n'ime ọha akwụkwọ akwụkwọ ọmụmụ
Kemgbe e guzobere Ngalaba Nchekwa na ihe ndị sitere n'okike nke Alabama, ndị ọrụ 7 anwụọla na-arụ ọrụ

Ethnologue gụrụ ya na Tɔli dị ka olumba nke Gun, mana Capo (1988) weere ya otu n'ime asụsụ Phla–Pherá

Alaeze Igala, nke a makwaara dị ka Alaeze nke Idah, Anɛ-Ìgálá, bụ obodo ọdịda anyanwụ Afrika tutu ọchịchị ṅdi ọcha, na Middle Belt nke Nigeria
Ndị Igala tọrọ ntọala ala-eze ahụ, ndị 'Attah' nọ dika eze ha, nna obodo, na onye isi ime mmụọ, ha nwere isi obodo ha na Idah
Ọ bụ ezie na ndị Igala kwagara n'ala ndị ọzọ, e kwenyere na ọtụtụ, ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụghị ndị Igala nile biri ma ọ bụ si Idah, nke na-eje ozi dị ka isi obodo ime mmụọ nke Alaeze Igala
Ndị Yoruba, Idoma, Igbo na Jukun nwere mmetụta n'alaeze Igala, ma eleghị anya ha sitere na ụmụ otu ndị a bụ ndị biri na ngwakọta na ndị obodo Igala
Abo-Igala = ndị mmadụ
Omenala = ÌCHÒ/ÙCHÒLÒ Ichi Igala=Asụsụ Igala
Enwere ike nweta nkọwa nke okwu ahụ bụ 'Igala' n'onwe ya site na 'Iga' nke pụtara nkebi, mgbochi, mgbidi nkewa, na 'Ala' nke pụtara 'atụrụ'
Iga-ala wee bụrụ Igala
Ihe kpatara ụdị njirimara onwe onye a ka ndị ọkà mmụta na-arụrịta ụka ugbu a
Agbanyeghị, nke a, echiche a nwere ike na-akọwapụta na ụmụ amaala nke alaeze dị ka atụrụ, ebe steeti ha bụ mgbidi ma ọ bụ ihe nchebe na-echebe ha
Ifa bụ nkwenye odịnala ndị Igala nke ọtụtụ ndị ka kwenyere na ya
Usoro ofufe a gbadoro ụkwụ na nkwenye, na ịsọpụrụ mmụọ ndị nna ochie
Ọtụtụ obodo, ezinụlọ, na ndị mmadụ n’otu n’otu na-edobe ụlọ arụsị maka ofufe chi na ndị mmụọ
Ndị nlekọta na-eje ozi dị ka ndị na-ahụ maka ọgwụ, ma marakwa akụkọ ọdịnala n'ọnụ na iji mkpaakwụkwọ na osisi na-agwọ ọrịa

Okpukpe Protestant, Katọlik, Anglicanism, Baptizim, yana Methodism so n'ụdị Okpukpe Ụzọ Kraịst
Ụlọikpe Àtá ka a na-akpọ Ogbede ebe a na-akpọ onyeisi ya Ogbe ma ọ bụ onyeisi oche nke ụlọikpe
Ndị Amedibo bụ ndị ohu eze ebe ndị Amonoji bụ ndị ọnaozi Àtá
Akara nke ike bụ ihe ndị eze, gụnyere oka (beads), okwu (ihe onu), uwe mwuda (olawoni), okpu uhie (olumada), na otihi (flywhisk)
Ihe ndị ọzọ dị nsọ bụ Ejubejuailo (The Ata's pectoral Mask), Onunu-Ere (okpu eze), Unyiale Ata (nche anwụ eze), Odechi / Okakachi (ndị egwu eze), Oka kpai Okwu (royal beads) na Akpa-Ayegba (oche)
Àtá n'onwe ya bụ onye na-ahụ maka isi ihe dị nsọ, ụlọ nsọ na ememe nke ndị Igala
Ach'adu na-eje ozi dika onye isi ochichi

Ach'adu n'onwe ya pụtara praịm minista)
Ndị ọrụ mpaghara (onu) na ndị isi mpaghara (Am'onu) nọkwa dịka ndị isi nke ụlọ arụsị ha dị iche iche, oghere, ihe dị nsọ mmemme nakwa mpaghara nke ha
Ndị isi ahụ gụnyere ndị isi mpaghara (Am'onu-ane), ndị isi ezinụlọ (Gago), ndị isi obodo (Omadachi) na ndị isi ntorobịa (Achiokolobia)
N'ime ndị Igala, Ata na Achadu bụ aha naanị mmadụ abụọ na-ejide otu oge, ebe ọtụtụ mmadụ na-eji aha Onu, Achema, Akoji, Makoji, Eje, Onoja n'otu oge
Enwere ike iji aha ndị a dị ka aha mmadu

Ndị kansụl itoolu nke ọ bụla nwere onye isi (onu) bụ onye a họpụtara site na usoro okpukperechi nakwa site na usoro mgbagwoju anya nke omenala na usoro nke onye isi nke kansụl ahụ bu Attah Igala na Idah na-elekọta
Ndị kansụl Igala asaa bụ Ankpa, Ajaka, Ugwolawo, Egume, Dekina, Omalla, Olamaboro
Anyigba
N'akụkọ ihe mere eme, kansụl ọ bụla nwere ogo ọchịchị ọdịnala dị iche iche bụ nke gbadoro ụkwụ na ịnakọta ụtụ n'aka ndị ji ala, ndị ọkụ azụ̀ na ndị na-azu ahịa
' Àtá ' nke mbụ (ma ọ bụ ' Atah '), bu aha e nyere onye na-achị ala-eze bụ nwanyi aha ya bu Ebulajonu; onye nọchiri ya bu nwanne ya nwoke Aganapoje, nna Idoko

Idoko mesịrị nọchie ya dị ka Ata, wee mụọ ụmụ abụọ Atiyele na Ayegba om'Idoko (Ayegba nwa Idoko), Atiyele nwa mbụ nke Idoko kwagara n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke alaeze ahụ iji guzobe alaeze Ankpa ebe Ayegba nwa nke abụọ nke Idoko nọchiri nna ya dika Ata Igala

Ata ndi chịrị site na nnwere onwe Naijiria ruo taa
Alafia lucida bụ osisi dị na ezinụlọ Apocynaceae
Alafia lucida na-eto dị ka liana ruo mita ịrị anọ na ise (fit otu narị na iri ise) n'ogologo, na obosara nke ruru sentimita ịrị na asatọ
Okooko osisi ya na-esi ísì ụtọ nwere corolla na-acha odo odo ma ọ bụ na-acha creme, na-acha ọbara ọbara n'olu
Mkpụrụ osisi ahụ -acha nchara nchara na follicles cylindrical abụọ, nke ọ bụla ruru sentimita iri asaa na ise n'obosara
Alafia lucida bụ nwa amaala n'ógbè okpomọkụ Africa site na Liberia n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ ruo Tanzania
Ebe obibi ya bụ ọhịa, site na oke osimiri ruo mita pụkụ abụọ (fit pụkụ isii na narị isii) n'ịdị elu
Ojiji ọgwụ ọdịnala nke Alafia lucida gụnyere dị ka ọgwụgwọ maka jaundice, nsogbu anya na mkpesa afọ
A na-eji osisi ahụ eme ihe dị ka nsị akụ

Alaide Gualberta Beccari (amụrụ n'afọ 1842 na Padua ma nwụọ n'afọ 1906) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ụmụnwanyị n'Ịtali, onye na-akwado mba, onye na onye na-eme mgbanwe na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, onye bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ụmụ nwanyị Woman n'oge 1870s na 1880s
A mụrụ Alaide Beccari na Padua na 1842, naanị otu n'ime ụmụ 12 nke nne na nna ya dị ndụ ruo mgbe ọ toro
Nna Beccari bụ onye ọrụ gọọmentị na Padua, nke bụ akụkụ nke Alaeze Ukwu Austro-Hungarian n'oge ahụ
Nna Beccari bụ onye na-akwado ịdị n'otu nke Ịtali ma sonye na Risorgimento n'oge nnupụisi nke 1848
Mgbe nnupụisi ahụ dara, ọ gbagara Turin
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ nna ya ruo oge ụfọdụ, wee laghachi Padua mgbe ndị agha Lombardy-Venetia weghaara ya
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, Beccari bi na Venice, ebe ọ malitere akwụkwọ akụkọ Woman
A na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ Woman kwa izu abụọ
Akwụkwọ Beccari kwalitere ikike ụmụ nwanyị mgbe njikọta Ịtali gasịrị na 1861

Ọ bụ onye na-eme mgbanwe na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, mgbe mgbanwe omume na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-enweta nkwado a ma ama na Great Britain, France, United States, na ebe ndị ọzọ dị ka akụkụ nke nnukwu mgbanwe na narị afọ nke 19
Nwaanyị bụ olu ụmụnwanyị a na-adịghị ahụkebe na Ịtali n'oge 1870s na 1880s, na asụsụ nke oge ahụ, ọ kwadoro 'nnwere onwe ụmụnwanyị'

Beccari, dị ka ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị n'Ịtali nke ọgbọ ya (dị ka Erminia Fuà, Aurelia Cimino Folliero, Sara Nathan, Giovanna Garcea, na Adelaide Cairoli) jiri nnwere onwe ụmụnwanyị tụnyere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Ịtali, na-ezo aka na 'Risorgimento nwanyị'
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Woman nyere Anna Maria Mozzoni, onye lụrụ ọgụ iji gbanwee iwu Ịtali na-achịkwa ịgba akwụna iwu kwadoro
Mozzoni na Beccari kpọsara echiche nke 'nwa amaala' na 'nne hụrụ mba n'anya'
Nwanyị kwalite ihe kpatara Josephine Butler
A sụgharịrị ma bipụta isiokwu ndị e bipụtara na Woman na mba ofesi, na akwụkwọ akụkọ ụmụnwanyị nke England bụ Englishwoman's Review
N'afọ 1877, Nwanyị mere mkpesa, na-enweta mbinye aka 3000 iji kwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị na Ịtali
Beccari kwenyere na ụmụnwanyị nwere ike inye ihe na-eme ka 'agha' nke ụmụnwoke ghara ịdị mma
Ọ kwadoro ihe ndị na-eme udo, nwanyị na-enyekwa òtù ndị na-ahụ maka udo, dị ka ntọala nke International Association of Women (IAW) site na Marie Goegg na Geneva na 1870
Beccari dekwara ihe nkiri

O dere Un caso di divorzio (A Case of Divorce), nke emere na 1881, nke a katọrọ n'ileghachi anya azụ na ogo akwụkwọ ya dị ka 'mmetụta' na 'ihe a na-ahụ anya'; karịsịa, ọ dịghị alụmdi na nwunye maka 'nwunye' nke abụọ na ihe nkiri ahụ
Otú ọ dị, egwuregwu ahụ dị ịrịba ama maka edere ya ma mepụta ya

Ụmụnwanyị na-ede akwụkwọ na Ịtali dị ụkọ n'oge ahụ, ebe ọ bụ na ọtụtụ ụmụnwanyị amaghị akwụkwọ na Ịtal, ọ bụ naanị ụmụnwanyị ole na ole ndị ọzọ na-ede ma na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Ịtali n'oge a; Luisa Marenco-Martini-Bernardi, Irma Meladny Scodnik, na Amelia Rosselli bụ ụmụnwanyị ndị ọzọ na na-ede ihe nkiri n'oge ọ bụ Ịtali
Ikike ụmụnwanyị nwere ịtụ vootu bịara Ịtali naanị mgbe ọchịchị Fascist dara n'afọ 1945; ịgba alụkwaghịm ga-eme ka iwu kwadoro na Ịtali naanị n'afọ 1970
A manyere Beccari ịkwụsị nchịkọta akụkọ ya nke Woman n'afọ 1887 n'ihi ọrịa; Emilia Mariani weghaara dịka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Woman
Beccari gara n'ihu na-ede akwụkwọ, na-eguzobe magazin ụmụaka a na-akpọ Mamma
O nyere nkwado nye ụmụnwanyị ndị ọzọ na-ede akwụkwọ na-anwa ịmalite ọrụ ha
Beccari nwere nkụda mmụọ n'ihi enweghị nkwado a ma ama maka ihe ụmụnwanyị na Ịtali
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-akwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, nke mere ka ndị na-akwado ụmụnwanyị ghara ịkwado ya
Mgbawa tankị Alakija bụ mgbawa tankị nke mere na mpaghara Alakija nke Mile 2, mpaghara azụmahịa n'okporo ụzọ awara awara Badagry, Lagos State, Nigeria
A kọrọ na ihe omume ahụ mere na Disemba 1, 2010 mgbe tankị bu mmanụ ụgbọala na-enweghị ike ịchịkwa
Ihe dị n'ime tankị ahụ kwafuru n'okporo ụzọ na-eduga na mgbawa nke gburu ihe dị ka mmadụ ịrị abụọ ma nyé ndị ọzọ mmerụ ahụ dị ukwuu
Ụgbọala anọ, gụnyere ụgbọala abụọ jupụtara na ihe karịrị ndị njem ịrị abụọ na anọ na ụgbọala onwe abụọ, gbara ọkụ
Taiwo Abayomi, onye isi mpaghara nke Lagos State Traffic Management Authority kwupụtara ihe merenụ
Alan Stenhouse Gourley (ubochí irí na àtó n'ọnwa Eprel 1909 rụọ úbọchị itoolu n'ọnwa Septemba 1991) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nà South Africa-British nà ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ gàrà Glasgow School of Art n'afọ 1928 na Edinburgh College of Art n'etiti 1929 na 1931
Ọ kwagara South Africa ebe o mepụtara windo enyo maka katidral dị na Pretoria na Johannesburg ma kụzie na Johannesburg Technical College n'etiti afọ 1932 na 1937
Ọ kwagara Paris ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na École des Beaux-Arts n'etiti 1938 na 1940 ma bụrụ onye nkuzi na camouflage n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
A na-ahụ kapet nke o méré na South Africa House
Ọrụ ya bụ akụkụ nkè ihe osise nà asọmpi nka na 1936 Summer Olympics na-anọchite ányá South Africa
Alan Knott-Craig (amụrụ na 14 August 1977, Pretoria, South Africa) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye edemede South Africa
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Project Isizwe
A mụrụ Alan Knott-Craig (jnr) na 14 August 1977 na Pretoria, ebe ọ biri ruo mgbe ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ na 1995
Ọrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mbụ ya bụ n'ụlọ ebe nne ya, onye nkụzi ruru eru, na-elekọta ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara
Mgbe ọ dị afọ isii, ọ gara Glenstantia Primary School, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Glen High School, Pretoria na 1991
Nna ya, Alan Knott-Craig (Senior), bụ Senior General Manager nke Mobile Communications na Telkom SA, ma mesịa bụrụ CEO nke South African mobile networks, Vodacom (1996-2008) na Cell C (2012-2014)

N'afọ 1996, a nabatara Knott-Craig (jnr) maka BCom Accounting na Nelson Mandela Metropolitan University (nke bụbu University of Port Elizabeth)Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1998, ma gụchaa nzere ya, B Com Honours in Accounting, n'afọ 1999
O mere isiokwu ya na Deloitte Cape Town n'agbata afọ 2000 na 2002
Knott-Craig ruru eru dị ka Chartered Accountant (SA) na njedebe nke afọ 2002
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ New York City nke Deloitte USA maka obere oge
Ọ laghachiri Saụt Afrịka ma n'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2003 ọ tọrọ ntọala Cellfind, otu n'ime ndị mbụ na-ahụ maka ọrụ na South Afrịka ma jee ozi dị ka onye isi ụlọ ọrụ ruo afọ 2005
N'afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi oche nke iBurst ma wuo otu n'ime netwọk wireless broadband kachasị ukwuu na South Africa
Mgbe a mụsịrị nwa ya nwanyị mbụ, ọ hapụrụ iBurst na 2009 ịkwaga Stellenbosch
N'afọ 2010, ọ tọrọ ntọala ma bụrụ onye isi nke World of Avatar, ụlọ itinye ego maka ngwa maka Africa ma mesịa nweta ma bụrụ onye isi oche nke Mxit, nnukwu netwọk mmekọrịta Africa
Ọ hapụrụ Mxit na World of Avatar n'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2012 mgbe ya na ndị mmekọ ya nwere nghọtahie
N'afọ 2013, ọ tọrọ ntọala 'Project Isizwe, ụlọ ọrụ na-abaghị uru na-ahụ maka itinye netwọk Wi-Fi n'efu nke ọha na eze na South Africa
N'afọ 2014, ọ tọrọ ntọala Herotel, onye na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi wireless na South Africa,

N'agbata afọ 2003 na afọ 2013, ọ kwadoro ma / ma ọ bụ kwado ụlọ ọrụ iri na asaa na ngalaba Teknụzụ, Mgbasa Ozi na Nkwukọrịta na Africa, gụnyere Cellfind, Lucky Mobile, iFind34600, COLV, World of Avatar, Toodu, FSMS, Triloq, 6th Line, Daily Maverick, ARC Telecoms, Pondering Panda, MorMor Media, na Boomfm
Knott-Craig lụrụ Sibella Bosman n'afọ 2002
Ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị atọ ma biri na Stellenbosch, South Africa
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2008, o bipụtara Don't Panic, dabere na ozi-e o zigara ndị ọrụ ya iji mee ka ndị South Africa nọrọ na mba ahụ ma nye aka nke ọma
Akwụkwọ a ghọrọ akwụkwọ kachasị ere ahịa na South Africa maka afọ 2008
N'afọ 2019, o dere isiokwu na-esote
Nke a sochiri na 2012 site na Mobinomics Mxit na South Africa's Mobile Revolution nke ya na Gus Silber dere
N'ezie, Don't Panic na Moenie Stres nie a na-esote Don't Panic e bipụtara na 2014
N'afọ 2015, o so dee So, You Want To Be A Hero, nchịkọta edemede, ndụmọdụ na katọn ndị a na-elekwasị anya na ndị na-eto eto na-achọ ngwa ngwa ọrụ ha
Ọ na-ede blọọgụ kwa ụbọchị maka ndị ọchụnta ego na wwwbigalmanackcom
A kpọrọ Knott-Craig dị ka Onye Ndú Na-eto Eto nke Ụwa site na World Economic Forum na 2009
Forbes depụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime mmadụ iri na-eto eto nde Afrịka kachasị elu na-ekiri na 2013
E tinyekwara ya na “100 Choiseul Africa”, ndepụta nke otu narị ndị isi azụmahịa na-eto eto n'Afrịka n'afọ 2014
Alan Michael Sugar, Baron Sugar (amụrụ na 4 Machị 1947) bụ onye obodo Britain ji ego achu ego, onye mgbasa ozi, onye edemede, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ndụmọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'afọ 1968, ọ malitere ihe ga-emesị bụrụ nnukwu azụmaahịa ya, ụlọ ọrụ eletrọniki Amstrad
N'afọ 2007, ọ rere oke ya fọdụrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na nkwekọrịta na BSkyB maka £ 125M
Sugar bụ onyeisi oche na onye nwe Tottenham Hotspur site na 1991 ruo 2001, na-ere òkè ya fọdụrụ na klọb ahụ na 2007 nakwa, maka £ 25m
Ọ malitekwara ọrụ maka The Celebrity Apprentice Australia maka Australia's Nine Network na 2021
Dị ka akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi Sunday Times n'ahụ maka ndị nwere ego si nwe kwuo ,Mazi Sugar ghọrọ nnukwu ọgaranya nwere nde kwuru nde ego na 2015
N'afọ 2021, e mere atụmatụ na akụ na ụba ya dị £ otu nde na uma iri abụo na otu nke a mere ka ọ nọrọ na ọnọdụ onye nke otu naari na iri atọ na asato na ndị kacha baa ọgaranya na mba UK
A mụrụ Sugar na 24th Maachị 1947 na Hackney, East London, n'ezinụlọ ndị Juu
Nna ya, Nathan, bụ onye na-akwa ákwà na ụlọ ọrụ uwe nke East End
A mụrụ nne na nna ya ochie n'akụkụ nke nne ya na mba Russia, a mụrụ nna ya ochie n'akụkụ nna ya na mba Poland
A mụrụ nne nne ya n'akụkụ nna Sugar aha ya bụ Sarah Sugar, na mba London na ezi n'ụlọ nne na nna bu ndi Poland
Mgbe Sugar bụ obere nwa, ezi n'ụlọ ha biri n'ụlọ kansụl
N'ihi ntutu isi ya, nke juferu oké, a na-akpọ ya 'isi akwa eji ehicha ụlọ,' aha ka so kwa ya rue n'oge a

Ọ gara akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ nke a n'akpo Northwold Primary School na Brooke House Secondary School na Upper Clapton, Hackney, ma nweta kwuru ego site n'ịrụ ọrụ na ebe ana ere ọtụtụ ihe dị iche iche Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwa oge maka ọrụ gọọmentị dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ọnụ ọgụgụ na Ministry n'ahụ maka Agụmakwụkwọ
N'afọ 1968, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụo na otu Sugar ji otu naari pounds we guzobere ụlọ ọrụ a n'akpo Amstrad site n'ego o dokwaru ọfuma na ụlọ ọrụ ebe a na ezipu leta na ihe ndị ọzọ
Ọ malitere ire ngwa ọrụ redio maka ụgbọala na ihe eletrik ndị ọzọ site n'ime ụgbọ ala nke ọ zụrụ n'onu £ irí ise ma tinye ya n'aka ndị ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa n'onu £asato
O weputarụ aha ụlọ ọrụ ahụ site na na mkpụrụ edemede atọ mbụ bidoro aha ya na kwa mkpụrụ edemede anọ mbụ nke okwu ahia Alan Michael Sugar Trading
Ọ malitere dị ka onye na-atubata ngwá ahịa / onye na-ezipụ ngwa ahịa na onye na-ere ahịa n'ubara, ka ọ na-erule afọ 1970, okwaochala ihe nile gbasara ụlọ ọrụ ga na emepụta ihe ọhụrụ
O nwetara ọnụahịa emepụta dị ọnụ ala site na iji plastik ihe eji agba ọgwụ maka mkpuchi hi-fi turntable, mee ka ọnụ ahịa daa nke ukwu n'ebe ndị ọzọ ya na ha na asọmpi na-eji usoro mmepụta ikuku
E mere ka ikike mmepụta gbasaa iji tinye mmepụta nke ihe nakwalite ịnụ okwu na nke na eme ka uda ụzụ dakoo nke ọma
Alan Vaughan-Richards (1925–1989) bụ onye British-Nigerian na-ewu ụlọ nke na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ nke Nigeria
O tinyere ndị na-ewu ụlọ na mmetụta nwere ike inwe n'ụdị Afrịka na imewe ụlọ site na mbipụta nke akwụkwọ akụkọ West Africa Builder and Architect
Vaughan-Richards tinyere ọrụ ndị na-ese ihe na Naijiria n'ọtụtụ ọrụ ya
N'ịbụ onye a zụrụ azụ n'ihe owuwu nke oge a na England, ọ mụtakwara omenala nke ụlọ na Nigeria, ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya bụ ngwakọta nke mmetụta abụọ ahụ
Vaughan-Richards gụrụ akwụkwọ na London Polytechnic (nke bụzi University of Westminster) ebe ọ nwetara diplọma na ụlọ n'afọ 1950
O debanyere aha maka ọmụmụ ọhụrụ na Tropical Architecture na Architectural Association, London na 1956
Vaughan-Richards malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ ndị 1950 na-arụ ọrụ na Architect Development Board na Iraq ma mesịa Architect Co-Partnership na London
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ n'ichepụta ụlọ nkwari akụ Bristol na ụlọ maka ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ na gas na Lagos
N'ime ọrụ ahụ, Vaughan-Richards tinyere aka na nhazi mbụ ma dịka onye nlekọta saịtị gara Naịjirịa n'oge njem nke ọrụ ndị ahụ
Mgbe Architect Co-Partnership si na Naịjirịa pụọ, Vaughan-Richards nọrọ na mba ahụ wee bụrụ nwa amaala Naịjirịa
E ji ụlọ ya dị na Ikoyi dị nso na ọdọ mmiri Lagos na nke ụdị dị n'obodo Hausa metụtara ma mee ya n'ụdị ọgbara ọhụrụ dịka ụlọ ọrụ ya
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya gụnyere ụlọ ndị mmadụ na ụlọ ndị ọrụ maka Mahadum Lagos
O nwetara nkwanye ùgwù n'etiti ndị ahịa ya site na atụmatụ ya nke mmesapụ aka ma ọ bụ ohere ọha na eze na ụzọ sara mbara na ọrụ ya

Onye America na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ Elaine Neil Orr kọwara ụdị ụlọ Vaughan-Richards, na-ede na ọ 'na-etinye geometries curvilinear na atụmatụ ya, mgbe ụfọdụ dịka ihe ịchọ mma mana mgbe dịka ihe dị mkpa nke mgbidi na ụlọ
Atụmatụ modular bụ isi ihe ọ na-eme, na mbụ site na blọọgụ na mpempe ụlọ, wee site na nhazi osisi
Vaughan-Richards guzobere nakwa dezie West African Builder and Architect iji nye ozi gbasara ụlọ na Africa ma mesịa soro Kunle Akinsemoyin dee Building Lagos, akwụkwọ na-edekọ mmepe nke Lagos
Vaughan-Richards jikọtara ya na Felix Ibru's Roye Ibru and Co

Ọ bụ onye nlekọta nke ngalaba Osisentọala nke Mahadum Lagos ebe ọrụ ya gụnyere Jaja Hall, Mahadum nke Lagos, Mahadum nke Lagos master plan; atụmatụ ọgbara ọhụrụ na ụdị ebe okpomọkụ na West Africa dịka Olaoluwakitan House na Alan Vaughan-Richards house
E leghaara ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya anya maọbụ na-elekọta ya nke ọma
N'afọ ndị 1980, o tinyere aka n'ide ndepụta nke ụlọ ndị Brazil na Lagos maka iji otu nchekwa

N'afọ ndị 1950, ọrụ owuwu ọhụrụ e mere site n'ụdị ụkpụrụ ụlọ nke oge a nke Europe na-atụle ihu igwe Naịjirịa na nke Maxwell Fry na London zụrụ azụ ndị na-ewu ụlọ Naijiria duziri malitere ịpụta dịka ụdị kachasị na Lagos
Vaughan-Richards so na ndị na-ewu ụlọ nke oge a, mana ọ chọrọ nyocha ndị ọzọ site na ịnakweere ụdị Afrịka dị ugbu a, nka Afrịka na iji ihe ndị dịka osisi
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado itinye ụdị ọdịbendị Afrịka na ụdị ndụ ya n'ime ụlọ ọgbara ọhụrụ nke Naijiria, ọpụpụ nke ụdị orthodox na-apụta n'afọ ndị 1950 nke gụnyere mgbanwe na ọnọdụ ihu igwe na Afrịka
Ụlọ nke onwe ya wuru n'afọ 1960 bụ nnwale nke ụdị ụkpụrụ ụlọ ọdịnala nke West Africa na ụkpụrụ ụlọ nke oge a dị ka iji curvi-linear na circular geometries
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ dị ka Ola-oluwakitan House pụtara ìhè maka ịtụle ụdị Afrịka na mmalite, ma mesịa bụrụ ihe nlereanya maka ụlọ ndị ọzọ
Ọ lụrụ Ayo Vaughan-Richards (née Vaughan), onye nọọsụ bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ nkwari akụ si n'ezinụlọ Vaughan nke Lagos
Ha nwere ụmụ anọ gụnyere onye na-eme ihe nkiri Remi Vaughan-Richards
Alanna Fields (b1990) bụ America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-edebe ihe ichié nké bi na Brooklyn, New York
A mụrụ Fields ná Upper Marlboro, Maryland, nà 1990
O nwèrè BA na Literature na Mahadum Trinity Washington, ma gaa Pratt Institute, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mmemme Photography MFA na 2019
Fields na-eji ihe ncheta n'ọrụ ya iji chọpụta otú e si nọchite ányá ndị Black queer n'akụkọ ihe méré eme
Ọrụ ya na-eji foto, ederede na eserese, ma na-ejikarị wax eme ihe iji gosipụta ụzọ e si eme ka ahụ ndị Black na akụkọ ihe méré eme ghara ịdị
O gosipụtara na Museum of Contemporary African Diasporan Art, na mmemme Photoville nke Brooklyn
A na-edebe ọrụ ya na nchịkọta ọha na eze nke Prince George Azs African American Museum and Cultural Center
N'afọ 2021, New York Times Style Magazine nyèrè ya ọrụ ịmepụta ọrụ gbasara mmetụta nke ọrịa a na-efe efe na ọbụbụenyi
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na 2021-22 na Silver Art Projects na New York
Fields na-anọchite anya ụlọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ Assembly
N'afọ 2018, ọ natara Gordon Parks Scholar Award, ọ bụkwa ónyé na-ese ihe na 2020 Light Work Artist in Residence

Alasho bụ okpu ogologo nke ndị Hausa, nke a na-eyi n'isi na olu
Ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ogologo, agba na nha na nke Tuareg tagelmust, mana a na-ekpuchi ya n'ụzọ dị iche na usoro Tuareg, na-ahapụ akụkụ nke isi na ụfọdụ n'ime olu dị ala n'efu
Ndị ikom Songhai na-eyi ụdị turban yiri ya, nke a maara dị ka 'fatalaa' na Zarma
Otu oge na-ewu ewu n'obodo Hausa dị ka uwe ụmụ nwoke, taa ọ na-adị ndụ ma e jiri ya mee emume ma ọ bụ emume dị mkpa, emume emume ndị okenye, alụmdi na nwunye ma ọ bụ n'ichichi onye isi obodo
A na-arụ ákwà mkpuchi Alasho na Kano, wee ree ya ndị ahịa Tuareg na Songhay na ndị ahịa
Alaska bu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika
Alhassan Seydou Lancina (amụrụ ya na 9 Septemba 1993) bụ onye Niger na-egwu mmiri
O sonyere na mita iri ise nke ụmụ nwoke na 2020 Summer Olympics
Alastair Charles Lewis (Ally Lewis) bụ prọfesọ nke Atmospheric Chemistry na Mahadum York na National Centre for Atmospheric Science (NCAS)
Ọ bụ ónyé isi óche nke otu ndụmọdụ sayensị nke gọọmentị UK na-ahụ màkà mmetọ ikuku, Defra Air Quality Expert Group, kemgbe afọ 2019
Lewis ghọrọ Ónyé isi óche nke Ngalaba Ụgbọ njem Science Advisory Council in 2021
Ọ bụ ugbu a ónyé otu Environmental Sustainability Panel nke UK Civil Aviation Authority

Lewis gàrà Sir Joseph Williamson's Mathematical School, Rochester, wee mụọ kemịkalụ na Mahadum Leeds wee soro PhD na kemịkalị ikuku na nyocha nke Mike Pilling na Keith Bartle lekọtara, nke enyere n'afọ 1995

A maara ya màkà mmepe nke usoro kemịkalụ nyocha nke a na-etinye na nlekota mmetọ ikuku na nyocha kemịkalị ikuku, ọkachasị iji gas chromatography iji tụọ ihe ndị na-agbanwe agbanwe (VOCs) na ihe mejupụtara mmanụ dị ka gasoline na diesel
Ọ bụ ónyé mbụ jiri gas chromatography zuru oke (GCxGC) mee ihe iji guzobe mgbagwoju ányà nke ihe ndị na-eme ka ikuku dị n'ime obodo, rụzuru mgbè ọ na-eme nyocha na Mahadum RMIT, Australia
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkuzi na Mahadum Leeds, dị ka nhọpụta jikọrọ aka n'etiti ụlọ akwụkwọ Chemistry na Earth & Environment tupu ọ kwaga na Ngalaba Chemistry nke Mahadum York n'afọ 2003
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Wolfson Atmospheric Chemistry Laboratories na York
N'agbata afọ 2007 na afọ 2012, Lewis rụrụ ọrụ nwa ógè màkà Kansụl Nnyocha Gburugburu Ebe Obibi dị ka Ónyé ndu isiokwu ha màkà mmemme nyocha na teknụzụ ọhụrụ
N'agbata afọ 2008 na 2022 ọ bụ ónyé nduzi sayensị na National Centre for Atmospheric Science, na-ahụ màkà mmetọ ikuku na nyocha nke ikuku
Lewis ebipụtala ọtụtụ isiokwu nkọwa gbásárá sayensị na iwu mmetọ ikuku na UK, US na China
O gosikwara ọtụtụ ihe na TV na redio na-atụle ikuku ụgbọ ala na mmetọ ikuku n'ime ụlọ
A kpọtụrụ ya aha n'ọtụtụ ébé dị ka ónyé na-enwe obi abụọ banyéré uru nke teknụzụ iwepụ mmetọ ikuku dị ka ụlọ elu anwụrụ ọkụ na usoro nzacha n'akụkụ ụzọ, yana nkwado sara mbara nke nzacha ikuku
Ọ bụ ónyé a ma ama na-akatọ ụkpụrụ ndị na-akwado hydrogen màkà okpomọkụ ụlọ, na-eme ka mmetụta ọjọọ nke ikuku nke NOx na oke mmetọ na mpaghara ndị dara ogbenye pụta ìhè
Ya na Peter Edwards na York rụkọtara ọrụ iji nyochaa teknụzụ mmetụta ikuku dị ala na David Carslaw na diesel engine NOx emissions
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ ónyé na-emepụta kemịkal, a kpọrọ áhà ya na ndepụta afọ 2015 nke ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị nyocha otu narị kachasị emetụta n'ụwa
Ụlọ ọrụ Science History Institute dere ọrụ nyocha ya n'afọ 2011, akụkụ nke usoro ajụjụ ọnụ ya na ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị ikuku

E nyèrè Lewis Desty Memorial Prize na sayensị nkewa na Royal Institution n'afọ 2001, Philip Leverhulme Prize na 'Earth Ocean and Atmospheric Sciences' na 2004, SAC Silver Medal n'afọ 2007 site na Royal Society of Chemistry, na John Jeyes Award màkà gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi, ike na nkwado na 2012
E nyèrè ya ihe nrite Lord Lewis nke 2022 màkà ònyìnyé dị mkpa màkà mmepe nke iwu sayensị

Albert Henri Bourderon (26 Nọvemba 1858 - 2 Eprel 1930) bụ onye France na-eme cooper (barrel maker) na syndicalist onye ghọrọ onye isi socialist
N'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, ọ kwadoro ọnọdụ udo n'ụzọ kwekọrọ na ụkpụrụ mba ụwa
A mụrụ Albert Bourderon n'ubochi 26 n'afọ Nọvemba 1858 na Corbeilles-en-Gâtinais, Loiret
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-arụ ọrụ (barrel maker) site n'ọrụ
N'afọ 1890, ọ ghọrọ onye na'azụ ndị otu ọrụ Jean Allemane
N'afọ 1903, o guzobere ndị otu ndị na-arụkọ ọrụ (Fédération du Tonneau)
Ọ ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ nke ndị otu ahụ
N'afọ 1905, ọ sonyere na nzukọ ebe a mụrụ òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị (Section Française de l'Internationale Ouvrière, SFIO)
Ọ ghọpụtara onye otu kọm nke General Confederation of Labour (Confédération du travail, CGT) ma ọ bụ ndị ọzọ

N'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1915, e gosipụtara mkpebi na-ahụ maka udo na nnọkọ mba CGT na mbido Bourderon na Alphonse Merrheim, nke ọtụtụ ndị agha nke njikọ ndị nkuzi gụnyere Louis Bouët, Fernand Loriot, Louis Lafosse, Marie Guillot, Marie Mayoux, Marthe Bigot na Hélène Brion bịanyere aka
Mkpebi ahụ kwuru na 'agha a abụghị agha anyị' ma nye ndị isi nke mba ndị na-alụ ọgụ ọrụ
Mkpebi ahụ katọrọ njikọ dị nsọ ma kpọọ maka iweghachi nnwere onwe
E nwere nzukọ ahụ na Zimmerwald na Switzerland site na 5 na 8 Septemba n'afọ 1915, nke pati ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Ịtali haziri, nke megidere agha ahụ
Merrheim na Bourderon, ndị odeakwụkwọ nke njikọ dị n'ime CGT, nọchitere anya ndị na-eme udo na France

Nzukọ ahụ bipụtara arịrịọ, nke Trotsky na onye na-akwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na Switzerland bụ Robert Grimm dere, nke kpọrọ oku ka e weghachite udo n'etiti ndị mmadụ, na-akpọ ndị ọrụ Europe ka ha lụọ ọgụ maka udo na-enweghị njikọ ma ọ bụ nkwụghachi ụgwọ
Ha kwesịrị ịlụ ọgụ maka nnwere onwe, maka fraternity nke ndị mmadụ, maka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Bourderon na Merrheim haziri maka 10,000 nke akwụkwọ nta banyere nzukọ ahụ nke Federation of metalworkers ga-ebipụta
Kọmitii International Action (Comité d'action internationale, CAI) bụ nke ndị otu France guzobere n'ọnwa Disemba 1915 bụ ndị kwadoro nkwupụta pacifist nke Nzukọ Zimmerwald
N'afọ 1916, e jikọtara nke a na Kọmitii Socialist Minority iji guzobe Kọmitii maka Nweghachi nke Mmekọrịta Mba Nile (Comité pour la réprise des rélations internationales, CRRI)
Ọ bụ Bourderon duziri ya na-anọchite anya ndị Socialist na Merrheim maka ndị syndicalists
Bourderon tụrụ aro nkwupụta nke Louise Saumoneau kwadoro nke kwuru na Kọm ọrụ ahụ ga-arụ ọrụ 'ruo mgbe ọtụtụ ndị otu na International Socialist Bureau maliteghachiri mmekọrịta mba ụwa
Ndị Switzerland haziri nzukọ mba ụwa ọhụrụ na Kienthal maka ngwụcha Eprel n'afọ 1916
A tụrụ anya na Merrheim, Bourderon na Marie Mayoux nke ndị nkuzi na-anọchite anya France, mana a jụrụ ha paspọtụ ha chọrọ iji gaa njem
Ndị nnọchiteanya atọ sitere na SFIO nke Alexandre Blanc duziri nwere ike ịga, ebe ọ bụ na ha bụ ndị nnọchiteanya ma nwee nnwere onwe ndị omeiwu
N'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1916, na nnọkọ nke abụọ nke CGT na Paris, Bourderon na Jean Raffin-Dugens na ndị Zimmerwaldians kewara
Ha na ndị SFIO ole na ole vootu iji kwado onyinye onye isi ala US Woodrow Wilson maka ime udo

Na Febụwarị 1917, CRRI kewara, na Pierre Brizon, Raffin-Dugens na Bourderon sonyeere ndị SFIO ka Jean Longuet duziri, ebe ndị Socialist Fernand Loriot, Charles Rappoport, Louise Saumoneau na François Mayoux weghaara kọmitii ahụ
After World War I Bourderon evolved towards reformismÀtụ Sfn
Albert Bourderon died in Paris on 2 April 1930 aged 71Àtụ Sfn
