Alexa Irene Canady (amuru na Nọvemba 7, afo 1950) bu onye dibia bekee lara ezumike nka nke ama ama n'ihe gbasara akwara ozi umuaka
Amụrụ ya na Lansing, Michigan wee nweta akara ugo mmụta bachelor na ahụike na Mahadum Michigan
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Minnesota na afo 1981, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị ojii mbụ ghọrọ dọkịta na-awa ahụ
Nke a bịara mgbe Ruth Kerr Jakoby ghọrọ nwanyị America mbụ nwetara asambodo na neurosurgery na afo 1961
Canady bụ ọkachamara n'ịgwọ ọrịa akwara ụmụaka ma bụrụ onye isi nke neurosurgery n'ụlọ ọgwụ ụmụaka dị na Michigan site na afo 1987 ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na afo 2001
Na mgbakwunye na ịwa ahụ, ọ mekwara nyocha ma bụrụ onye prọfesọ nke neurosurgery na Mahadum Wayne State
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, ọ kwagara Florida wee nọgide na-eme ihe nwa oge na Pensacola's Sacred Heart Hospital ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká zuru oke na Jenụwarị afo 2012
Na afo 1989, a kpọbatara Canady n'ime Ụlọ Nzukọ Ndị Nwanyị Michigan, na na afo 1993 ọ natakwara ihe nrite onye isi oche nke American Medical Women's Association
A maara Dr
Canady n'etiti ndị ọgbọ ya dị ka dọkịta na-awa ahụ nke na-elekwasị anya nke ọma maka onye ọ bụla n'ime ndị ọrịa ya
A mụrụ Alexa Irene Canady na Lansing, Michigan nye Elizabeth Hortense (Golden) Canady na Dr
Clinton Canady, Jr
Nne ya bụ onye nkuzi na onye bụbu onye isi ala nke Delta Sigma Theta Sorority, Inc
Ọ nọrọkwa ọtụtụ afọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ihe gbasara obodo n'ime obodo Lansing
Na mgbakwunye na ọ bụ onye mbụ Afrịka America ka a họpụtara na Board of Education Lansing
Nna ya bụ dọkịta ezé
Nne na nna ya gara Mahadum Fisk, ebe ha zutere ma mesịa lụọ di na nwunye na ụbọchị ọmụmụ nne ya nke 19 tupu nna ya ebuga ya n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Nna ya bụkwa onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Dentistry nke Meharry Medical College
Nne na nna Canady kụziiri ya mkpa agụmakwụkwọ na ịrụsi ọrụ ike dị mgbe ọ bụ nwata, nke ga-emecha nyere ya aka ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na nsọpụrụ
A zụlitere Canady na nwanne ya nwoke nke obere na mpụga Lansing ma bụrụ naanị ụmụ akwụkwọ America-America abụọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ha
Nne ya n'ịbụ onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Delta Sigma Theta na nna ya bụ dọkịta eze, a kụziiri ya mkpa agụmakwụkwọ dị site na nwata
Nne ya gwara ya otu oge, 'Ka ha mee gị akara - yabụ gịnị ma ọ bụrụ na ị bụ nwa agbọghọ ojii

Were akara ahụ ma mefuo ya' O nwere ajọ mbunobi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ; n'otu oge, onye òtù ezinụlọ nke na-azụ na akparamaagwa nwalere ya mgbe ọ ka dị obere maka ọgụgụ isi, na mgbe ọ nwetara akara dị elu na ule, ọ tụrụ ezinụlọ ya n'anya n'ihi na ọrụ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ bụ nanị nkezi
Ha mechara chọpụta na onye nkuzi ya na nwa akwụkwọ ọcha na-agbanwe akara ule ya iji kpuchie ọgụgụ isi ya
O chere ọtụtụ ihe mgbochi ihu n'oge agụmakwụkwọ ya
Agbanyeghị, n'agbanyeghị ihe mgbochi ndị a, Canady pụtara ìhè n'etiti ndị ọgbọ ya n'agụmakwụkwọ, ma na klaasị ma site n'inweta akara dị elu na ule ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nsọpụrụ na Lansing Sexton High School na afo 1967
Tupu mahadum, Alexa Canady bụ onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ Ọkachamara Mmeri Mba na afo 1967
Canady gara Mahadum Michigan ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta BS na zoology na afo 1971 wee bụrụ onye otu Delta Sigma Theta
Oge ya na Mahadum Michigan enweghị mgba; ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ kwụsị ịga mahadum n'otu oge n'ihi 'nhụsianya nke obi ike'
Na mbụ ọ họrọla ịbụ isi na mgbakọ na mwepụ mana n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ chọpụtara na mgbakọ na mwepụ abụghị mmasị ya
Mgbe ahụ, ọ mụtara banyere mmemme ọrụ ahụike pere mpe na mahadum ya wee kpebie ịchụso ya
Ihe omume a nyeere ya aka ịghọta na mmasị ya dị na ngalaba ahụike
Ọ ga-aga n'ihu na-anata MD ya na cum laude honors site na Mahadum Michigan Medical School na afo 1975 ebe ọ sonyere na Alpha Omega Alpha Honorary Medical Society
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike ndị otu American Medical Women's Association matara ya
N'agbanyeghị ihe ndị ọ rụzuru n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike, Canady chere na ọ bụ ya na ụmụ akwụkwọ nwanyị ndị ọzọ, ndị ọkachamara na-elegharakarị ya anya
Nke a gbara ya ume ịrụsi ọrụ ike karị
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ nwere mmasị na mbụ na nkà mmụta ọgwụ n'ime, Dr
Canady kpebiri na neurosurgery mgbe ọ hụrụ n'anya na akwara ozi n'ime afọ abụọ mbụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike
O kpebiri na ọpụrụiche a megide ndụmọdụ nke ndị ndụmọdụ ya

N'ịmara na ịnweta ebe obibi dị ka nwa akwụkwọ ojii ga-esi ike, Canady malitere ịmepụta akwụkwọ edemede ya, na-agụ ọtụtụ isiokwu na ịga nzukọ na nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe ọ bụla ọ nwere ike, mgbe ụfọdụ na-ajụ ajụjụ nanị ka a mara ya n'obere ubi
Ekele ya maka ịdị omimi nke ọdịdị ahụ mmadụ ga-enyere ya aka nke ọma na mpaghara asọmpi ya
Ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi ịwa ahụ na ụlọ ọgwụ Yale-New Haven site na afo 1975–1976, na-atụgharị n'okpuru Dr
William F
Collins
N'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ pụrụ iche, ọ ka nwere ajọ mbunobi na okwu ịkpa ókè n'ihi na ọ bụ onye isi ojii na nwanyị mbụ na mmemme ahụ
N'ụbọchị mbụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi, a gwara ya na 'ị ga-abụrịrị ngwugwu ohere ọhụrụ anyị'
N'agbanyeghị ajọ mbunobi ndị a, ndị dibịa ibe ya họpụtara ya ịbụ otu n'ime ndị kacha bi ebe ahụ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ọrụ ya, ọ gara Mahadum Minnesota maka ebe obibi ya, bụrụ nwanyị mbụ African-American neurosurgery bi na United States

Ọ bụ ezie na o kwupụtala na ya etinyeghị uche na akụkọ ihe mere eme ọ na-eme, mgbe ọ kwagara Pensacola, Florida na afo 2001, ọ ghọtara mkpa ihe ọ rụzuru na ihe ọ pụtara maka ndị Africa-America na ndị inyom ndị ọzọ na nkà mmụta ọgwụ
Na afo 1982, mgbe ọ gụchara obibi, Dr
Canady kpebiri ọkachamara dị ka dọkịta na-awa ahụ na-ahụ maka ụmụaka, na-aghọ onye mbụ African-American na nwanyị mbụ mere otú ahụ
Ọ họọrọ ọgwụgwọ ụmụaka n'ihi ịhụnanya o nwere n'ebe ụmụaka nọ na ngalaba ụmụaka nọ n'oge obibi ya na-ekwu na 'ọ dịghị mgbe ọ kwụsịrị iju m anya otú ụmụaka ahụ si enwe obi ụtọ'
Dị ka dọkịta na-awa ahụ nke lekwasịrị anya n'ọrịa, amaara ya na ya na ndị ọrịa ụmụaka ya na-egwu egwuregwu vidiyo ma na-emekọrịta ihe na onye ọrịa ọ bụla
Ọ malitere ime nwa obere oge na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Henry Ford tupu ya arụ ọrụ na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Ụmụaka nke Michigan
Mgbe ahụ ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ onye Africa-America ka ọ bụrụ Neurosurgeon kwadoro bọọdụ na afo 1984
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi nke Neurosurgery na Hospitallọ Ọgwụ ụmụaka nke Michigan na afo 1987 wee jide ọnọdụ ahụ ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nka na afo 2001
N'oge ya dị ka Chief, ọ pụrụ iche na congenital spinal abnormalities, hydrocephalus, trauma na ụbụrụ etuto
O mere nyocha wee bipụta otu akụkọ gbasara ịdị irè nke ọgwụgwọ maka hydrocephalus nke dị na afo 2001
Ọ bụ ezie na ná mmalite ọ nọ na-echegbu onwe ya banyere otú ndị ọgbọ ya ga-esi nabata ya, ọ bịara nwee mmasị ngwa ngwa maka ịbụ dọkịta na-awa ndị ọrịa lekwasịrị anya
N'ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara na nso nso a, o kwuru, 'Ọ na-atọ ụtọ ime ka ndị mmadụ ka mma'
N'ime afọ ya na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Ụmụaka nke Michigan, Dr
Canady gara n'ihu na-eme nnyocha na Wayne State University
Ọ jere ozi dịka Prọfesọ nke Neurosurgery ebe ahụ
Ọrụ ya na ihe ndị ọ rụzuru emeghewo ụzọ maka ọtụtụ ndị dọkịta na-awa ahụ nke agbụrụ na okike niile
Site na afo 2001 ruo ezumike nka ya na afo 2012, Dr
Canady rụrụ ọrụ dị ka dọkịta na-awa nwa oge na onye ndụmọdụ na Sacred Heart Hospital na Pensacola, Fl
Mgbe ọ kwagara Pensacola, Dr
Canady na mbụ chere na ya lara ezumike nká
Otú ọ dị, mgbe o zutere ndị dọkịta obodo ma ghọta na ọ dị mkpa maka dọkịta na-awa ahụ na-ahụ maka ụmụaka na mpaghara ahụ, Dr
Canady kpebiri ịbanye na ndị ọrụ na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Sacred Heart, na-arụ ọrụ nwa oge
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya dị ka dọkịta na-awa ahụ, Dr
Canady nọgidere na-eme nnyocha na Wayne State University
Nchọpụta a ga-emecha mee ka e nwee mmepụta nke antisiphon shunt nke na-enyere aka ịgwọ hydrocephalus

N'ajụjụ ọnụ a na-adịbeghị anya na ihe mere o ji eche na ụmụ akwụkwọ kwesịrị ịhọrọ neurosurgery ọ na-ekwu, 'Ọ bụ ihe ịma aka ọgụgụ isi, ị ga-enweta ụdị dị elu mgbe onye ọ bụla na-ekwu 'ah, neurosurgeon nọ ebe a
Canady na-aga n'ihu na-abụ ma onye na-akwado ọrụ ya yana ụdị dị iche iche na nkà mmụta ọgwụ
Ewebatara Canady n'ime Ụlọ Nzukọ Ndị Nwanyị Michigan na afo 1989

Canady nwetara ihe nrite onye isi oche nke American Medical Women's Association na afo 1993 na na afo 1994 enwetara onyinye onyinye Distinguished Service site na ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike Mahadum Wayne State
Na afo 1984, a kpọrọ ya onye nkuzi nke afọ site na ụlọ ọgwụ ụmụaka nke Michigan
Ọ natara onyinye nturu ugo Candace site na National Coalition of 100 Black Women na afo 1986
Ọ bụ onye otu Congress of Neurological Surgeons, American Association of Neurological Surgen, Society of Pediatric Neurosurgery, na American College of Neurosurgery

Enyekwara ya nzere nsọpụrụ atọ - dọkịta nke akwụkwọ ozi mmadụ sitere na Mahadum Detroit-Mercy na afo 1997 na Mahadum Roosevelt na afo 2014, yana dọkịta sayensị sitere na Mahadum Southern Connecticut na afo 1999
E gosikwara Canady na Nickelodeon Black History Month mkpụmkpụ animation nke ewepụtara na February afo 2015 iji mee mmemme ọ rụpụtara nke ịbụ nwanyị America mbụ nke Africa ghọrọ dọkịta na-awa ahụ
Canady ekwuola na ọ naghị amasị ya ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama
Kama, o kwuru na ọ bụrụ na ị na-arụ ọrụ ọma, ndị ọzọ adịghị mkpa
Alexa bu website na akwa ndi mmadu otu site ha eme na uwa ma obu n' obodo ha
Obu Amazon nwe Alexa
Alexander Bathgate (4 August 1845 9 September 1930) bụ onye ọka iwu New Zealand, onye nduzi ụlọ ọrụ, onye edemede na onye na-echekwa ihe
A mụrụ ya na Peebles, Peeblesshire, Scotland na 4 August 1845
Ọ bụ nwa John Bathgate
Mgbe Alexander dị afọ 18, ma na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Edinburgh, ọ gara Dunedin na nne na nna ya, ụmụnne ya nwoke na ụmụnne ya nwanyị
A nabatara ya dị ka onye ọka iwu na onye ọka iwu na 1872
N'afọ 1909 ọ lara ezumike nká
Alexander D'Arcy (Arabic; 10 August 1908 - 20 April 1996) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn na n'elu nkwago na mba ụwa

A mụrụ Alexander Sarruf na Cairo, Egypt, D'Arcy, nke a na-akpọ Alexandre D'Arce, Alex D'Arcia, Alexandre Darcy na Alex d'Arcy pụtara na ihe nkiri 45, ọtụtụ n'ime ha dịka onye dị nro ma ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nro
Ọ gara France, mee ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, wee gaa America
N'afọ 1936, edepụtara dịka Joseph Alexandre Fabre - onye na-ese ihe, dị afọ 27, agbụrụ French, mba Ijipt - ọ banyere ụgbọ mmiri gaa New York dịka onye njem klas mbụ na S / S Ile de France
O mechara hapụ New York gaa Hollywood ebe ọ malitere site n'ịrụ ọrụ nkwado n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na ngwụcha afọ 1930, gụnyere The Prisoner of Zenda (1937) Stolen Holiday (1937), The Awful Truth (1937)
N'afọ 1953, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-achọ Marilyn Monroe na How to Marry a Millionaire ma gosipụta ya na Abdulla the Great na Soldier of Fortune n'afọ 1955

Ọrụ ya belatara n'ịdị mkpa, ma site na afọ 1960, ọ na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn ma pụta ọzọ na ihe nkiri egwu, ọkachasị It's Hot in Paradise (1962) na dịka Dracula na Blood of Dracula's Castle (1969)
O doro anya na ọkacha mmasị nke ndị nduzi ofufe dịka Roger Corman, Russ Meyer na Sam Fuller, a hụrụ D'Arcy na Corman's The St
Valentine's Day Massacre (1967), Meyer's The Seven Minutes (1971) na Fuller's Dead Pigeon on Beethoven Street (1972 ma ọ bụ 1974 TV movie)
N'oge ndụ ya niile, DāArcy kewara oge ya n'etiti ụlọ ya na United States na Europe
Na mgbakwunye na ime ihe nkiri, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-ere nri na Berlin
A nabatara ya dịka nwa amaala United States na Los Angeles n'ọnwa Mee 1942
N'arịrịọ ya maka ịbụ nwa amaala, o kwuru na mgbe ọ ghọrọ nwa amaala ọ chọrọ ka a gbanwee aha ya n'ụzọ iwu site na Joseph Alexandre Fabre gaa na Alexander d'Arcy
Dāssy lụrụ nwanyị ugboro abụọ, nke mbụ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Arleen Whelan na mgbe ahụ, n'afọ 1964, onye na-ese ihe nkiri Yutta Darcy
Ha nwere nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Susannah d'Arcy ma gbaa alụkwaghịm na 1973
Dāarcy nwụrụ n'abalị 20 ọnwa Eprel afọ 1996 n'ụlọ ya na West Hollywood, California mgbe ọ dị afọ 87
Alexander Langer (22 Febụwarị 1946 3 Julaị 1995) bụ onye nta akụkọ Ịtali, onye na-ahụ maka udo, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye ntụgharị, na onye nkuzi

A mụrụ ya na ụbọchị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1946 na Sterzing, South Tyrol, mpaghara nke Ịtali nke ndị na-asụ German bi, ọ malitere itinye aka na nsogbu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mpaghara, nke n'oge ahụ na-elekwasị anya na mmekọrịta agbụrụ na mpaghara ahụ, nke mgbe agha ụwa abụọ na iri afọ nke esemokwu na iyi ọha egwu gasịrị
Na mbido afọ 1970 ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Lotta Continua, otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị aka ekpe na Ịtali
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ sonyeere Green Party nke South Tyrol, wee bụrụ onye otu kansụl mpaghara maka Trentino-Alto Adige / Sudtirol na 1978
Ọ na-eguzogide ókèala agbụrụ, ọ jụrụ ugboro abụọ ikwupụta agbụrụ ya n'oge ọnụ ọgụgụ 1981 na 1991 na Bolzano
(Nke a bụ nhọrọ iwu na mpaghara ahụ, iji chebe ọnọdụ agbụrụNhọrọ a mere ka ọ ghara iru eru ịzọ ọkwa maka ntuli aka ime obodo

N'ime afọ ndị 1980 ọ rịgooro n'ọkwa nke Green Party, nke mbụ na ọkwa mba, wee gaa Europe, mesịa bụrụ onye otu European Parliament na onye isi oche nke Greens / EFA Group na European Parliament na 1989

O mechara tinye aka nke ukwuu na atụmatụ udo na Europe na Middle East, yana ịkwalite mkparịta ụka n'etiti ndị ọzọ aka ekpe, ndị Radicals, Ndị Kraịst aka ekpe na ndị ọzọ na-akwado udo, ndị na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dịpụrụ adịpụ na Europe

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya European Parliament na Israel, Russia, Brazil, Argentina, Libya, Egypt, Cyprus, Malta, ma tinye aka na mkpọsa maka udo na Yugoslavia mbụ, n'oge agha agbụrụ nke afọ 1990

Na ụbọchị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa June n'afọ 1995, Langer sonyere na ngagharị iwe na Cannes megide inertia Europe n'ihu agha na Balkans ma n'otu ụbọchị ahụ o dere edemede ọhụrụ ya, kwa na Bosnia, nke akpọrọ Europe dies or is reborn in Sarajevo

N'ịbụ onye ihe nkiri nke agha ahụ wụrụ akpata oyi n'ahụ, na-arịa ụkwara ume ọkụ na ịda mbà n'obi, na 3 Julaị 1995 Langer gburu onwe ya na Pian dei Giullari, nso Florence, site n'ịkwụgbu onwe ya n'osisi apricot; ọ hapụrụ ndị ezinụlọ ya na ndị enyi ya ihe odide atọ, otu n'ime ha edere na German nye ndị enyi ya, na-akọwa mmegharị ahụ ma na-ehota otu ahịrịokwu sitere na Oziọma Matiu
Malite na 1997, Alexander Langer Foundation enyewo onyinye kwa afọ nye onye na-eme ihe iji sọpụrụ Langer
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2012, ihe nrite ahụ na-ebu 10,000-euro honorarium
Alexandra Lilian Amelia Abrahams (amụrụ na 13 Julaị na afọ 1986) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu National Assembly kemgbe Mee, na afọ 2019
A họpụtara ya dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka mmepe ọha na eze na Disemba, na afọ 2020
Abrahams bụ onye otu Democratic Alliance
Abrahams nwetara akara ugo mmụta na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Stellenbosch O nwekwara akara ugo mmụta na mmekọrịta mba ụwa
Abrahams sonyeere Democratic Alliance na afọ 2009, mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye na-enyere onye njikwa mkpọsa mpaghara nke pati ahụ aka maka ntuli aka nke afọ ahụ
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọ chọtara ọrụ na Ngalaba Mmepe Ọha nke mpaghara
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ngalaba ahụ ruo na Mee afọ 2019
Abrahams nọ n'ọnọdụ nke atọ na ndepụta mpaghara nke DA maka ntuli aka n'ozuzu na 8 Mee,na afọ 2019
N'ihi arụmọrụ ntuli aka nke DA, a họpụtara Abrahams
A ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka onye otu National Assembly na 22 Mee, na afọ 2019
Ka ọ na-erule 27 Juun, na afọ 2019, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya Kọmitii Portfolio na Social Development
N'ọnwa Disemba, na afọ 2020, onye isi ndị omeiwu DA, John Steenhuisen, họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche ya dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka mmepe ọha na eze
Alexandra Amon, a mụrụ n'abalị 27 ọnwa Julaị afọ 1981 na Neuilly-sur-Seine, France bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ede edemede, onye na'emepụta ihe, onye ọchụnta ego na onye ọrụ ebere
N'ihe nketa Ivorian, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na United States tupu ọ laghachi na Côte d'Ivoire iji guzobe ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ya ma sonyere ezinụlọ ya
N'afọ 2006, ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na mgbasa ozi site na Pratt Institute
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkuzi maka onye America a ma ama na-ese foto na onye nduzi David LaChapelle
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta onwe ha dị iche iche mba United States ma rụọ ọrụ na 3A Télésud

N'ihe dịka n'afọ 2008, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya ma mechaa ọrụ nkuzi na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta dị iche iche na maka netwọk telivishọn dị iche iche dị na United States, ọ hapụrụ New York City wee kwaga Abidjan
N'afọ 2012, mgbe afọ abụọ dịka onye nduzi nka nke Agence McCann na Abidjan, Amon guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke ya, ZIV
Afọ ise ka e mesịrị, n'afọ 2017, ọ bụ onye mmeri na Fespaco
Ọrụ ya lekwasịrị anya n'ọtụtụ mmepụta asụsụ French a ga-agbasa na Europe, n'Africa na ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn mba ụwa dị ka Canal+, BET France, na TV5 Monde

Alexandra Takounda Engolo (amụrụ n'abalị̀ asaa nke onwa Julaị afọ 2000), nke a maara dị ka Alexandra Takounda, bụ onye Cameroon na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dị onye n'aha ịhụ maka onyinye goolu nye otu Djurgårdens na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Cameroon

Takounda nọchitere anya Cameroon na ọgbụgba bọọlụ nke 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup na FIFA World Cup France nke afọ 2019 ebe ọ gbara egwuregwu mbụ ya na nweta mmeri n'onyinye goolu abụọ na asataghị̀ ma otu na mba New Zealand
Alexandre Roubtzoff (24 Jenụwarị 1884, St
Petersburg - 26 Nọvemba 1949, Tunis) bụ onye France na-ese ihe a mụrụ na Russia bụ onye ọkachamara na ihe nkiri ndị Ọwụwa Anyanwụ
Ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya toro eto nọrọ na Tunisia
Nne ya, Evgenia, alụghị di
N'afọ 1897, site na iwu, e nyere ya ohere iwere aha nna nne ya na aha nna nna ya
Ọ bụ nne mmiri Chukwu ya, Ekaterina, na di ya, onye Poland na-ese ihe Jan Ciągliński zụlitere ya

Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ nka ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na-ese ihe ebe nne mmiri Chukwu ya na-akụzi, mgbe ahụ ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ nke Dmitry Kardovsky na Ciągliński, na Imperial Academy of Arts, ebe enyere ya ngụkọta nke nnukwu ihe nrite isii
N'ime afọ 1900, ya na ndị mụrụ ya mere njem nke ukwuu, na-eleta Warsaw, Vienna, Venice, Munich na Paris
N'afọ 1907, ọ nọrọ na Paris ruo ogologo oge wee bụrụ onye nleta oge niile na ụlọ ọrụ Odilon Redon
Dị ka onye nwere ohere agụmakwụkwọ n'efu site na Academy, ọ gara Germany, France na Spain wee chọpụta North Africa; rutere Tangier na 1913
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ gara Tunis ma, mgbe agụmakwụkwọ ya gwụsịrị, o kpebiri ibi ebe ahụ kpamkpam; wee ghọọ nwa amaala France na 1924
Ọ gara Institut de Carthage ma nweta ihe ọ na-eri dị ka onye na-ese foto maka ndị otu ndị France na-achị
N'afọ 1920, o mere nnukwu ihe ngosi nke ihe karịrị ọrụ otu narị na iri abụọ na ise na Salon Tunis
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-ese onyinyo ya na-arụkwa ọrụ maka onye na-ese foto, Rudolf Franz Lehnert

Na mbụ, ọ na-echegbu onwe ya banyere ihe ngosi ziri ezi nke ejiji, ihe ịchọ mma na eserese ahụ; ihe ọmụma ọ ga-eji mee ihe na ihe osise maka ọrụ Ernest-Gustave Gobert, onye dọkịta na onye na-ede akụkọ ihe mere eme

Ka oge na-aga, ọ ga-azụlite mmasị dị ukwuu n'àgwà nke ndị mmadụ n'onwe ha bụ ndị, n'agbanyeghị na ha bụ ndị ogbenye na ndị na-amaghị akwụkwọ, n'echiche ya, mara mma ma dị mma, ebe ndị nwere agụmakwụkwọ bụ 'ndị jọgburu onwe ha, ndị dị obere na ndị na'amaghị ama'
O mere ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na France, nakwa na Tunis, gọọmentị zụtara ụfọdụ n'ime ihe osise ya
A ka nwere ike ịhụ ọtụtụ ọrụ ya n'ebe obibi gọọmentị
Ka oge na-aga na ndụ ya, ọ ga-ahụ onwe ya na asọmpi ya na otu ndị na-ese ihe na-ewu ewu nke a maara dị ka École de Tunis, nke Pierre Boucherle duziri
Ọ nwụrụ n'ọrịa ụkwara nta n'ụlọ ọgwụ French dị na Tunis ma lie ya na mpaghara Russia nke Cimetière du Borgel
N'afọ 1984, e mere nnukwu ihe ngosi na Château de Bagatelle, na Paris, n'ihe gbasara ncheta ọmụmụ ya nke otu nari
N'afọ 2010, a kwanyere ya ugwu na Tunisia site na ihe ngosi a na-akpọ 'Roubtzoff et la Médina'; ihe osise iri anọ na asatọ o mere na 1944, yana ihe osise ole na ole
A na-eji ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya eme ihe maka stampụ post nke Tunisia
Bédouine à la couverture - Musée des Beaux-Arts de Narbonne
Arbia
Mahbouba
Mgbakọ ahụ
Aliya
Saida
Alexandria Villaseñor (amụrụ n'afọ 2005) bụ onye America na-ahụ maka ihu igwe bi na New York
Onye na-eso ụzọ nke Fridays for Future movement na nke onye na-ahụ maka ihu igwe Greta Thunberg, Villaseñor bụ onye guzobere US Youth Climate Strike nakwa onye guzobere Earth Uprising
A mụrụ Villaseñor na 2005 na Davis, California, ebe ọ tolitere
Ezinụlọ ahụ si n'ebe ugwu California kwaga New York na 2018
Villaseñor bụ Latina
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ ya bụ ịrụ ọrụ otu ụbọchị maka United Nations
Agha Villaseñor maka omume ihu igwe malitere mgbe e jidere ya n'ime anwụrụ ọkụ site na Nọvemba 2018 Camp Fire na California n'oge nleta ezinụlọ
Dị ka onye na-arịa ụkwara ume ọkụ, ọ dara ọrịa n'ụzọ anụ ahụ, n'oge ahụ ọ nyochara mgbanwe ihu igwe na ịrị elu okpomọkụ nke mere ka ọkụ ahụ sie ike
Nne ya, Kristin Hogue, debanyere aha na MA na mmemme Climate and Society na Mahadum Columbia Villaseñor na-eso nne ya gaa klas mgbe ụfọdụ, ebe ọ mụtara banyere sayensị nke mgbanwe ihu igwe
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ sonyeere ngalaba New York nke Zero Hour, otu ndị ntorobịa America na-ahụ maka ihu igwe
Villaseñor emeela ihe gbasara ịhụ igwe n'ụdị yiri nke Thunberg, onye kpaliri ya na okwu ya na Disemba 4, 2018 na United Nations Climate Change Conference (COP24) na Katowice, Poland
Kemgbe Disemba 14, 2018 (mgbe a ka na-eme COP24), ọ na-ahapụ ụlọ akwụkwọ na Fraịdee ọ bụla iji mee mkpesa megide enweghị omume ihu igwe n'ihu isi ụlọ ọrụ United Nations na New York
Ọ naghịzi etinye aka na otu US Youth Climate Strike ma guzobe otu agụmakwụkwọ mgbanwe ihu igwe Earth Uprising

Na Mee 2019, Villaseñor bụ onye natara ihe nrite Disruptor site na Tribeca Disruptive Innovation Awards (TDIA), natara agụmakwụkwọ site na The Common Good public advocacy organization, ma nye ya onyinye Youth Climate Leadership site na Earth Day Network
Mgbe Thunberg rutere New York City site na njem ụgbọ mmiri ya na-agafe Atlantic n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2019, Villaseñor, Xiye Bastida, na ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka ihu igwe kelere Thunberg mgbe ha rutere
Ka ọ na-erule n'oge ahụ, ha amalitelarị mmekọrịta na ibe ha na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta

Na Septemba 23, 2019, Villaseñor, ya na ndị ntorobịa iri na ise ndị ọzọ nke gụnyere Greta Thunberg, Catarina Lorenzo, na Carl Smith, tinyere akwụkwọ mkpesa na United Nations na-ebo mba ise, ya bụ France, Germany, Brazil, Argentina, na Turkey ebubo na ha emeghị ihe mgbaru ọsọ ha belatara nke ha kwere na nkwa ha na Paris Agreement
N'etiti Ọktọba 2019, ọ gara C40 World Mayors Summit na Copenhagen, Denmark
N'etiti Jenụwarị 2020, ọ gara World Economic Forum dị ka ọkà okwu ndị ntorobịa wee sonye na ụlọ akwụkwọ maka ihu igwe na Davos, Switzerland n'akụkụ Greta Thunberg na Jenụwarụ 24, 2020
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2020, Alexandria kwuru okwu na Democratic National Convention dị ka akụkụ nke ngalaba ha gbasara mgbanwe ihu igwe
Na Disemba 1, 2020, magazin Seventeen kpọrọ ya aha dị ka otu n'ime 2020 Voices of the Year
Ọgbaghara ụlọ akwụkwọ maka ihu igwe
Alexia Amesbury (Amụrụ n'ihe dị ka n'afọ , nke a mụrụ Jumeau) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Seychelles na onye ọka iwu site na ọrụ
N'okpuru nche anwụ nke Seychelles Party for Social Justice and Democracy, ọ sonyere na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke afọ 2015 iji bụrụ nwanyị mbụ sonyere na ntụli aka onyeisiala nke Seychelles
A mụrụ Amesbury na Praslin, Mahé, Seychelles ma too na St
Elizabeth Convent na Seychelles ruo mgbe ọ kwagara Kenya n'afọ 1961 ebe ọ gụsịrị O' na A'levels
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 37, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum dị na United Kingdom iji mụọ Iwu tupu ọ gaa London School of Economics and Political Science ebe ọ nwetara nzere masta na International Law

Alexia Uwera Mupende (17 Nọvemba 1984 - 8 Jenụwarị 2019) bụ onye Rwandan na-ese onyinyo, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara ahụike, onye n'oge ọnwụ ya, bụ onya na-ahu maka odịmma ọha obodo na Waka ebe a na eme ka ahụ sie ike, na Kigali, isi obodo Rwanda
A mụrụ Alexia Uwera na Kenya
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Uganda, nweta asambodo sekondri ya na Namasagali College na Kamuli District
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta diplọma ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na St
Lawrence College, na Central Region nke Uganda
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ kwagara Rwanda ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Information Technology na Mahadum nke Rwanda

Alexia Mupende bụ onye na-ese onyinyo mba ụwa, onye nọchitere anya mba ya, Rwanda, na mmemme ejiji na Kampala, Uganda, Geneva, Switzerland, Dubai, United Arab Emirates, Colombo, Sri Lanka na Mumbai, India
Iji gbakwunye ego ọ na-enweta n'ọrụ n'ihe ngosi, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi njikwa nke ulọ mmega ahu akpọrọ waka, klọb mmega ahụ na obodo Kigali
N'uhuruchi Tuesday, 8 Jenụwarị 2019, a chọtara ozu Alexia Uwera Mupende n'otu n'ime ụlọ ihi ụra n'ụlọ nna ya na Nyarugunga Sector, Kicukiro District, mpaghara dịpụrụ adịpụ nke obodo Kigali
A mara ya mma ọtụtụ ugboro
Ndị ọrụ nchekwa Rwanda mara ọkwa na ha na-achọ Antoine Niyireba, onye dị afọ iri abụọ na atọ, onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ nne na nna ahụ nwụrụ anwụ
Ọ bụ onye a na-enyo enyo na ogbugbu ahụ
N'oge ọ nwụrụ, ọ kwere nkwa ịlụ di na Febụwarị 2019, a tọhapụrụ akwụkwọ ịkpọ òkù maka agbamakwụkwọ ahụ
Alexis Preller (ụbọchị isii n'ọnwa Septemba 1911 rụọ úbọchị irí nà àtó n'ọnwa Disemba 1975) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa
Ọ zụrụ na Westminster School of Art ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1934 ma mesịa na Académie de la Grande Chaumière na Paris (1937)
Vincent van Gogh na Paul Gauguin nwèrè mmetụta karịsịa n'ebe ọ nọ ma gaa n'ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbè ochie na Europe iji mụọ ọrụ ndị omenkà a
Enwere ike ịhụ akụkụ nke Gauguin na ihe osise ya na South Africa dịka ogige Iden (1937)
Ka ógé na-aga, ọ mepụtara ụdị nke ya na ọrụ ya gosipụtara ọtụtụ ihe sitere na okike, ihe nkpuchi Africa na nka ndị ọzọ nke Africa
Otu ónyé na-ahụ mkpuchi a nke ụdị onwé ya na isiokwu ndị Afrịka nke a na-egosipụta n'ụzọ doro anya n'ọrụ dịka Basuto Allegory (1947)
Njem na Europe na North Africa mèrè ka mmepụta ya pụta ìhè nke ihe osise nke Piero della Francesca na ihe osise ndị Ijipt metụtara
Otu ónyè na-ahụ mmetụta a n'ọrụ ndị dị ka Hieratic Women (1956)
Ụdị pụrụ iche nke Preller mechara kewapụ ya na nka nka nke narị afọ nké irí abụọ, ọ dabara n'ụdị ọ bụla nkè ụlọ akwụkwọ ochie

Ọ bụ ezie na a na-akwanyere ya ùgwù nke ukwuu n'obodo ya bụ Pretoria, nke a abụghị na mbụ n'ebe ndị ọzọ na South Africa - ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya na Cape Town na ngwụcha afọ 1960 bụ nkè ndị na-enyocha nka n'ebe ahụ nabatara nke ọma

Nkwado màkà ọrụ ya etolitela kemgbe ahụ, na mmeghe nke nnukwu ihe ngosi kachasị ọhụrụ, Africa, Sun and the Shadows nkè ọrụ ya na Johannesburg's Standard Bank Gallery n'ubochí irí na àtó n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2009
Alexx Ekubo (amuru Alex Ekubo-Okwaraeke ; 10 Eprel, 1986) bu onye omee ihe nkiri na ihe nlereanya nke Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye mbụ gbagoro na asọmpi Mr Nigeria nke afọ 2010
Ọ meriri onye na- eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na onyinye nkwado na 2013 Best of Nollywood Awards maka ọrụ ya na Weekend Gateway
Ekubo bu onye Arochukwu, Abia State
Ọ gara Federal Government College Daura, Katsina State
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara iwu na Mahadum Calabar wee nweta diplọma na iwu na Calabar Polytechnic
Na 10th nke Mee 2021, Alex Ekubo na onye ọ chọrọ elụ Fancy Acholonu kwupụtara ụbọchị agbamakwụkwọ ha na Instagram
Agbamakwụkwọ ọdịnala ha ga-eme n'ụbọchị Satọde, abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'Imo steeti, ebe agbamakwụkwọ ndị ọcha ga-eme na Satọde na-abịa n'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Nọvemba na Legọs steeti
N'August 2021 nwunye Alex kwụsịrị njikọ ha na Fancy Acholonu na-ewepụta nkwupụta na mmekọrịta ha akwụsịla
Mpụta ihe nkiri Ekubo bụ obere ọrụ na Lancelot Oduwa Imasuen 's Sinners in the House (2005); Ọrụ izizi ya bụ na Ladies Men ọtụtụ afọ ka e mesịrị

Alfred Khumalo (n'ubochí isé n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1930 rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ n'otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2012), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Alf Kumalo, bụ onye na-ese foto na onye na-ede foto na South Africa

A mụrụ Kumalo na Utrecht nso Newcastle na mpaghara KwaZulu-Natal O buru ụzọ rụọ ọrụ n'ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala na-arụ ọrụ dị iche iche wee bido ịrụ ọrụ n'onwe ya n'ihe banyere mbipụta dị iche iche, na-ere foto ya ebe o nwere ike
Ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ ọrụ maka Bantu World
N'afọ 1956, ọ chọtara ọrụ na-adịgide adịgide na Golden City Post ma mesịa nata ọrụ site na The Star, akwụkwọ akụkọ South Africa kwa ụbọchị, magazin Drum, na akwụkwọ mba ụwa dị ka The New York Times
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese foto nke jidere ogbugbu Sharpeville n'ubochí irí abụọ n'otu n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1960
N'afọ 1963, ógè ọ na-arụ ọrụ banyere Drum, a họpụtara ya na Harry Mashabela ka ha gaa gbaa akụkọ màkà ụmụ akwụkwọ Afrịka na mba Iron Curtain
Ha abụọ mere ihu akwụkwọ nke mbipụta ọzọ nke magazin ahụ, 'Ndị na-aṅụ mmanya na-aga Europe'
Ógè ọ nọ na London, ọ gbara Cassius Clay ajụjụ ọnụ wee chọpụta na ọ meriri n'ọnọdụ mbụ na asọmpi foto
Ihe nrite ahụ bụ ụgbọ ala Austin Cambridge
David Hazelhurst, onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Drum, gbara Kumalo ume ịbanye
Kumalo jiri aha Africa ya Mangaliso Dukuza mee ihe n'ihi na ọ chọrọ ka ikpe ahụ bụrụ nke na-adịghị ele mmadụ anya n'ihu na nke aha ya na-emetụtaghị ya
Star bipụtara foto ya na onyinye ya na ihu ya
'Ọtụtụ ndị isi ojii kwuru màkà ya ọtụtụ ụbọchị ógè nke ahụ gasịrị, n'ihi na n'ụbọchị ndị ahụ ha ga-abanye n'ihu akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọcha ma ọ bụrụ na ha bụ ndị ohi
N'agbanyeghị atụmanya nke ijide ya ma wakpo ya, Kumalo nọgidere na-ese foto, mgbe ụfọdụ na-efu onwe ya
David Hazelhurst chetara
Otu ụbọchị n'ime afọ 1963, ógè m bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke magazin Drum, Alf Khumalo màkà n'ọfịs m na-ebu foto
O gosipụtara onye uwe ojii siri ike na-agba ụkwụ n'etiti ụkwụ onye nta akụkọ Harry Mashabela site n'azụ
Nke a bụ ike nke ịgba ụkwụ ị nwere ike ịhụ ọdịdị buutu ya na-agbawa site n'ihu uwe Mashabela
Ọ bụ afọ nke jackboot nke John Vorster, habeas corpus apụọla, ụbọchị iri itoolu nke njide na-enweghị ikpe nyere ndị uwe ojii ikike igbu na ịwakpo n'azụ ọnụ ụzọ mechiri emechi na enweghị ntaramahụhụ

Ndị uwe ojii kpọrọ ndị nta akụkọ na ndị na-ese foto asị karịsịa, n'ihi na foto ha gosipụtara eziokwu banyere usoro ọjọọ, na Kumalo, n'agbanyeghị ịdọ aka ná ntị, nwere ike ịpịa ya ihe siri ike iji were foto Mashabela
Ọ gbalịrị ire ya n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ma ọ nweghị ihe ịga nke ọma
Hazelhurst gbasapụrụ foto ahụ gafee peeji abụọ nke Drum
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, Kumalo sere foto ma dekọọ Ụfọdụ n'ime oge akụkọ ihe mere eme na akụkọ ihe mere anya South Africa
Ndị a gụnyere Trial Treason, Rivonia Trial, mpụta nke Black Consciousness, Student Uprising nke afọ1976 na okwu Codesa
Nke a bụ n'agbanyeghị ọtụtụ oge nke njide, njide na mmekpa ahụ nke ndị ọrụ gọọmentị
Ọrụ ya apụtala na akwụkwọ akụkọ mba ụwa dị ka The Observer, The New York Times, New York Post, na Sunday Independent
N'ógbè ahụ, ọ rụkwara ọrụ maka magazin Drum na Rand Daily Mail
Iji nyere ọgbọ na-abịanụ nke ndị na-ese foto South Africa aka, Kumalo meghere ụlọ akwụkwọ foto na Diepkloof Soweto na 2002
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ nyere ọmụmụ ọnwa itoolu iji zụọ ndị na-ese foto si n'ebe ndị ogbenye
Ọ nwụrụ n'ubochí irí abụọ n'otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2012
Àtụ Infobox royalty
Nnaemeka Alfred Achebe CFR, mni // (na-ege ntị) (amụrụ na 14 Mee 1941) bụ onye ọchịchị ọdịnala na Obi nke 21 nke Onitsha, na Anambra State, South-Eastern Nigeria
Ọ bụ chancellor nke Mahadum Ahmadu Bello kemgbe afọ 2015, ọ bụkwa chancellor mbụ nke Mahaduma Kogi State
Achebe na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onyeisi oche nke ndị nduzi nke Unilever Nigeria, na Onye isi oche nke International Breweries (ABInBev) Nigeria
Tupu ọ pụta dị ka Obi nke Onitsha, na 2002, o nwere ọrụ ogologo oge na nke pụrụ iche na Royal Dutch Shell Group na-eje ozi dị ka onye nduzi na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche na otu ahụ
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị gọọmentị Owerri
Achebe nwere nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na Chemistry na Mahadum Stanford na 1966 na nzere masta na Business Administration na Mahadim Columbia
N'afọ 1979, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Senior Executive Course nke National Institute for Policy and Strategic Studies na Kuru, nso Jos
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, Achebe rụrụ ọrụ nwa oge na United States tupu ọ laghachi Naijiria na 1972 mgbe agha obodo Naijiria gasịrị wee malite ịrụ ọrụ na Shell Petroleum Company
Ọ bụ onye nlekọta ugbu a, National Traditional Rulers Council na onye isi oche steeti ya na Anambra State

E wezụga ogologo oge ọ nọrọ dị ka onye nduzi nke Shell Nigeria, Obi Achebe bụkwa, n'oge 1985 - 87, onye nduzi ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ Shell ndị ọzọ na United Kingdom, Netherlands, Ghana, Nigeria, Sierra Leone, Gambia, Liberia na Angola
Achebe lara ezumike nka n'afọ 1995 ka o ruru afọ ezumike nka

Otú ọ dị, n'agbanyeghị na ọ lara ezumike nká, ọ nọgidere na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nke hụrụ ya ka e debere ya na Shell International na London, bụ ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka 'onye nnọchiteanya nke Shell Nigeria Ọ nọgidere n'ọkwá a ruo mgbe ọ pụtara dịka Obi nke Onitsha
na Mee 2002
Obi nke Onitsha

Na mpụga Shell, Obi Achebe ewerela ọkwa n'ọkwa ọchịchị nke ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ mmanụ ala, Effurun na otu ndị na-ahụ maka ndị ọrụ n'ala Nigeria Na ndụ ụlọọrụ, Obi Achebe bụ onyeisi oche nke Diamond Bank PLC na Universal Insurance PLC ma bụrụkwa onyeisi oche nke Unilever Nigeria PLC, Intafact Beverages Limited (SAB-Miller), na Omak Maritime Limited
Ugboro abụọ, Obi Achebe ejerela mba ahụ ozi na ngalaba nyocha na ngalaba mmanụ
N'afọ 1976, ọ bụ onye otu nchịkwa nke nyocha na Port Harcourt Refinery
N'afọ 2004, Onye isi ala Obasanjo kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ Onye isi oche nke nyocha nke onye isi ala na February 2003 Fuel Enweghị na mba ahụ
N'afọ 2005, Obi Achebe bụ onye nnọchiteanya na National Political Reform Conference na-anọchite anya ndị ọchịchị ọdịnala nke South-Eastern States
Ọ ghọrọ Onye isi oche nke Kọmitii na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na mgbanwe nchịkwa ihe onwunwe ma hazie nzukọ ndị ọchịchị ọdịnala na Nzukọ ahụ
Obi Achebe bụ onye otu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ọkachamara na nke afọ ofufo (na-enweghị uru) na Naịjirịa na mba ofesi, ebe o nyere onyinye bara uru na ikike dị iche iche
Ọ bụ onye otu Nigerian Institute of Management na Nigerian Institute for Public Relations
Ọ bụ onye otu ndụ nke Nigerian Economic Society na onye otu Nigerian Institute of Personnel Management na Nigerian Environmental Society
Ọ bụ osote onye isi nke Island Club, Lagos; osote onye nduzi nke Lagos Country Club, na onye otu Metropolitan Club, Lagos
Na mmekọrịta abụọ na nke ọtụtụ mba, Obi Achebe anọchiwokwa anya ọdịmma Naịjirịa na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ọdịbendị na azụmahịa
Ọ bụ onye otu Nigeria-Britain Association (NBA) na onye otu ndụ nke ibe ya Britain-Nigeria Association (BNA)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu Board of Governing nke BNA, Advisory Board nke Britain-Nigeria Business Council, na Board of Trustees nke Africa Centre, niile dị na United Kingdom
Mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye ọchịchị ọdịnala, Africa Center, iji kwado ọrụ ya, mere ya otu n'ime ndị isi ya ise, na Nelson Mandela dị ka nnukwu onye isi
Obi Achebe nwere oke mmasị n'agụmakwụkwọ dịka isi ihe na-ebute mmepe obodo
N'okwukwe siri ike ya na enweghị ego ekwesịghị igbochi nwatakịrị ọ bụla inweta ezigbo agụmakwụkwọ, o wepụtara n'oge ọchịchị ya ego maka mmepe mmadụ maka obodo ya

N'afọ 2007, ya na onye ukwu ya, Oba Okunade Sijuwade II, Ooni nke Ife nwụrụ anwụ, na Eze Ukwu, Alhaji Ado Bayero, Emir nke Kano, bụ ndị ọbịa nke Director-General nke UNESCO na Paris iji kesaa echiche banyere ya
ọrụ atụmatụ nke ndị eze na-akwalite mmepe sayensị na teknụzụ
N'afọ 2008 na 2010, o kwuru okwu mkparịta ụka kwa afọ nke Nigeria Higher Education Foundation na New York City iji kwalite mmekorita n'etiti mahadum US na Nigeria
Ọ ghọrọ Chancellor nke Kogi State University na 2010
N'ịkwado ọrụ dị iche iche ọ na-arụ n'obodo, Obi Achebe nwetara nsọpụrụ mba* nke Command of the Order of the Federal Republic (CFR) n'afọ 2004

A họpụtara ya onyeisi oche nke otu ndị ọchịchị ọdịnala Anambra steeti n'afọ 2008; mere onye nkwanye ugwu nke nwafor Orizu College of Education na 2008; ma nyekwa ya nzere Doctor of Law (LLD) Honoris Causa site na Mahadum Anambra State na 2008, na Dọkịta Sayensị (DSc) Honoris Causa site na Kogi State University na 2010

Alfred Agbesi Woyome (amuru Jenụwarị 22,1965) bụ onye ọchụnta ego nke Ghana na onye bụbu onye nnọchi anya Honourary Vice Consul nke Austria na Ghana na onye isi otu National Democratic Congress
Woyome bụ nwata akwụkwọ na kọleji Bishop Herman dị na Kpando na mpaghara Volta nke Ghana ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Alfred Amadu Conteh bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ese onyinyo na ónyé na-eme ihe nkírí
A mụrụ Alfred Amadu Conteh na 1975 na Fort Valley, Georgia
Ọ gàrà Mahadum Hampton na Hampton, Virginia, ebe ọ natara BFA
Ọ natara MFA ya na Mahadum Georgia Southern dị na Statesboro, Georgia
Nne ya bụ ónyé Africa America na nna ya si Sierra Leone, West Africa
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya na-enyocha njirimara onwé ya site na ahụmịhe ndị mụrụ ya na ọdịiche ọdịbendị
Tinyere ihe osise, Conteh na-emepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ nke ógè a nke na-eji ihe nnọchianya iji gosipụta akụkọ ya banyere ahụmịhe ndịda Africa America
Conteh na-eji mgbasa ozi dịgasị iche iche dị ka ụgbọ ala iji kpalie echiche nke ga-akpata mgbanwe
Alfred Amadu Conteh malitere igosi na 2003 ma kemgbe ahụ, o sonyere n'ihe karịrị ihe ngosi 12 na ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu
Ọrụ Conteh akpatawo nzaghachi esemokwu n'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ
Ihe ngosi ya na Tubman Museum na 2015 na Macon, Georgia, kpatara ọgba aghara n'etiti ndị isi okpukpe hụrụ ihe osise ya 'Preacher Pimp'
Usoro 'pimp' nke Conteh gosipụtara ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na mmejọ ha na ndị ọzọ
N'etiti ndị gụnyere bụ 'Athlete Pimp,' ŌProperty-Owning Pimp' na 'Mother Pimp'
Usoro ahụ na-egosipụta akụkụ ọjọọ nke otu anyị si emeso ndị ọzọ ma mesoo ha, ka Conteh kwuru
'Preacher Pimp' na-egosipụta ndị isi okpukpe ndị omume ha na-ezighị ezi mànà ọ bụghị ónyé nnọchi ányá ndị isi ụka niile, ka Conteh kwuru
Usoro Alfred Conteh na-adịbeghị anya, 'Two Fronts', bụ nyocha ányá nke otu ndị Afrịka Diaspora nọ na South si eche agha akụ na ụba, agụmakwụkwọ, na nkè uche ihu
Ihe ngosi ya na nso nso a na September Gray Gallery na Atlanta, Georgia, nwetara nyocha dị egwu site na Atlanta Journal-Constitution
'Nchịkọta nkè ndị ọ na-achị na-ekwusi ike na ndị a dị mkpa dị ka ndị nnọchiteanya nke ọnọdụ mmadụ ndị nne na ndị ọrụ na ụmụaka na ndị na-eme ihe ike dị ka ndị kwesịrị ncheta nke ha
Alfred Amadu Conteh enwetala ndị na-eso ụzọ mba
O gosipụtara na ọtụtụ ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na gallery gụnyere, Tubman Museum na Macon, Georgia, Museum of Arts an Sciences, Hudgens Center for the Arts, na Art Basel Miami
A chịkọtara ọrụ ya ma gosipụta ya n'ọtụtụ ébé na South
Alfred Warner Hair (1941-1971), ónyé bụkwa Freddy Hair, bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe si Fort Pierce, Florida ónyé, ya na Harold Newton, nyèrè aka n'ịtọ ntọala Florida Highwaymen artist movement
Ntutu isi bụ ónyé ndú nke otu ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka America na-ese onyinyo ndị na-ere ihe osise ha màrà mma site na igbe ụgbọ ala n'akụkụ ụzọ ndị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri nke South Florida
N'afọ 2004, a nabatara Hair na Florida Artists Hall of Fame
A mụrụ Alfred Warner Hair na úbọchị irí abụọ n'ọnwa Mée 1941 na Fort Pierce, Florida, otu n'ime ụmụ asaá nke Samuel na Annie Mae Hair
Hair gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Lincoln Park Academy na 1961, wee gaa otu afọ na kọleji ọbọdọ tupu ọ kwụsị iji chụsoo ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe
Ónyé nkụzi nka nkè ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya bụ Zanobia Jefferson chọpụtara nkà nka nke ntutu isi ma ọ kọwaara ya ónyé a ma ama na-ese ihe na Florida, A
Backus
Backus anọwo na-agba ọtụtụ ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe n'Afrịka ma na-eme ka ha kwenye ise ihe osise ala karịa ihe gbasara okpukpe
N'afọ 1956, mgbè Hair dị afọ iri na anọ, ọ malitere ịnata nkụzi ise ihe na Backus
Mgbè afọ atọ gasịrị, Hair malitere n'onwe ya iji nweta ihe ọ ga-eri dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe
N'ihi ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'oge Jim Crow, ụlọ ngosi nka na Florida agaghị anọchite anya ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka America, na-amanye Hair ịchọta ihe ndị ọzọ na-ere ihe osise ya
N'ịgbaso ihe nlereanya nke ónyé bụbu nwá akwụkwọ Backus bụ Harold Newton, Hair na-ere ihe osise ya site n'ọnụ ụzọ ruo n'ọnụ ụlọ site n'ụgbọ ala ya
Hair na Newton kpaliri otu ìgwè nke ndị omenkà irí abụọ na isii nke Africa America ka ha soro ndu ha
Ọ bụ ezie na ndị na-ese ihe ibe ya maara Newton màkà mkpali teknụzụ ya, a na-ewere Hair dị ka ónyé ndu na ónyé na-akpali 'ónyé setịpụrụ ụda màkà otu ahụ n'ime afọ 1960'
Ọ kpọkọtara otu ndị na-ese ihe 'na-eto eto, ndị dị ike' bụ ndị na-ete ọtụtụ ihe osise mara mma
Ntutu mepụtara ọtụtụ ihe osise n'otu ógè
O mechara were ndị enyi ya n'ọrụ ịkwọ ụgbọala n'okporo ụzọ awara awara, na-ere ihe osise ya site n'ọnụ ụzọ ruo n'ọnụ maka dollar Iri abụọ ma ọ bụ dollar iri abụo na isé
Dị ka ndị otu ndị Highwaymen si kwuo, Hair ṅụrụ iyi na nka ya ga-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye nwere ọtụtụ nde mmadụ mgbè ọ dị afọ iri atọ na isé
N'afọ 1970, e gbùrù Hair n'ọgụ n'ụlọ mmanya mgbè ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na itoolu, mmepụta dị egwu nke ndị na-ese ihe malitere ibelata
Ntutu isi 'na-agbagha echiche ọ bụla na-acha anụnụ anụnụ ma na-agbagwoju anya na ọgụgụ isi iji gosipụta [a] iyi na-aga n'ihu nke osimiri, osisi nkwụ na ihe nkírí Everglades
Ọdịdị anụ ahụ abụghị isi ihe ha lekwasịrị anya; ha chọrọ ịmasị ndị na-azụ ahịa na mbárá igwe Florida na-acha oroma ma ọ bụ igwe ojii na-adịghị mma
' Ntutu na-arụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ákwà n'otu oge

Dị ka prọfesọ nka anya Gary Monroe si kwuo, 'Ọ ga-ejikọta bọọdụ irí abụọ n'otu ógè n'èzí, wee tinye agba ahụ ngwa ngwa n'enweghị ihe osise, ngwa ngwa o nwèrè ike, na-aga site na bọọdụ gaa na bọọdụ, na-ese akụkụ nke eluigwe, osisi ma ọ bụ ihe ndị ọzọ
Ihe dị n'ihe osise ya bụ spontaneity, agba siri ike, osisi nkwụ, ebili mmiri, ájá na mbara igwe dị egwu
'Ịse ihe ngwa ngwa bụ ihe dị mkpa, ọ bụghị ihe na-egbochi nka Hair,' ka Maazị Monroe dere
'Ọ na-atụgharị ihe osise' na bọọdụ ya iji jiri ọrụ ebube nweta ihe oyiyi ndị na-ekwu màkà ịdị ndụ karịa màkà njikwa ụkpụrụ plastik' '
Hair bịanyere aka na ọrụ mbụ ya 'A
Hair' Ọtụtụ ihe osise iri na abụọ e mepụtara na 1966 na 1967 ka a bịanyere aka na 'Freddy'
Dị ka nwunye ya di ya si kwuo, ihe osise Freddy bụ ọrụ mmekorita nke ọ na-ese ihe ndabere na ntutu rụzuru ọrụ zuru ezu niile
Hair lụrụ Doretha Hair (mgbè e mesịrị Truesdell) ma nwee ụmụ ise
N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1970, a gbagburu Hair n'oge esemokwu n'ụlọ mmanya
Alfred L
Bright (Jenụwarị úbọchị itoolu, 1940 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 2019) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé nkuzi nka
Ọ ghọrọ 'onye isi Africa America mbụ na-arụ ọrụ oge niile' na alma mater ya, Youngstown State University, ọ bụkwa ónyé guzobere na onye nduzi nke mmemme Africana Studies site na 1970 ruo 1987
Enwere ike ịhụ ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie, gụnyere Butler Institute of American Art na Canton Museum of Art

Alfred Ntombela (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 3 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1972) bụ onye South Africa bụbu onye na-eme ihe nkiri, nke a maara maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri South Africa na Leon Schuster, ọchị ya na-agba ọsọ na obere ogo ya dịka okenye
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama maka ọrụ ya na Sweet 'n Short na Mama Jack
Asụsụ ala ya bụ Zulu mana ọ na-asụkwa Bekee na Afrikaans
O kwupụtara ezumike nká ya site na ime ihe nkiri n'afọ 2018 mgbe afọ 28 gasịrị na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ogige Alfred Rewane bụ ogige ahịhịa ndụ ọha na eze n'okporo ụzọ Alfred Rewane na Ikoyi na Lagos

Ogige ahụ nke Gọọmentị Steeti Lagos mepụtara n'afọ 2018 dị n'ala nke square mita puku itoolu na otu narị site na Osborne junction site na Lugard Avenue ruo NNPC ma kpọọ ya aha onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria nwụrụ n'abalị isii nke ọnwa October , afọ 1995
Ogige ntụrụndụ ahụ meghere maka ndị bi n'ime na ọkara gburugburu nke ogige ahụ iji zuru ike, ma legherie anya okporo ụzọ Alfred Rewane
Alfred Vanderpol (7 Eprel 1854 ruo ụbọchị 17 June 1915) bụ onye injinia French, onye ọrụ ebere na onye edemede bụ otu n'ime ndị isi nke òtù pacifist na France n'afọ ndị bu Agha Ụwa Mbụ (1914)
A mụrụ Alfred Marie Vanderpol na Tourcoing, Nord n'ụbọchị 7 Eprel 1854, nwa François Vanderpol nke Anna Knaepffler nke Phalsbourg
Ezinụlọ nna ya bụ ndị Flemish na nne ya si Alsace
O nwere nwanne nwanyị tọrọ ya na nwanne nwoke nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị obere
Mgbe ha biri na Le Havre ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ndị Vanderpols laghachiri Tourcoing, ebe a họpụtara nna ahụ n'ụbọchị 30 Disemba 1865, n'ọfịs omenala
Vanderpol gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Tourcoing
N'oge Agha Franco-Prussian nke afọ 1870 ọ malitere inwe mmasị n'okwu agha na udo
Ọ tụlere itinye akwụkwọ maka École Polytechnique, wee gaa ọmụmụ mgbakọ na mwepụ pụrụ iche na lycée dị na Lille
Na ndụmọdụ onye nkuzi ya, ọ banyere na École centrale des Arts et Manufactures na Lille, wee gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1876 na diplọma na injinia
Algérie Poste ('Algerian Post'; Arabic بريد الجزائر) Bụ ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị nwere maka ọrụ nzipu ozi na Algeria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Bab Ezzouar,Algiers
Mmekọrịta na Algeria
Ulọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta Algeria (Arabic) bụ ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị na isi ụlọ ọrụ ekwentị na
Ọ bụ naanị onye na-arụ ọrụ na netwọk ekwentị na ADSL na mba ahụ
Algérie Télécom bụ enyemaka nke ndi Télécom Algérie Groupe [fr] mgbe aruputara ya n'afo 2017
Na 2017, Algérie Télécom kwuru na ya nwere ihe karịrị 140,000 km (87,000 mi) nke netwọkụ eriri anya
Ruo Disemba 31, 2021, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ 200,000 km (120,000 mi) nke eriri fiber optic ekenyela, ka onye isi Groupe Télécom Algérie siri kwuo, Khaled Zarat
Algae scrubber bụ ngwaọrụ nzacha mmiri (ekwesịghị ịgbagwoju anya na pad scrubber eji eme ka iko dị ọcha) nke naeji ìhè etolite algae; na usoro a, a naewepụ kemịkal ndị a naachọghị na mmiri
Algae scrubbers naenye ndị naeme ihe ntụrụndụ mmiri nnu, mmiri dị ọcha na ọdọ mmiri ohere iji tankị ha rụọ ọrụ site na iji nzacha okike nụdị mmepụta mbụ, dị ka oké osimiri na ọdọ mmiri
Algae scrubber naenyocha mmiri site na ịkwaga mmiri ngwa ngwa nelu ihe siri ike, nke naenwu gbaa nke ukwuu, nke naeme ka algae malite itolite nụba
Ka algae naeto, ha naeri ihe oriri dịka nitrate, phosphate, nitrite, ammonia, ammonium na ọbụna ọla dịka ọla kọpa site na mmiri

Ihe ndị a naedozi ahụ naabụkarị nsogbu na aquariums na ọdọ mmiri nihi na ha naeme ka algae naenye nsogbu itolite, nakwa n'ihi n'ihi nde ha naakpata ọrịa na / ma ọ bụ nsogbu ndị ọzọ na azụ aquarium, invertebrates na corals
Algae scrubber naenye ohere ka algae too, mana algae naeto nime nzacha kama na aquarium ma ọ bụ ọdọ mmiri
Nke a naewepụ ihe oriri naedozi ahụ (naagbanye mmiri), naebelata algae na aquarium ma ọ bụ ọdọ mmiri
Algae naenye nsogbu na aquarium ma ọ bụ ọdọ mmiri ekwesịghị ịgbagwoju anya na algae achọrọ na nzacha algae scrubber nonwe ya
Enwere ike iwepụ algae naeto nime algae scrubber, ma ọ bụ nyeghachi anụ ụlọ
Ma fertilization iron na nri naedozi ahụ noké osimiri bụ usoro na-akwalite mmepụta mbụ nke algae noké Osimiri, nke naeri nnukwu ihe naedochi ahụ na CO2
Ọ bụ otu oriri nke ihe oriri nke algae naeme na aquarium ma ọ bụ ọdọ mmiri

A naeji algae scrubbers eme ihe na mmiri nnu na mmiri dị ọcha, ma wepụ algae naenye nsogbu nke ọtụtụ ụdị cyano ma ọ bụ slime, bubble, ntutu, Chaetomorpha, Caulerpa, na algae ihe nkiri, yana dinoflagellates na Aiptasia
Ọ bụ Dr
Walter Adey, onye malitere na ngwụcha afọ 1970, bụ onye nduzi nke Marine Systems Laboratory na Museum of Natural History, Smithsonian Institution (Washington DC, USA) mepụtara algae scrubber
Nnyocha ya banyere ụdị algae dị iche iche, ọkachasị na ọrụ ha na gburugburu ebe obibi na coral reefs, nyere ya nghọta banyere otu oké osimiri (karịsịa reef) si 'recycles' nutrients

O mepụtara ma wuo ihe ngosi dị iche iche ruru puku galọn atọ, ma mepụta usoro gburugburu ebe obibi dị iche iche nke mmiri gụnyere coral reef / lagoon nke 'mgbe afọ asatọ nke mmechi [na gburugburu ebe obibi], nwere usoro kemịkal ya nke naanị algal turf scrubber naachịkwa

Usoro a, nke otu ndị ọkà mmụta ihe ndị dị ndụ naamụ, gosipụtara ọnụego calcification [ọganihu coral] hà ka pasent 4 kachasị mma nke reefs ọhịa, na 543 a chọpụtara ụdị, na atụmatụ ụdị 800, nke a họpụtara na mpaghara ọ bụla dị ka reef kachasị mma a tụrụ

Na mbipụta atọ nke akwụkwọ ya, Dynamic Aquaria, Dr Adey kọwara ọrụ ya n'ụzọ zuru ezu ma kwurịta na ụkpụrụ sayensị ihe ndị metụtara anụ ahụ, kemịkal, na ihe ndị dị ndụ maka iwulite usoro gburugburu ebe obibi naarụ ọrụ nime ogige, site na nha aquarium, ruo microcosm (ruo 5000 galons), ma ọ bụ nha mesocosm (> 5000 galons)
Nịkọwa ihe mkpofu ahịhịa algal ọ mepụtara, ọ kọwara na iwepụ ihe oriri karịrị akarị abụghị naanị ọrụ ya

Site nịrụ ọrụ scrubber nabalị mgbe nnukwu tankị ahụ gbanwere gaa noge iku ume dị iche (ihe ọkụkụ naamịkọrọ oxygen ugbu a karịa ịmepụta ya) scrubber nọgidere naenwe ọkwa oxygen ma nyere aka gbochie pH site na igbochi ọkwa dị elu nke carbon dioxide ka ọ ghara iwulite
'Recycling' pụtara otu ihe naedozi ahụ si aga site na osisi gaa na anụmanụ, ma laghachi na osisi ọzọ
Nala, ị naahụ imegharị ihe site na ịgbaso ikuku oxygen Osisi ndị na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ naeji carbon dioxide ma wepụta oxygen; ụmụ anụmanụ naeji oxygen a ma wepụta carbon dioxide
Noké osimiri na ọdọ mmiri, ihe oriri naesi na algae gaa na anụmanụ, ma laghachi na algae ọzọ
Adey wuru ọtụtụ ụdị algae scrubbers maka aquariums na Smithsonian
Ọ kpọrọ ha 'Algal Turf Scrubbers', nihi na noge ahụ, ekwere na 'turf' algae bụ ụdị algae kachasị mma iji too na scrubber
E nyekwara ya ikike ikike mbụ nke US maka ihe naehichapụ algae, nke kọwara ihe dị mgbagwoju anya nke naawụfu mmiri n'elu ala, si otú a naeme ka ebili mmiri dị na gburugburu ebe obibi

Mgbe ọtụtụ afọ nke mmepe gasịrị, o sonyere na nnwale nke nnukwu algae scrubber na Great Barrier Reef Aquarium 'Reef Tank naanọchite anya ngwa mbụ nke teknụzụ algal scrubber maka usoro aquarium buru ibu

Aquaria naeji usoro nhicha mmiri nkịtị (dịka nzacha nje bacteria) nozuzu ha nwere ọkwa nri na akụkụ kwa nde, ebe ndị naehichapụ algal nọgidere naenwe akụkụ kwa ijeri [nke dị ala], nagbanyeghị ibu dị arọ na Reef Tank
Ihe ịga nke ọma nke algal scrubbers nịnọgide naenwe mmiri kwesịrị ekwesị maka coral reef gosipụtara na mmepụta nke coral scleractinian na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ bi na tankị
Nụzọ dị mwute, a maghị noge ahụ (1988) na calcium na alkalinity kwesịrị ka agbakwunye na tankị reef, iji dochie nke ihe ndị naeto eto naeji

Ọbụna afọ ise mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Ogige Ntụrụndụ Pittsburgh ka naamalite ịnwale tankị 'mesocosm' scrubber reef iji hụ ma ọ bụrụ na ọkwa calcium ga-ada 'A naeche na Ca2+ na ihe ndị na-anọchi anya Sr2+ na Mg2+ nwere ike belata oke na microcosm coral reef nihi iji otu mmiri ahụ eme ihe nihi usoro mmeghachi omume nke dị na coral reif mesocosm'

['Scleractinians (Montastrea, Madracis, Porites, Diploria, na Acropora) na alga calcareous (Halimeda na ndị ọzọ) dị na coral reef mesocosm bụ ihe ndị nwere ike ịbụ ihe ndị naakpata mbelata dị ịrịba ama nke Ca2 + na Sr2 + cations
' [] 'Ca abụghị ihe naegbochi ihe, strontium abụghịkwa ihe naemebi ihe; HCO3 [alkalinity] nwere ike ịbụ
O yiri ka, nihi obere njedebe na nhazi nke mesocosm, ihe ndị a na ngwakọta nwere ike ịghọ ihe naegbochi
[Ọ bụ ihe ijuanya na ihe ndị dị ndụ nwere ike imebi ọtụtụ puku galọn mmiri oké osimiri (atọ ruo puku isii) nke ihe ndị a ọbụna nime afọ abụọ ma ọ bụ karịa
' Mgbe ndị nchọpụta ndị ọzọ gbakwunyere calcium na / ma ọ bụ jikọta tankị ha na oké osimiri (nke naenyekwa calcium na alkalinity), corals malitere itolite ọzọ
Ka o sina dị, 'nsogbu' ihe oriri (ammonia, ammonium, nitrate, nitrite, phosphate, CO2, ọla) naedebe mgbe niile na ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ala
Adey nyere ikike ikike ikike ya na mmadụ ole na ole, bụ ndị rere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nke aquarium scrubbers nye ndị naeme ihe ntụrụndụ nime afọ ole na ole
Otú ọ dị, mgbagwoju anya nke imewe ahụ, na ọnụahịa nke ikikere ahụ, mere ka ndị scrubber dị oke ọnụ
Nke a, jikọtara ya na eziokwu ahụ bụ na nkeji ndị ahụ naeme mkpọtụ, naagbapụta, na ndị a naapụghị ịdabere na ha (usoro ịwụfu gaarapara) mere ka ahịa dị nwayọ
Ndị naehichapụ ihe naamalite ịmalite ịga nihu nime ihe ntụrụndụ aquarium nafọ ndị 1990 mgbe Adey kpebiri iwepụ ikikere ya ma ghara ikwe ka onye ọ bụla mepụta ma ọ bụ ree ha
Ọ tụgharịrị uche ya kama na azụmahịa na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, wee banye na azụmaahịa onwe onye naeme nnukwu nrụnye scrubber maka ọdọ mmiri na osimiri

Ka ịntanetị naemepe nafọ ndị 1990, ndị na-eme ihe ntụrụndụ na aquarium na ọdọ mmiri malitere ịtụle nsogbu algae naenye nsogbu, wee malite ịchọpụta ihe naeme Aquariums na ọdọ mmiri nwere oke algae na naenye ihe oriri enweghị ihe oriri a na-achọpụta na mmiri
Nke a na mbụ yiri ihe ijuanya, ebe ọ bụ na ọnụọgụ nke algae naenye nsogbu kwesịrị ịbawanye ka ihe oriri dị na mmiri naabawanye

Olee otú e si nwee oke algae naenye nsogbu, mana enweghị ihe oriri a naatụle na mmiri iji kwado nke a? Ndị ọkà mmụta ihe ndị dị ndụ malitere ịkọwa na mgbe ọnụọgụ nke algae naenye nsogbu buru ibu, algae naezie naeri ihe niile naedozi ahụ site na mmiri ngwa ngwa karịa ka agbakwunyere ihe ọhụrụ, dịka Dr
Adey kwuru
Mmasị niji algae maka njikwa ihe naedozi ahụ mụbara ọzọ, noge a nụdị idebe algae na 'sump' ma ọ bụ obere aquarium ndị ọzọ nke ejikọtara ya na aquarium isi site na pọmpụ
Site na mgbakwunye ọkụ na mmiri, algae gaeto nógbè a, algae ahụ gaeri ihe oriri site na mmiri dịka Dr
Adey's algae scrubber units mere
Sumps ma ọ bụ obere aquariums ndị ọzọ eji eme ihe maka nzube a ghọrọ ndị a maara dị ka 'refugiums'

A naeji aha 'refugium' mee ihe nihi na algae naeto eto nyere ebe dị nchebe maka obere na ụmụ anụmanụ microscopic iji mụọ ma too, ya mere ọ bụ 'ebe mgbaba' site na nnukwu azụ na invertebrates na isi aquarium nke gaeri ha
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụ ezie na refugiums naeri nri naedozi ahụ site na mmiri, ha erighị ha ngwa ngwa nọnọdụ niile; nke a mere ka ọtụtụ ndị naeme ihe ntụrụndụ nọgide naenwe nsogbu algae na aquariums ha

A naewu ọdịiche ndị ọzọ naadịbeghị anya na 'mmiri na-ada' dị mfe nke ike ndọda naakpali, naeji ọkpọkọ PVC dị mfe iji wụba mmiri naagbadata na ihuenyo plastik (nke a makwaara dị ka 'plastiki ákwà'), nke a naeme ka ọ bụrụ ihe siri ike iji kwe ka algae jikọta
Nihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nọnọdụ ọ bụla, ihe ndị a naeme nụlọ naebelata ihe oriri naedozi ahụ ruo nókè dị ala, nke a belatara ma ọ bụ wepụ nsogbu niile naenye nsogbu algae
Na mgbakwunye, algae 'turf', nke bụ ihe a naelekwasị anya na nhazi bọket nke Dr
Adey, ejiri 'algae ntutu na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ dochie ya
Nke a bụ n'ihi na algae turf naadịkarị naacha nchara nchara ma sie ike (dị ka ahịhịa aka mere nọhịa egwuregwu), ọ naegbochi ìhè na mmiri iru na ihuenyo
Nke a na-eme ka uto (na nzacha) nke algae ghara ịdị ngwa nihi na ala ala ala nke algae nke ejikọtara na ihuenyo naamalite ịnwụ ma pụọ

Algae naacha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, Otú ọ dị (karịsịa algae naenweghị ntutu naacha anụnụ anụnụ), naenye ohere ka ìhè na mmiri banye nụzọ niile ruo na ihuenyo ma ọ bụrụ na a naeme ka uto ahụ ghara ịdị arọ 20 mm, nke naenye algae ohere ito ngwa ngwa ma naamịkọrọ ihe ndị ọzọ naedozi ahụ nenweghị ọnwụ ma ghara ịhapụ njikọ na ihuenyo ahụ
Nke a bụ ihe ọma nihi na algae ntutu naacha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ bụ kpọmkwem ụdị algae nke naeto nonwe ya na algae scrubber e wuru nke ọma
Ụdị ụfọdụ naejikwa ikuku ikuku naaga nelu
Ụdị a, nke bụ kpọmkwem ihe megidere nsụda mmiri ahụ, naenye ohere itinye algae scrubber nokpuru mmiri na aquarium, sump ma ọ bụ ọdọ mmiri, kama nelu ya
Nke a naeme ka owuwu dị mfe nke ukwuu, ebe ọ bụ na ngwaọrụ ahụ adịghị mkpa ka mmiri ghara ịba, ọ naenyekwa ohere itinye scrubber nime ebe siri ike ebe enweghị ohere nelu akara mmiri
Nhazi ahụ naemekwa ka algae ghara ịcha ma ọ bụrụ na ike adaa, nihi na algae niile dị nokpuru mmiri, na nhazi ahụ naewepụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe niile naawụfu

Nhazi ụfụfụ naagbadata nụdị atọ ndị naarapara na ma naegbuke egbuke site na iko aquarium (ma ọ bụ sump); ndị naese nelu aquarium, sump ma ọ bụ ọdọ mmiri; na ndị naaga kpamkpam nokpuru mmiri dị ka ụgbọ mmiri
Nozuzu, ma e wezụga maka ụdị nzacha naaga nihu ma ọ bụ nsụgharị naaga naaga nke ọma, ndị naehichapụ algae chọrọ ka ewepụ algae ('a naewepụta') oge ụfọdụ site na scrubber
Iwepụ algae a nwere mmetụta nke iwepụ ihe oriri naadịghị mma na mmiri nihi na algae jiri ihe oriri na mmiri ahụ iji too
A naewepụkarị algae ma ọ bụ
Maka nsụgharị nke nsụda mmiri, a naewepụ ihuenyo ahụ na paịpụ ma sachaa ya na mmiri naagba ọsọ
A naewepụkwa ọkpọkọ ahụ, a naejikwa brọsh ezé hichaa oghere ahụ, iji wepụ algae ọ bụla toro na ya
Mgbe ewepụchara algae, a naetinye ihuenyo na ọkpọkọ nime scrubber
Maka nsụgharị upflow, usoro nhicha naadabere na ụdị
Ụdị naejikọta na iko A naewepụ akụkụ magnet dị nèzí iko ahụ, a naeweli akụkụ dị nime mmiri
Ọ bụrụ na uto ahụ bụ algae naacha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, mgbe ahụ, a naewepụ ya naanị aka

Ọ bụrụ na uto ahụ bụ ntutu naacha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ (dị ka ọ na-eme na mmiri dị ọcha) ma ọ bụ ihe gbara ọchịchịrị, mgbe ahụ, a naeburu ihe dị n'ime ya banye nime mmiri ma jiri brọsh ezé sachaa ya
Mgbe a sachara ya, a naetinye akụkụ dị n'ime na nèzí n'ebe ọ dị na iko ahụ
Ụdị elu naese nelu mmiri Ọ bụrụ na uto ahụ bụ algae ntutu naacha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ mgbe ahụ, a naewepụ ya site niji aka welie mkpuchi LED ma wepụ uto ahụ
Ọ bụrụ na uto ahụ bụ ntutu naacha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ ma ọ bụ ihe naacha ọchịchịrị, mgbe ahụ, a naeburu akụkụ ahụ naese nelu mmiri gaa na sink ma jiri brọsh ezé sachaa ya
