Alice Patrick (amụrụ n'afọ 1948) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na onye na-ese onyinyo
Ọbọdọ Los Angeles na-amata ihe osise ya dị ka nke mbụ nwanyị Africa-America sere n'ime ọbọdọ ahụ
A mụrụ Patrick ma zụlite ya na Los Angeles ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ mbụ na Art Center College of Design ma mesịa na Otis Art Institute Ọ bụkwa ónyé bụbu ónyé nkụzi nka ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị
Patrick bụ akụkụ nke Citywide Mural Project na Los Angeles
O sere ihe na South Los Angeles, Otú ọ dị, mgbidi ya nke ụmụ nwanyị akụkọ ihe méré eme na Black History, nke e dechara n'etiti afọ ndị 1970, bibiri n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbè ọ gwụchara
Otu n'ime mgbidi ya ndị ọzọ, 'Women Do Get Weary (but They Don't Give Up' (1991) bụ nke Social and Public Art Resource Center (SPARC) kwadoro
Ihe osise ahụ na-egosi ihe oyiyi nke Mary McCleod Bethune, Dorothy Height, Oprah Winfrey, Josephine Baker na ndị ọzọ
Patrick sere onwe ya n'ime mgbidi ahụ
Mgbidi ahụ dị ihe dị ka mita itoolu site na mita iri na isii ma na-ese ya na acrylic na stucco
N'afọ 2013, SPARC weghachiri mgbidi ahụ iji dozie ihe osise ahụ na-acha anụnụ anụnụ
N'afọ ndị 1990 Patrick na-ere obere mbipụta nke ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na-etinye aka na mmegharị ikike ọbọdọ
Cooper's Originals, ụlọ ngosi ihe nkiri dị na Los Angeles, nyèrè aka kwalite ọrụ ya, na-ere ihe osise ya
Mgbè e mesịrị, ọ meghere ụlọ ngosi nke ya a na-akpọ Aliceland, nke ọ gbara afọ iri
Alice Taylor Gafford (ubochí irí na isé n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1886 rụo ubochí irí abụọ na asaá n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1981) bụ ónyé nọọsụ America, onye nkuzi, na ónyé na-ese ihe, nke bi na Los Angeles
A mụrụ Alice Taylor na Tecumseh, Kansas, otu n'ime ụmụ iri
Nné na nnà ya bụ Benjamin na Alice Armstead Taylor
Gafford bụ onye nọọsụ afọ iri abụọ na ise tupu ọ malite ọrụ nka
Ihe a ma ama site na ọrụ mbụ ya bụ oge ọ rụrụ na American Red Cross na Alaska (1915), ma soro Daniel Hale Williams rụọ ọrụ na Chicago
Ọ kwagara Los Angeles na 1922
Ọ zụrụ na Otis Art Institute (nke a na-akpọzi Otis College of Art and Design) wee nweta asambodo nkụzi na UCLA na 1951, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na ise, ma kụzie nka na mmemme agụmakwụkwọ ndị okenye
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ọbọdọ Val Verde, na-akụzi ma na-eme ihe ngosi nka, ma na-eduzi Val Verde Women's Cultural Society
A na-egosikarị ọrụ ya, nke ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ndụ ma ọ bụ ihe nkiri ala, n'afọ ndị ikpeazụ ya
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 81, ọ natara ọrụ ise foto nke ndị Africa America iri na abụọ a ma ama, maka ngosi na ụlọ ọrụ Family Savings and Loan Association na Los Angeles
Gafford sonyere n'ịtọ ntọala Los Angeles Negro Art Association na 1937, na ụlọ ngosi Eleven Associated Artists (mgbe e mesịrị Art West Association) na etiti Los Angeles
Ndị na-ese ihe na Los Angeles na-adịte aka gụnyere ndị Africa America Beulah Woodard, William Pajaud na ónyé China America na-ese egwu Tyrus Wong
A kpọrọ ya 'ónyé isi nke ndị na-ese ihe ojii na Los Angeles' iji kwado idu ndú ọbọdọ ya
Ihe osise mmanụ ya bụ akụkụ nke ihe ngosi Negro History Week na Doheny Library na 1953
Alice Taylor lụrụ Louis Sherman Gafford, ónyé agha nke Agha Ụwa Mbụ, na 1928
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1959, ma kwụsị ise ihe n'afọ 1975, mgbe ọ nwesịrị ọrịa anya
Alice Taylor Gafford nwụrụ na 1981, mgbe ọ dị afọ 95, e lie ozu ya na Los Angeles National Cemetery
A maara Gafford màkà ọrụ ya n'ịtọ ntọala na ịzụlite ọtụtụ ìgwè nka na ndịda California, gụnyere ihe ngosi nka Val Verde kwa afọ, nke e mechara gụọ aha ya
A na-echeta ya dị ka nwanyị Africa-America na-ese ihe na Los Angeles, yana dị ka onye na-ese egwu nke ghọrọ ónyé na-arụpụta ihe karịsịa mgbe ọ dị agadi
A na-anọchite anya ya site na ihe osise na nchịkọta nke Mahadum Howard, Long Beach Museum of Art, na Bowers Museum, n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ
Alicia Abella bụ injinia America
Ọ jere ozi na Commission Advisory President on Educational Excellence for Hispanics, ma natala akara mmụta mahadum Columbia
Na 2011, a kpọbatara ya na WITI Hall of Fame
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na mahadum New York yana MS, MPhil, na PhD na Mahadum Columbia
Ọ lụrụ Aleksandar Timcenko, onye ọkachamara ego nke ga-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na DE Shaw na Goldman Sachs
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ na-arụ ọrụ site na Bell Labs, ebe ọ ga-erute onye isi nchịkwa nke Ụlọ Ọrụ Na-ahụ Maka Nnyocha Ọrụ Innovative, ma mesịa jikwaa usoro nyocha Cloud Services
Na afọ 2010, akwụkwọ akụkọ azụmahịa Hispanic kpọrọ Abella otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ise kachasị elu n'afọ
N'afọ 2013, e nyere ya ihe nrite nke kacha mma na Mahadum Columbia
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya na Kọmitii Ndụmọdụ Onye isi ala na Ọkachamara Ọzụzụ maka Ndị Hispanik
O nwetala ihe nrite sitere na ogbako Women of Color STEM
Abella bụkwa onye Latinos na Science Sciences na Technology Association nyekwara ya onyinye Nduzi nke Afọ
Na 2020, ọ sonyeere Google dị ka onye isi njikwa maka Telecom, ihie onyonyo na ihie egwuregwu Industry Solutions
Alide Dasnois (amụrụ 1950) bụ onye odeakụkọ South Afriika na onye nchịkọta akụkọ
Dasnois gụrụ akwụkwọ na Herschel Girls School wee gụchaa nzere bachelọ na akụnụba na Mahadum Cape Town
O nwetara nzere masta na Sorbonne (Université Paris I - Panthéon Sorbonne) na mmepe akụ na ụba
N'ime etiti afọ 1980 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye ntụgharị na Paris
Na 1988, ọ kwagara Reunion Island ịrụ ọrụ na Témoignages
N'afọ 1992, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na The Argus na Cape Town ebe ọ deziri ngalaba azụmahịa tupu ọ ghọọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ maka Personal Finance (Cape Town)
N'afọ 2001, ọ kwagara Johannesburg wee bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ Akuko Azụmaahịa, tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ Pretoria News maka otu afọ n'afọ 2006
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye nchịkọta akụkọ Cape Times site na Disemba 2006 ruo Eprel 2009, mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nwanyị mbụ nke Cape Times
Ewepụrụ Dasnois na ọkwa ya dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ Cape Times na ngwụcha izu ụka nke 6 Disemba 2013, obere oge ka Sekunjalo Investments Limited nwetachara akwụkwọ akụkọ Cape Times
Na nzaghachi na ebubo na mwepụ ya bụ maka mmegwara maka akụkọ dị na Cape Times na-akọ nchoputa nke Onye Nchebe Ọha na- akparị ndị Sekunjalo Group, onye isi oche
Iqbal Surve wepụtara nkwupụta mgbasa ozi na-egosi na mwepụ ya bụ maka 'n'okpuru arụmọrụ' na ọdịda na 'ọrụ ntụkwasị obi' ya

Mwepụ nke Dasnois dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ na iyi egwu metụtara nke Sekunjalo ewepụtala nkwupụta nkwado maka ya na nchegbu maka nnwere onwe nchịkọta akụkọ na Cape Times si Index on Censorship, International Federation of Journalists, SA Center for PEN International, na SA National Editors Forum, Freedom of Expression Institute, na Right2Know Mgbasa Ozi
Dasnois meriri ihe nrite nke afọ 2014 Nat Nakasa maka obi ike na iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe na akwụkwọ akụkọ sitere na SA National Editors' Forum, Nieman Foundation na Print na Digital Media SA
N'okwu ha, ndị ọka ikpe - Joe Thloloe, Peter Sullivan na Simphiwe Sesanti - kwuru na ya 'egosipụtala àgwà niile achọrọ iji nweta ihe nrite a, dị ka obi ike, iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe na obi ike'
'Nke a ọ gosipụtara n'ọrụ ya dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Cape Times, ọnọdụ nke ndị nwe akwụkwọ akụkọ nwere ahụ iru ala na nso nso a
Ihe kpatara ewepụrụ ya bụ na ọ naghị enye mkpuchi maka ọnwụ onye isi ala South Africa Nelson Mandela

Ọtụtụ ndị jụrụ ya ihe kpatara ya, na-ekwu na ịkwaga ndị isi ya na mbipụta ya nke akụkọ - n'otu ụbọchị ahụ wepụrụ ya - site n'aka Onye Nchebe Ọha, Thuli Madonsela, bụ onye chọtara Minista Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries, Tina Joemat-Petterson
ikpe maka 'omume na-ezighi ezi na mmechi' na inye onyinye ego ruru nde R800 n'oge niile nye ndị Sekunjalo Consortium
'Ndị na-akwado Dasnois rụtụrụ aka na n'okpuru nchịkọta akụkọ ya, Cape Times kwụrụ Madiba ụtụ na mbipụta nke gburugburu
Mkpuchi nke ọnwụ Madiba bụ otu n'ime ihe mkpuchi 15 Mandela zuru ụwa ọnụ karịsịa nke magazin Time jara mma'
Aha Alim (ʿAlīm عليم, nke a na-akpọkwa Aleem) bụ otu n'ime aha Chineke na Islam, nke pụtara 'Onye maara ihe niile'
A na-ejikwa ya dị ka aha onwe onye, dị ka ụdị dị mkpirikpi nke Abdul Alim, 'Onye Ohu nke Ihe Ọha Nile'
Alimi Adewale (amụrụ na Mee 8, 1974) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe na n'oge a
Mana mmasị ya na nka na ihe ngosi kpaliri mmasị ya ịghọ onye na-ese ihe
Ọrụ ya na-enyocha nsogbu obodo ukwu, akwụkwọ nke ndị obodo kwa ụbọchị na isiokwu esemokwu nke 'Nudes in African Art' dị ka ụdị okwu

Alimosho bụ ógbè Gọmentị Obodo dị na Lagos Steeti, Naịjirịa nke nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị elu nke ihe dị ka 3,082,900 nke bụ dịka ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ si dị Nkọwa ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ nke afọ 2006 kwuru na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ dị na afo 1,288,714 (ma Gọọmenti Lagos Steeti kwuru na ọnụnọ dị ka afọ 2006 n'ime LGA karịrị nde mmadụ abụọ)
E kewara ya ugbu a n'etiti ọtụtụ mpaghara mmepe obodo (LCDA)
Mgbanwe nke LCDA malitere mgbe nchịkwa nke Bola Ilori, onye bụ onyeisi oche ikpeazụ nke otu Alimosho Local Government
Nkewa isii e kere site na Alimosho ochie bụ Agbado/Oke-odo LCDA, Ayobo/Ipaja LCDA، Alimosho LG, Egbe/Idimu LCDA
LGA nwere obodo ukwu nke Egbeda / Akowonjo
E guzobere Alimosho na afọ 1945 ma ọ dị n'okpuru mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ (n'oge ahụ)
Ndị bi na Alimosho bụ ndị Egbados
Mpaghara ahụ bara ọgaranya na ọdịbendị, nke a ma ama n'etiti ha bụ ememme Oro, Igunnu na Egungun kwa afọ
Okpukpe abụọ bụ Islam na Iso Ụzọ Kraịst
A na-asụ asụsụ Yoruba n'ọtụtụ obodo
Odeakwụkwọ mbụ nke Alimosho bụ ụlọ nwere okpukpu abụọ nke dị n'okporo ámá Council, ugbu a na Egbe / Idimu LCDA
m kwuru na LGA bụ nke kachasị eme mkpọtụ na Lagos State
Alimosho General Hospital 3
Alimosho General Hospital 2
Bola Ahmed Tinubu Primary Health Center, Alimosho
Àtụ Divisions and LGAs of Lagos State
Mallam Aliyu Mai-Bornu (1919 - 23 Febụwarị 1970) bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba, na Gọvanọ mbụ nke Central Bank of Nigeria
A mụrụ Mai-Bornu n'obodo Yola site na nne na nna Kanuri
Nna ya bụ onye kansụl na Lamido Native Authority ma na mbụ megidere ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ Mai-Bornu ruo mgbe Lamido mere ka o nye Mai-Bornu ohere
Mai-Bornu gara Yola Elementary School, Yola Middle School, ma nabata ya na Kaduna College na 1938, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1942 dị ka onye nkụzi asụsụ Bekee

Ọ malitere ọrụ nkuzi ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ ya, Yola Middle School site na 1942–1946 tupu ọ gaa n'otu n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ ya, Kaduna College (1946–1952) ma n'oge na-adịghị anya sonye na Northern Teachers Association
N'afọ 1952, ọ laghachiri Yola dị ka osote onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ Yola Middle School ma mesịa hapụ Yola ka ọ bụrụ onye nkuzi ụlọ na Veterinary School na Vom ruo ọnwa ise
O nwetara agụmakwụkwọ gọọmentị iji gaa mba ọzọ ma gụọ Economics na Mahadum Bristol dị na United Kingdom na-agụsị akwụkwọ na 1957
Mai-Bornu laghachiri Naịjirịa wee nweta ọkwa dị ka onye ọrụ nchịkwa na Northern Nigeria Public Service (1957–1959) na-eje ozi na Public Service Commission na Ministry of Finance and Trade
Mgbe Central Bank malitere ọrụ na 1959, e nyere ya ọrụ na Central Bank of Nigeria dị ka osote odeakwụkwọ
Ọ gbagoro n'ọkwa ngwa ngwa site na osote odeakwụkwọ ruo osote odeakwụkwọ, mgbe ahụ odeakwụkwọ
N'afọ 1962, ọ ghọrọ onye Naijiria mbụ a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ osote gọvanọ
Na Julaị 25, 1963, a họpụtara Mai-Bornu ka ọ bụrụ Gọvanọ nke Central Bank (1963–1967)
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ụlọ akụ ahụ, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi na onye isi njikwa nke ụlọ ọrụ ụtaba Naịjirịa (1967–1969)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Board of Directors nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 23rd nke February, 1970
Ihe osise ya dị na mpempe akwụkwọ 1,000 Naira nke e mere ka ọ gbasaa na October 12, 2005

Aliza Ayaz bụ onye na-ahụ maka ihu igwe nke mba ụwa, na onye nnọchi anya United Nations Goodwill

O jikọtara aka wee merie United Kingdom Youth Outstanding Commitment to Sustainability Award na University College London (UCL), ma kwuo okwu na United Nations, London International Model United Nations, na ihe omume UK Parliamentary

Ọ bụ onye otu National Youth Council Pakistan A maara ya maka ịmepụta Climate Action Society na UCL nke nyere aka kpalie ndị ntorobịa UK niile na-eme ihe megide mgbanwe ihu igwe, na-eduga na nkwupụta mberede ihu igwe na UK Parliament
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2020, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya ndị ntorobịa nke United Nations maka Goal 13 (SDG13), nwa akwụkwọ Pakistani nke abụọ na-esote Malala Yousafzai natara nsọpụrụ a
A mụrụ Ayaz na Dubai na mba United Arab Emirates, ma biri ọtụtụ ndụ ya na Middle East
Tupu ọ kwaga London, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Karachi Grammar School na Dubai British School
Ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ ugbu a na Mahadum College London maka nzere bachelọ ya
Mgbe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ, Ayaz guzobere otu Climate Action Society (CAS) na UCL na 2018
Ayaz na-eduzi usoro nzukọ, ogbako, mkpọsa na London na 'Sustainability Symposium' kwa afọ nke a na-akwado na UCL iji tinye ndị ntorobịa UK n'ịkwalite maka ihu igwe

Ayaz haziri ọmụmụ ihe iji kpalie mgbanwe dị mma na omume metụtara ihu igwe na ọtụtụ ndị ọkachamara nyere ya mmasị iji dozie mmetụta ahụike mgbanwe ihu igwe dị ka ihe na-apụta na-akpata ọrịa nke pụtara ìhè n'oge ọmụmụ ya

Ya na ndị otu ya na Climate Action Society, a maara ya ka ọ kwadoro ọdịiche na itinye aka na ọgụ megide mgbanwe ihu igwe site na ịhazi nri abalị na nzukọ netwọk BME; a kpọrọ Ayaz ka ọ bịa na mkparịta ụka gburugburu nke gọọmentị site na Lola Young, Baroness Young nke Hornsey
Ọ bụ ya webatara 'Sustainability Symposium' nke mbụ na UK nke meriri onyinye Students' Union 'Event of the Year'
Echiche nke Symposium na-ejikọta ọzụzụ dị iche iche dị ka injinia na nka iji sonye na ibelata na ime mgbanwe na mmetụta nke mgbanwe ihu igwe
Ayaz rụrụ ọrụ na UK Kickstart Scheme na Rishi Sunak (Chancellor of the Exchequer na HM Treasury), na-enye ndị were mmadụ n'ọrụ ego iji mepụta ọrụ maka ndị dị afọ 16 ruo 24 na Universal Credit
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ na-etinye aka na UK Green Homes Grant nyere mmasị ya maka ịlụso ịda ogbenye mmanụ ụgbọala na ikuku carbon ọgụ
Ayaz bi na London, England na ndị enyi na ezinụlọ mana ọ na-eme njem mgbe niile
Ọ na-eto nne na nna ya Mohammad Ayaz na Dr
Rana Najmi maka ihe ịga nke ọma na mkpali ya
Ayaz na-etinye aka na atụmatụ iwu ahụike zuru ụwa ọnụ na ngalaba UCL n'okpuru Vice-Provost (Health) David Lomas
Ọ debanyere aha ya ugbu a na mmemme agụmakwụkwọ maka Population Health Sciences na UCL
O dere banyere iwu carbon-neutrality nke ọtụtụ mahadum
Ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke atọ na ndepụta 30 under 30 nke Pakistan Daily na 2021
Ayaz etinyela aka na Ayaz Rana Foundation, ọrụ ebere malitere na 2022 iji nye ndị ogbenye na ndị ogbenye enyemaka

Ebidoro All Bengal Women's Union na afọ1932, ógè otu ogbako ụmụ nwanyị nọ na West Bengal guzobere otu ụmụ nwanyị nwere otú echiche iji nyere ụmụ nwanyị ibe ha na-enweghị enyemaka, ndị a na-erigbu ma na-emegbu aka
Mbido nke otu ahụ dị n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na ịzụ ahịa ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka amụbaala ruo n'ókè na-enweghị atụ na West Bengal na mpaghara Calcutta na NGO bụ mbọ iji dozie nsogbu ahụ
N'etiti Agha Ụwa abụọ, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri na ndị agha amụbaala nke ukwuu ma ahịa anụ ahụ chọtara ahịa dị njikere ma gbasaa na Calcutta
Emere iwu Calcutta Suppression of Immoral Traffic Act na Children Act iji mee ka ndị uwe ojii nwee ike ịnapụta ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka n'ụlọ akwụna
Maazị J
Basu, onye ọka iwu a ma ama na onye ọrụ ebere, debere iwu ọhụrụ akpọrọ The Bengal Suppression of Immoral Traffic Bill n'ihu ndị omebe iwu Bengal na 1932
Kansụl ndị isi ala Bengal nke ụmụ nwanyị na ọgbakọ ọgbakọ ụmụ nwanyị Bengal niile kpebiri ka ha guzobe ọgbakọ kwụụrụ onwe ya maka Mgbochi nke okporo ụzọ rụrụ arụ na Bengal
Òtù a malitere na aha All Bengal Women's Union ma debanye aha n'okpuru Iwu XXI nke 1860
All Bengal Women's Union nwere njikọ na International Abolitionist Federation, Geneva
Na 1 Eprel 1933, e nyere iwu ahụ
Romola Sinha, onye guzobere ya bụ onye isi oche mbụ nke Central Social Welfare Board na West Bengal
N'ime ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ a ma ama nyere onyinye dị ukwuu na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ Smt Maneck Modi, Smt Sheila Davar na Oriakụ Bela Sen
Nleta nke Princess Anne (na Jenụwarị 2007) bụ ihe omume dị mkpa na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Oriakụ Davar ghọrọ onye isi oche nke klọb ahụ mgbe Oriakụ Sinha nwụrụ
O guzobekwara Bustee Welfare Society nke dị na Lovelock Place
Oriakụ Bela Sen bụ onye isi oche nke Ngalaba mmepụta ihe ruo ogologo oge
Ọtụtụ NGO dị ka Save the Children Fund na-enyere All Bengal Women's Union aka n'ọrụ ha
Ọrụ ndị bụ isi nke nzukọ ahụ bụ
All Nigeria People's Party (ANPP) bu otu political party no n'ime government Naigeria
Nde na nwere ndi ruru asaa bu governors na states no la Naigeria

Allalou (March 30, 1902 - February 18, 1992) bụ onye Algeria na-ede ihe nkiri egwuregwu, onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri a maara dị ka nna nke ihe nkiri na Algeria
A mụrụ Allalou Ali Sellali na Machị 3, 1902, na Casbah nke Algiers
Allalou onye nna ya nwụrụ n'oge ọ dị obere malitere ịrụ ọrụ iji kwado ezinụlọ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ere ọgwụ, onye na-ere akwụkwọ na onye ọrụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè
Mmasị ya na ihe ngosi nka gosipụtara onwe ya n'oge
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ọ malitere ịgagharị na Foyer du soldat ebe ọ na-akpọ egwu ma na-abụ abụ (ọ bụ onye na-agụ egwu na-atọ ọchị), na-aghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ matara ihe nkiri n'oge ọ dị obere
Ọ gara galas Karsenty na ihe ngosi nke Georges Abiad na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Egypt nke Azzedine na mmalite afọ iri abụọ
Nzukọ a na ihe nkiri nyere ya echiche ịmepụta ihe nkiri
N'ihi ya, ọ malitere imepụta ihe osise nke na-ekwu maka isiokwu ndị sitere na ndụ kwa ụbọchị alụmdi na nwunye, ịgba alụkwaghịm, ịṅụbiga mmanya ókè
A gụnyekwara isiokwu ndị a n'egwuregwu ndị e mere mgbe 1926 gasịrị
Mmekọrịta ya na ndị Europe na ọkachasị Edmond Yafil, nnukwu onye maara egwu oge ochie nke Algeria nke tinyere ndụ ya na mmepe nke nka a, mere ka ọ ghọta ma nwee ekele maka egwu
Allalou nwụrụ na Febụwarị 20, 1992, na Algiers
Allan Rohan Crite (ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Machị, 1910 rụo ụbọchị isii n'ọnwa Septemba, 2007) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe n'Afrịka America nke bi na Boston
O meriri ọtụtụ nsọpụrụ, dị ka 350th Harvard University Anniversary Medal
A mụrụ Crite na North Plainfield, New Jersey, na Machị 20, 1910
Ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Massachusetts ma site na otu afọ ruo ọnwụ ya Crite bìrì na South End nke Boston
Nne Crite, Annamae, bụ ónyé na-ede uri nkè gbara nwa ya nwoke ume ise ihe
N'igosi nkwa mgbè ọ dị obere, ọ debanyere aha na Children's Art Centre na United South End Settlements na Boston ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na English High School na 1929
Nnà ya, Oscar William Crite, bụ dọkịta na injinia, otu n'ime ndị isi ojii mbụ nwetara ikikere injinia
Ọ bụ ezie na a nabatara ya na Yale School of Art, ọ họọrọ ịga School of the Museum of Fine Arts na Boston ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1936
Nkwado bịara n'oge
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na mbụ na Museum of Modern Art nkè New York na 1936
Crite gara Harvard Extension School, ebe o nwetara nzèrè BA na 1968
Crite nwèrè olile anya igosi ndụ ndị Africa America bi na Boston n'ụzọ ọhụrụ na nke dị iche dị ka ụmụ amaala nkịtị ma ọ bụ 'ndị nọ n'etiti' karịa ndị na-eti egwu jazz ma ọ bụ ndị na-ekere òkè
Site na nka ya, o bu n'obi ịkọ akụkọ ndị Africa America dị ka akụkụ nke ihe ndị America na eziokwu ya
Site n'iji ụdị nnọchiteanya karịa nke ógè a, Crite chere na ọ nwèrè ike 'ịkọ akụkọ' nke ọma ma weghara eziokwu nke ndị Africa America bụ akụkụ ma na-abụkarị nke a na-amaghị
Akwụkwọ ndị Crite sere ihe na-agụnye
Ihe ngosi ndị dị mkpà nke Crite gụnyere
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'usoro ihe ngosi a haziri ahazi na 2007-08, na Boston Public Library, Boston Athenaeum, na Museum of the National Center of Afro-American Artists
Alleluya Rosette Ikote bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye bụbu onye omeiwu
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya nwanyị maka Pallisa District na National Resistance Council (1989 - 1996) na onye omeiwu (1997 - 2001) maka otu mpaghara ahụ na omeiwu nke isii nke Uganda
Ikote sonyere na ntuli aka nke Uganda n'afọ 1989 ma bụrụ onye nnọchi anya nwanyị maka Pallisa District na 1989 National Resistance Council (NRC)
Ka oge na-aga, ọ sonyeere National Resistance Movement (NRM), ọ sonyere na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Uganda na 1996 ma nọchite anya otu mpaghara ahụ na ndị omeiwu nke isii nke Uganda (1997 - 2001)
Jennifer Namuyangu nọchiri ya bụ onye meriri ya na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Uganda nke afọ 2001
Ikote rụrụ ọrụ na Nairobi dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Amani Forum
E mechara họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ onye njikwa mmemme ọchịchị nke United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) na South Sudan

Allen Dester Carter (úbọchị irí abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Juun, 1947 rụo ụbọchị irí na asatọ n'ọnwa Disemba, 2008), nke a maara dị ka 'Big Al' Carter, bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na Alexandria, Virginia na ónyé nkụzi nka ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze na Washington, DC

Mgbè The Washington Post Magazine depụtara ya na Mee 2006, Carter mere atụmatụ na o nwere ọrụ puku iri abụọ nke ihe osise 'site na ihe osise dị mgbagwoju anya ruo nnukwu ihe osise ụbọchị na oghere narị itoolu square-foot ebe ọ bi
Carter nwetara nzèrè Bachelor of Fine Arts na Columbus College of Art and Design na Ohio na 1972, wee laghachi Washington iji rụọ ọrụ post-graduate ma kụzie na Mahadum America
N'afọ 1995, ọ natara nzèrè Honorary Master of Fine Arts, site na Columbus College of Art and Design

N'oge ndụ ya, Carter gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ebe na gallery na ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie - na-emekarị gburugburu Mid Atlantic - gụnyere n'ihe ngosi ya na ndị isi na-ese ihe n'Afrịka America, gụnyere ónyé na-ese foto na onye na-eme ihe nkírí Romare Bearden

O gosikwara na Corcoran Gallery of Art na Freer Gallery of Art, ma na Washington, DC; Virginia Museum of Fine Arts na Richmond; Southeastern Center for Contemporary Art na Winston-Salem, North Carolina; Portsmouth Museum na Virginia; Cameron Art Museum na Wilmington, NC; na Alexandria Black History Museum na Alexandria, VA
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbè ọ nwụsịrị, e mere ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya na Mahadum Vanderbilt Curb Center for Art, Enterprise and Public Policy
N'afọ 2015, e gosipụtara ihe osise ya iri asatọ, ihe ọkpụkpụ, ihe osise, na nchịkọta ya na Arizona State University Art Museum
E mere ihe ngosi n'oge na-adịbeghị ányá na 2019 na Fred Schnider Gallery of Art na Arlington, VA
Ihe osise Carter dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide na Smithsonian Museum na Corcoran Gallery of Art, ma na Washington, DC
O mekwara mgbidi ọha na eze na Roanoke, VA, Washington, DC, Asheville, NC, Raleigh, NC, na Winston-Salem, NC
E nyere Carter mkpịsị ugodi Kansas City màkà obodo ahụ, Virginia Museum of Fine Arts Professional Fellowship, na DC Commission on the Arts & Humanities Artist-In-Residence award
Ọrụ Carter dọtara ọtụtụ otuto n'oge ọrụ ya, ma 'ekweghị ka egosiputa ọrụ nka ya na isi obodo nka nke mba ahụ, New York, ebe ọ gaara achọta aha ọma na ụgwọ ọrụ ka ukwuu
'Ihe osise Carter bụ protein, obi buru ibu, ọ dịghị mgbe ọ na-eme ihe ọchị, ' Onye nkatọ Washington Post bụ Paul Richard dere banyere ihe ngosi 1985 na gallery mpaghara
'Warmth na-esi na mgbidi na-awụfu
Ịga n'ime gallery bụ ịnakwere Big Al makụọ
Nnyocha New York Times nke afọ 1990 kwuru na ihe osise ya 'na-atụ aro nnwere onwe na-enweghị njedebe, nke a na-apụghị ịchịkwa achịkwa
[a] ụwa dị mgbagwoju anya nke eziokwu, nrọ na nka'
Allen Catherine Kagina bụ onye Uganda | Ugandan nchịkwa
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Uganda National Roads Authority (UNRA)
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwá ahụ na 27 April 2015
Tupu nke ahụ, site na 2004 ruo 2014, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Commissioner General nke Uganda Revenue Authority (URA)
A mụrụ ya na Rukungiri District, Western Region nke Uganda, na 1961 nye Hezron na Catherine Kakuyo
Kagina gụrụ akwụkwọ na Gayaza High School, onye a ma ama, nkeonwe, ịbanye, ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị niile
O nwere nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na akparamaagwa nke enwetara na Mahadum Makerere, mahadum ọha na eze kacha ochie na Uganda
O jikwa nzere Master of Public Administration nwetara na mahadum Liverpool dị na United Kingdom
Allen Ifechukwu Onyema // (gee ntị CON (amụrụ n'afọ 1964) bụ onye ọka iwu Naijiria na onye ọchụnta ego
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Air Peace, nke o guzobere na 2013
A mụrụ ya na Machị 1964 na Benin City nye Michael na Helen Onyema dịka nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ itoolu
Ọ bụ onye Anambra Steeti, Naịjirịa
Allen mụrụ iwu na Mahadum Ibadan ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1987
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu Naịjirịa ma kpọọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka iwu n'afọ 1989
Ọ gara ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ gụnyere Government College, Ughelli, Delta steeti
Ọ hapụrụ Government College na 1984 mgbe ọ nwetara asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya ma nye ya nnabata kpọmkwem iji gụọ iwu na Mahadum Premier nke Nigeria, Mahadum Ibadan n'otu afọ ahụ
Ọ bụ na Mahadum Ibadan ka agụụ ya maka udo mere ka ọ duru otu ụmụakwụkwọ itoolu ndị ọzọ gaa obodo ochie nke Zaria iji kwụsị ọgba aghara okpukpe na agbụrụ nke gburu ndụ

N'ihi mgbasa ozi ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya nwetara mgbe ha laghachiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ha, ịnụ ọkụ n'obi ha toro ma nke amere ka e guzobe otu a maara mgbe ahụ dị ka Eminent Friends 'Group - otu e guzobere na ebumnuche nke ịkwalite nkwekọrịta agbụrụ n'etiti mba dị iche iche nke Naịjirịa na ịlụ ọgụ megide ihe ike nke ụdị niile
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum na 1987, o guzobere alaka nke nzukọ ahụ na steeti niile nke njikọ ahụ
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu Naijiria n'afọ 1987, ọ jikọtara ọmụmụ ya na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na-enye nsogbu [nkọwa dị mkpa] banyere ịkpalite udo na Naijiria
N'afọ 2019, Ngalaba Ikpe Ziri Ezi nke US wepụtaraebubo megide Allen Onyema, n'ihi ịkwụ ụgwọ ego na aghụghọ ụlọ akụ
A na-ebo Onyema ebubo ịgha ụgha akwụkwọ eji azụta ụgbọelu maka Air Peace ma jiri ndị ahụ kwụọ ụgwọ ịzụta ụgbọala okomoko na ịzụ ahịa dị elu
Onyema na-agọnahụ ebubo ndị a
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2022, a ga-amalite ikpe nke onye a na-enyo enyo na ọ bụ onye na-agba izu ga-amalite n'ọnwa ọgọst afọ 2022
Allerley Glossop (1870-1955) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa nke a maara karịsịa màkà ọdịdị ala ya na ihe nkiri ọzụzụ atụrụ ya
A mụrụ Glossop Alice Glossop n'ime ezinụlọ nọ n'etiti na Twickenham, na West London, nwá nwanyị George Glossop, ónyé vicar nkè Twickenham

Glossop gụrụ ihe osise na Slade School of Fine Art na London n'okpuru Charles Holroyd na ímé ihe ngosi n'okpuru George Frampton, ma gụọ akwụkwọ n'okpuru William Mouat Loudan na Westminster School of Art
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'okpuru Arthur Elsley na Solomon Solomon, ma kụzie na ụlọ akwụkwọ nka ha dị mkpirikpi, Sphinx Studio, rụọ mgbè ọ mechiri na 1900

Glossop kwagara South Africa nà 1900, na-arụ ọrụ ụgbọ na ise ihe na Klapmuts na Western Cape, ọ bụkwa ónyé otu South African Society of Artists (SASA), na-eje ozi na Kansụl Society n'etiti 1902 na 1906

Ọ na-emekarị ka ọrụ nwoke na nwanyị e kenyere otu nwanyị ọcha na South Africa site n'iyiri uwe ụmụ nwoke (ndị enyi ya maara ya dị ka 'Joe'), na-eyi okpu okpu, na-ese anwụrụ ma na-aga naanị ya n'ime ime ọbọdọ iji see ihe
N'etiti 1902 na 1917 ọ rụrụ ọrụ ugbo na Wellington, Western Cape, na 1917 ọ kwagara Johannesburg
Glossop bụ enyị nkè ónyé na-ese ihe Madge Tennent, ónyé gosipụtara ya dị ka 'Jill nke azụmahịa niile, na nnà úkwú nke ọtụtụ n'ime ha
ónyé, ọ bụrụ na ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike, ga-etinye uwe ejiji na-acha ọcha n'elu uwe elu ya na akpụkpọ anụ dị elu, iji rute oriri na oriri na ihe ọkụkụ kama akpa

' Tennent na-ekwu na mgbè Agha Ụwa Mbụ gasịrị, Glossop gbanwere ihe osise ya màkà bọta, ntụ ọka na àkwá iji nye aka ugbo ya nri ndị ọzọ; ma kọwaa ya dị ka 'ónyé Spartan', 'Ónyé nwéré onwé ya site na okike na ọzụzụ', ónyé 'nwéré onwé ya n'anya
nwanyị dị gịrịgịrị, nwéré nnukwu ọdịmma mmadụ, na ịnụ ọkụ n'obi màkà ọrụ
nke guzo n'ụzọ ndụ, dị ka ugo na-egbuke egbuke dị njikere ife ifufe megide ihe ọ bụla na-adịghị mmá iji mee ndị na-eme na-eto eto, ndị na-adịghị ike ma ọ bụ ndị aka ha
N'afọ 1925, ọ kwagara Lion's River na kwaZulu-Natal, ma rụọ ọrụ site n'ebe ahụ rụọ mgbè ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1955

Glossop gosipụtara na South Africa na mba ofesi, gụnyere 1902-1903 SASA kwa afọ ngosi na Cape Town; 1910 ngosi nke South African Fine Arts Association, Cape Town; 1917-1919 SASA kwa ụbọchị ngosi nka, Cape Town, 1920-1924 South African Academy of Art kwa afọ ngosi, Johannesburg; 1924 British Empire Exhibition, Wembley; 1924 SASA kwa ọnwa ngosi, Cape Town
1935 ngosi nke nka oge a, South African National Gallery; 1936 SASA kwa oge a, Cape Town na ngosi nke 1937 National Art, na ngosi nka nke ógè a

A na-anọchite ányá ọrụ Glossop na Durban Art Gallery; Ann Bryant Art Gallery na East London; Albany Museum, Grahamstown; Johannesburg Art Gallery; South African National Gallery, Cape Town; Mahadum nke Cape Town; William Humphreys Art Gallery, Kimberley na Pretoria Art Museum
Alliance Française nke Lagos (French l'Alliance Française de Lagos) bụ ụlọ ọrụ Naijiria na-enweghị uru na Lagos nke Alliance Française of Paris kwadoro iwu ya
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-etinye aka na ọzụzụ na agụmakwụkwọ nke ndị Naijiria, ọkachasị ndị Lagosians n'asụsụ French ma na-anabata ihe omume ọdịnala
E guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1959
Ihe dị ka ụmụ akwụkwọ pụkụ anọ na-edebanye aha kwa afọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ maka nkụzi ha
E nwere ebe ụmụnne nwanyị iri n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke Naịjirịa gụnyere Enugu, Ibadan, Ilorin, Jos, Kano, Kaduna, Lagos, Maiduguri, Owerri na Port Harcourt
Af Lagos bụ otu n'ime njikọ aka kachasị ukwuu n'Africa
Dị ka otu n'ime netwọk ụwa nke Alliances, ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na Foundation des Alliances Françaises na Paris
Dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ na-eduga n'ịkwalite asụsụ na ọdịbendị French, ọ na-akwado ya site na Ministry of Foreign Affairs nke France
Isi oche nke Alliance Française de Lagos dị na Ikoyi tupu ọ kwaga Yaba na 1990s
Oche ahụ si Yaba laghachi Ikoyi n'afọ 2019, n'ihi nkwado pụrụ iche nke Dr Mike Adenuga onye kpebiri iwu ụlọ ọrụ ọdịbendị na asụsụ ọhụrụ
Onye isi ala France Emmanuel Macron meghere akụkụ mbụ nke ọrụ ahụ n'oge nleta ya gara nke ọma na Lagos na Julaị 2018 ma meghee ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'ụzọ zuru ezu na Mee 2019
Ọrụ ahụ, nke Baron Architecture sere, nwa nwanyị onye nkwado ahụ n'onwe ya, Ms Bella Disu na onye nduzi nke Alliance Française de Lagos, Charles Courdent sochiri
A na-ewere ya dị ka ihe owuwu magburu onwe ya, otu n'ime ụlọ kachasị mma na Lagos, na ebe ọdịnala pụrụ iche, gụnyere ụlọ nzukọ, ọbá akwụkwọ, ebe nka, ebe egwuregwu n'èzí wdg
'Nkwado' Eric Kayser, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na ebe a na-eme achịcha nke France, nwekwara ike ịchọta na Mike Adenuga Center
Af Lagos nwere alaka nke abụọ na Ikeja, n'ihi mmekọrịta ya na Ministrị Mmụta nke Lagos State
Alliance Française de Lagos anọwo na-akwado ihe omume na ememme ndị dị mkpa (igba egwú, ihe nkiri, foto -LagosPhoto-, akwụkwọ -Ake-, egwu, ihe nkiri wdg) kemgbe e meghere na 2019
Adeolu Adewumi-Zer (Managing Director)
Jaideep Goel (Executive Director)
Allianz Nigeria Insurance Ltd (nke bụbu Ensure Insurance plc) bụ ụlọ ọrụ ịnshọransị nke onwe ya na Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ National Insurance Commission nyere ya ikikere, nke bụ isi onye na-ahụ maka mkpuchi na Naịjirịa
Allianz na-ere ọrụ ịnshọransị ndụ na nke na-abụghị ndụ gụnyere ụgbọala, ụlọ, inshọransị Ndụ na agụmakwụkwọ yana atụmatụ nchekwa

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-erekwa ngwaahịa mkpuchi azụmahịa n'ozuzu ya, gụnyere ọkụ na ihe ize ndụ pụrụ iche, ohi, kọmputa na ngwá electronic niile-ihe ize ndụ, ego, iwu, nkwụghachi ụgwọ ọkachamara, igwe / osisi niile ihe ize ndụ, ndị ọrụ nkwekọrịta niile ihe izefic / iguzo, na ngwongwo-na-agafe
Enwere ike ịkpọtụrụ Allianz Insurance na ebe ndị a
E debanyere aha ya n'afọ 1993 dị ka Union Assurance Company plc, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ maliteghachiri dị ka Ensure Insurance plc n'afọ 2016
Allianz nwetara ya n'afọ 2018 ma gbanwee aha ya dị ka Allianz Nigeria Insurance plc
N'afọ 2017, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mepụtara ngụkọta ego edere nke N767 ijeri na-anọchite anya uto pasenti iri asatọ na isii karịa 2016 (N419 ijeri)
Na Mee 2018, Allianz Nigeria Insurance plc ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ nke The Allianz Group
N'ọnwa Disemba 2020, n'ikwekọ na atụmatụ ya, a rụzuru nkwekọrịta zuru oke nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na Allianz Nigeria Insurance plc kwụsịrị ịrụ ọrụ dị ka ụlọ ọrụ na-ere ahịa n'ihu ọha
Ọ ga-arụ ọrụ site ugbu a gaa n'ihu dị ka Allianz Nigeria Insurance Ltd
Allianz na-achịkwa ndị nduzi mmadụ isii
Dickie Ulu, bụ onyeisi oche nke bọọdụ ahụ
Adeolu Adewumi-Zer, bụ onye isi nchịkwa
Ose ọjị (nke a makwaara dị ka mbongo spice ma ọ bụ ose hepper) bụ ose dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka nke sitere na mkpụrụ na mkpụrụ osisi nke Aframomum danielli, A
citratum ma ọ bụ A
exscapum
Ọ bụ onye ikwu nke mkpụrụ nke paradaịs, nke enwetara site na ụdị ndị nwere njikọ chiri anya, Aframomum melegueta ma ọ bụ 'ọka nke paradaịs'
N'adịghị ka mkpụrụ nke paradaịs, nke a na-erekarị dị ka naanị mkpụrụ osisi, a na-ere ose alligator dị ka pọd dum nwere mkpụrụ (n'otu ụzọ ahụ nye onye ikwu ọzọ, black cardamom )
Osisi ndị na-enye ose alligator bụ ahịhịa ahịhịa perennial nke ezinụlọ ginger ( Zingiberaceae ), nke sitere na ebe apiti n'akụkụ oke osimiri ọdịda anyanwụ Africa

Ozugbo pọd ahụ meghere ọ kpughee mkpụrụ osisi ndị ahụ, ihe kpatara aha bekee na-esi ísì ụtọ na-apụta ìhè ka mkpụrụ osisi ahụ nwere akpụkpọ akpụkpọ ahụ na-ekpuchi ha na ọkpụkpụ nke mkpụrụ dị n'ime akpụkpọ ahụ a na- echetara azụ agụ iyi
Dị ka ose mbongo, a na-erekarị mkpụrụ nke ose alligator dị ka ọka ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ na pọd ma wepụ akpụkpọ ahụ dị n'elu
Mbongo ose na-abụkarị A
danielli ma ọ bụ A
citratum, ma nwee ísì ụtọ nke ifuru karịa A
exscapum (nke bụ isi iyi nke pọd dum)
Ọ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na nri n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka, ebe ọ na-enye ma ofe na ofe na-esi ísì ụtọ
Ọbụna n'ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Africa, ose alligator bụ ihe dị oké ọnụ ahịa, n'ihi ya, a na-eji ya eme ihe
Ọtụtụ mgbe, a na-akụ otu pọọsụ zuru ezu n'ime pestle na ngwa ngwa tupu etinye ọkara ya (tinyere ose ojii) dị ka ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na ofe West Africa ma ọ bụ osikapa sie
A pụkwara iji mkpụrụ nke paradaịs ma ọ bụ cardamom ojii dochie ose ọ bụla iji nye ụtọ na-esi ísì ụtọ

Mgbe amuru umuaka n'omenala ndi Yoruba, a na-enye ha obere uto nke ose alligator (atare) obere oge ka amuchara nwa dika otu n'ime usoro nnabata a na-achikota, a na-ejikwa ya mee ihe n'ememe nzuko omenaala
N'ala Igbo, a na-eji ose oji, ọ̀jị̀ na akị kola eme ihe n'ịkpọ aha, dị ka ihe ngosi nye ndị ọbịa, na ihe omume ọha na eze ndị ọzọ na usoro kola nut
Ndị Igbo nọ na-eri ose na-eri nri ọnụ na akị kola
N'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ emume Igbo ọ bụla, a na-enye ndị ọbịa akwụkwọ nri ose na mkpụrụ kola n'isi n'usoro ihe omume na tupu nri ma ọ bụ ntụrụndụ ọ bụla ọzọ
A na-emekọ ekpere na libations ọnụ na akị kola na ose
N'oge ọrịa Covid-19, a na-afu ya ka ọgwụ

Allina Ndebele (née Khumalo) (amụrụ n'ubochí irí n'ọnwa Disemba 1939) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-akpa ákwà na South Africa nke a maara màkà tapestries ya

A mụrụ ya na Swart Mfolozi na KwaZulu Natal Province ma mgbè ọ zụchara ọzụzụ ịbụ ónyé nọọsụ ọ nwetara ọrụ dị ka ónyé ntụgharị màkà Peder na Ulla Gowenius bụ ndị na-eguzobe ihe ga-abụ Rorke's Drift Art and Craft Centre
Ọ malitere ịkpa ákwà ngwa ngwa ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Sweden iji ghọọ ónyé nkuzi na-akpa ákwà
O mechara guzobe ụlọ ọrụ ịkpa ákwà nke ya, Khumalo's Kraal ma nweta Order of Ikhamanga na Silver na 2005
Ọ ka bi na Kraal nke Khumalo taa
A mụrụ Allina Ndebele na Ekuhlengeni Mission, na Swart Mfolozi dị nso na Vryheid, n'ihe a maara ugbu a dị ka KwaZulu Natal Province
Otu n'ime ụmụ isii, Allina Ndebele bụ nnè ya zụlitere ya, ebe nnà ya na-arụ ọrụ na Johannesburg dị ka onye ọrụ na-akwaga mbá ọzọ
Ọ nwetara asambodo Junior ya (Standard 9), wee tinye akwụkwọ màkà ọzụzụ nọọsụ na Ceza Mission Hospital na KwaZulu Natal

Ohere ịmụtakwu màkà Ndebele na-ejedebe ọ bụghị naanị site na nsogbu ego, kamakwa n'ihi Iwu Mgbasawanye nke Mmụta Mahadum,1959 nke méré ka ọ bụrụ mpụ màkà ụmụ akwụkwọ na-abụghị ndị ọcha ịdebanye aha na mahadum ndị mepere emepe n'enweghị ikike iwu sitere n'aka Minista nke Internal Affairs

N'afọ 1961, mgbè ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé a na-enye ọzụzụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ, ndị ozi ala ọzọ Lutheran nke Sweden Peder na Ulla Gowenius were ya n'ọrụ dị ka ónyé ntụgharị bụ ndị na-anwa ịmepụta ọrụ ọgwụgwọ n'ụlọ ahụ
Ndebele malitere isonye na nkuzi ọgwụgwọ ọrụ yana ntụgharị, na-agba ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ ume na ọrụ aka dị iche iche
Mgbè a jụrụ ya otú o si bịa n'ụzọ a màkà ọgwụgwọ ọrụ, ọ zaghachiri
'Agbasoro m nghọta m wee malite ịmụ ụdị nkà niile iji nyere ndị ọrịa aka site na ọgwụgwọ nka
Ịkpa ákwà masịrị m nke ọma
Enwere m obéré afọ ojuju mgbè m na-agbaso usoro a kapịrị ọnụ ma ọ bụ na-arụ ọrụ na isiokwu ndị ndị nkuzi nyéré m
Enwere m ike iche na nke ahụ abụghị ihe m
Allina Ndebele na-ekwu màkà isiokwu dịgasị iche iche na tapestries ya, na-ejikarị ọdịnala ịkọ akụkọ sitere n'ọnụ nke nne nne ya ketara

Ọ bụ ezie na Rorke's Drift nwèrè ntọala ya dị ka ọrụ ozi ala ọzọ nke Ndị Kraịst, ndị Goweniuses gbara ndị na-ese ihe na ndị na-akpa ákwà ume ịchọpụta echiche na akụkọ ndị ọzọ, site na nke onwe ma ọ bụ akụkọ ihe mere eme ruo akụkọ ọdịnala
Ọrụ Ndebele gụnyere atọ ahụ, ma na-egosipụtakarị nkọwa nke akụkọ Zulu nke nné nnè ya, Zihudele MaZulu Mhlongo gwara ya
Mpisi na ọdụm (1992) na nchịkọta nke Johannesburg Art Gallery na-enyocha otu n'ime akụkọ ndị a
Mgbè ọ hapụsịrị na Kraal nke Khumalo, ihe oyiyi Zulu siri ike pụtara n'ọrụ ya, na isiokwu ndị dị ka mmiri dị ka ndụ na-enye ike na nhazi nke ebe obibi Zulu
Ndebele na-etinye aka n'ịkọ akụkọ onwe ónyé The Tree of Life ma ọ bụ Isihlahla Sempilo na Zulu, bụ otu n'ime ihe atụ dị otú ahụ, nke e nyèrè iwu na 1985
Mantis Wedding bụ akụkụ banyéré nkewa Allina Ndebele na di ya, ma na-akọ akụkọ banyéré ịhụnanya dị n'etiti mantis na-ekpe ekpere na nnụnụ, nke na-eri mantis mgbè agbamakwụkwọ ha gasịrị
Akụkụ ya kachasị ukwuu, Nqakamatshe and His Muti Magics [sic] (1999), e nyèrè ya ọrụ màkà MTN Art Collection ma tụọ 200 x 450 cm

A na-edebe ọrụ Allina Ndebele na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nnukwu ebe ngosi nka South Africa ọ bụla, yana mbà ụwa, n'etiti ndị ọzọ na USA, Sweden, United Kingdom, Netherlands, Germany, Switzerland na Australia
Ihe nrite Vita nke mbụ nke National Bank (1994)
Ebe obibi Thami Mnyele Institute (1998)
Ebe obibi MTN SA Foundation (2001)
Usoro nke Ikhamanga na Silver (2005)
Allison Amaechina Madueke (// (gee ntị); amụrụ n'afọ 1944) bụ onye agha mmiri Naijiria lagoro ezumike nká
Ọ bụ Chief of Naval Staff nke Nigeria site na 1993 ruo 1994, gọvanọ ndị agha nke Anambra Steeti site na Jenụwarị 1984 ruo Ọgọst 1985, na gọvanọ agha nke Imo Steeti site n'afọ 1985 ruo 1986
A mụrụ Allison Madueke na 1944 na Agbariji-Inyi, Osimiri Oji, Enugu Steeti, ma bụrụ onye Igbo
Ọ gara Britannia Royal College, Dartmouth England na School of Maritime Operations, Southwick
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu Royal Institute of Navigation, London (MRIN) na onye otu Nautical Institute, London (MNI)

E mechara nye ya nzere Doctorate abụọ na sayensị site na Enugu State University of Technology, na Law site naugboro abụọ na Sayensị si Enugu State University of Technology, na n'ihe gbasara iwu na Mahadum Abia State
E nyekwara ya nzere Doctorate na Sayensị site na Mahadum Naịjirịa, Nsukka n'afọ 2010
Nwunye ya nke abụọ Diezani Alison-Madueke bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ onye nduzi nke Shell Petroleum Development Company nke Naịjirịa, mechaa bụrụ onye minista na-ahụ maka njem na Naijiria na Julaị 26, 2007
Madueke gụrụ akwụkwọ na Nigerian Defense Academy n'etiti afọ 1964 na 1967
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Embassy nke Nigeria dị ka Naval Attache na Washington DC, USA

Mgbe ndị agha wepụrụ onye isi ala Shehu Shagari na Disemba 31, 1983, dị ka onye isi ụgbọ mmiri, a họpụtara ya dịka gọvanọ nke Anambra Steeti site na Jenụwarị 1984 ruo Ọgọst 1985, wee bụrụ gọvanọ Imo Steeti ruo 1986 n'oge ọchịchị ndị agha nke ndị ọchịagha Muhammadu Buhari na Ibrahim Babangida
A kwalitere ya ka ọ zụlite admiral, site na 1993-1994 ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkenke dị ka Chief of Naval Staff n'okpuru General Sani Abacha

A chụrụ ya n'ọrụ mgbe nzukọ Supreme Military Council gasịrị n'August 1994 ebe ọ kwadoro ịhapụ onye isi ala a họpụtara bụ Moshood Abiola nkịtị,onye a tụrụ mkpọrọ mgbe na ọchịchị mere ka Abacha banye n'ọchịchị

Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na n'ọrụ ndị agha mmiri, Madueke ghọrọ Onye isi oche nke Radam Maritime Services Ltd, onye isi oche nke Interconnect Clearinghouse na Onye isi oche of the Board of Trustees of the National ICT Merit Awards A họpụtakwara ya na bọọdụ nke Regalia Nigeria Ltd, Excel E & P (Marginal Oil Fields) Ltd, Solid Rock Securities and Investments Ltd
na Image Consultants Ltd
Allison Joseph (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1967) bụ onye America na-ede uri, onye nchịkọta akụkọ na prọfesọ
Ọ bụ onye edemede nke nchịkọta uri asatọ zuru oke, n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Confessions of a Bare-Faced Woman (Red Hen Press, 2018)
A mụrụ ya na London, England, nne na nna ya bụ ndị obodoJamaica, Allison Joseph tolitere na Toronto, Ontario, Canada, na Bronx, New York
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Kenyon College na BA, na Mahadum Indiana na MFA

Ọ na-akụzi na Southern Illinois University Carbondale (SIUC), ọ bụkwa onye isi nke Young Writers Workshop na SIUC, nke ọ tọrọ ntọala n'afọ 1999 mmemme oge okpomọkụ ụbọchị anọ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọtụtụ n'ime ngalaba edemede okike nke SIUC na ụmụ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na-etinye aka na ogbako ahụ, ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị sonyere na ya sitere na ọtụtụ steeti
N'afọ 1995, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị editọ ntọala nke Crab Orchard Review dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ uri nke magazin ahụ ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ kemgbe Ọgọstụ 2001
Ọ bụkwa onye nkwusa na onye guzobere No Chair Press Ọ bi na Carbondale, Illinois
Joseph ga-akụzi na Seminar Poetry na The Frost Place n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2021
Ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ, Joseph lụrụ onye ibe ya na-ede uri Jon Tribble, onye ya na ya hiwere Crab Orchard Review
Tribble nwụrụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2019
Na gburugburu ebe obibi, usoro allogenic bụ usoro nke ihe ndị na-emebi ihe nke gburugburu ebe obibi na-akpali
N'ụzọ dị iche, usoro nke autogenic na-akpali ihe ndị dị ndụ nke gburugburu ebe obibi
Enwere ike ibido usoro allogenic n'ọtụtụ ụzọ nke nwere ike ịgụnye
Usoro Allogenic nwere ike ime n'ogo oge nke dabara na ọgba aghara ahụDịka ọmụmaatụ, usoro allogenic nke bụ nsonaazụ mgbanwe ihu igwe na-abụghị nke mmadụ nwere ike ime karịa ọtụtụ puku afọ

Ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime mmepe Salt Marsh na-abịa site na usoro ihe nketa Mmiri na-anọgide na-ahụ na mpaghara intertidal na-eme ka ala nke nnu na-agbanwe ka oge na-aga Nke a na-ebute sedimentation na nutrition build nke na-eji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-ebuli elu ala Ihe malitere dị ka ala ájá nwere ọkwa pH dị elu, n'ikpeazụ na-aghọ ala ụrọ nwere ọkwa pH na-anọpụ iche N'ime oge a, ala-salinity ga-agbanwekwa site na ịmalite ala na-emecha na-ebili n'ogo dị elu site na ikpughe mmiri mmiri na-aga n'ihu

Glacier forelands bụ ihe atụ ọzọ nke gburugburu ebe obibi nke sitere na autogenic ma bụrụkwa akụkụ nke allogenic succession A na-eme atụmatụ na mkpa nke dị elu karịa na ọkwa ndị gara aga, gbasara ọdịdị nkume, akụkụ ndagwurugwu na ihe ndị dị n'ala
Kpọpụta njehie is not used in prior text
Alma Fairfax Carlisle (née Murray, amụrụ na Julaị 9, 1927) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke rụrụ ọrụ na Los Angeles
Ọrụ ya dugara n'ichekwa ọtụtụ mpaghara akụkọ ihe mere eme na ebe dị na obodo Los Angeles
A mụrụ Carlisle ma zụlite ya na Alexandria, Virginia
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ malitere inwe mmasị na ihe owuwu na akụkọ ihe mere eme, na ndị ezinụlọ, gụnyere nna ya, ndị na-etinye aka na ụlọ na ụlọ zụlitere mmasị ya
N'afọ 1950, Carlisle gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Howard na nzere architecture
Carlisle lụrụ David Kay Carlisle na July 28, 1953 ma ha nwere ụmụ atọ
N'ime afọ 1950 na 1960, Carlisle bụ onye na-elekọta ụlọ
N'afọ 1975, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Los Angeles ebe Carlisle malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka obodo Los Angeles
Mgbe Carlisle bụ onye na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu maka Los Angeles Bureau of Engineering, o nyere aka nyochaa ma nye ihe akaebe maka ichekwa ihe owuwu akụkọ ihe mere eme na Los Angeles

Nnyocha akụkọ ihe mere eme ya, nke e mere na mpaghara iri abụọ na asaa dị n'obodo ahụ dugara na 'ịhọpụta mpaghara nchekwa akụkọ ihe mere mere eme anọ na ihe karịrị ihe ncheta akụkọ ihe mere anya iri ise
N'ime nyocha ndị ahụ, ndị ọ na-etinye aka na ya bụ Melrose Hill (1984) na Whitley Heights (1990)
N'afọ 1996, ọ lara ezumike nká n'obodo ahụ, mana n'afọ 2001, ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu na Los Angeles, Myra L
Frank & Associates
Teresita Pasini, (née dei Bonfatti, 1869 ̊-1948), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha nzuzo ya bụ Alma Dolens, bụ onye a ma ama na-ahụ maka udo n'Ịtali, onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị, na onye nta akụkọ

'Alma Dolens' bụ ngwakọta nke Latin alma nke pụtara 'mkpụrụ obi' ma ọ bụ 'obi' na Latin participle dolens nke pụtara 'ihe mgbu' ma ọ dị 'mwute'; aha ahụ nwere ike ịsụgharị dị ka 'obi mwute' ma ọ bụrụ 'obi dị arọ', a na-eche na ọ na-ezo aka na mmetụta ya gbara militarism na agha gburugburu
A mụrụ Alma Dolens, n'ezinụlọ bara ọgaranya nke Umbrian n'afọ 1876
A maara ezinụlọ ya nke ọma n'ime òtù Italian unification movement, ebe ha kwadoro Giuseppe Garibaldi
Alma Dolens lụrụ onye ọka iwu si Milan, onye kwadoro ọrụ ya
Alma Dolens jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Lombardy maka Nnwere Onwe Ụmụ nwanyị na Ikike Ndị Ọrụ
Ọ kwuru okwu na nzukọ udo mba na 1909 na 1910, na-eme ka ọrụ ya sie ike n'ime òtù udo nke ndị ikom na-achịkwa n'Itali
O kwenyere na ụmụ nwanyị dị mkpa maka ọganihu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, nakwa na enweghị ụmụ nwanyị n'ime usoro udo nke Ịtali na n'ime ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ozuzu ya bụ ihe na-emebi ihe
Dolens bụkwa onye nkwado siri ike nke ịmepụta njikọ n'etiti òtù udo nke Ịtali na òtù ọrụ
O mepụtara Società per la pace femminile (Society for Peace nke ụmụ nwanyị), ma gaa n'etiti etiti Ịtali iji mepụta kọmitii mpaghara n'ime ya

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ndị ọrụ ígwè iji mepụta Associazione nazionale pro arbitrate e disarmo (Workers' Society for Arbitration and Disarmament) na Milan, nke nwere ihe dị ka ndị otu 700 site na mmalite afọ 1910
Agha 191 nke Italo-Turkish kwụsịrị usoro udo, na-emepụta nkewa n'etiti ndị chere na ha kwesịrị ịkwado agha na ndị na-emeghị
Dolens dara na nke ikpeazụ, na-eme mkpọsa n'ihu ọha megide agha ahụ ma na-arịọ ndị otu nọ na United States na Switzerland maka nkwado ego iji kwe ka ndị na-eme udo gbanwee
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ n'afọ 1911 na 1912, mana ndị na-ahụ maka udo n'Ịtali mechara daa kpamkpam, a machibidoro Dolens ikwu okwu n'ihu ọha na Ịtali maka afọ abụọ ahụ
Ọ tụgharịrị uche ya n'ebe ọzọ, na-ede banyere ọnọdụ ibi ndụ maka ndị nọ n'ọkwá dị ala n'obodo ndị Ịtali
Na nnọkọ udo na Budapest na 1913, Dolens zutere ma bụrụ enyi Rosika Schwimmer, onye ọzọ na-ahụ maka udo na onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ laghachiri ikwu okwu na mmemme mmemme na 1913, mgbe ụfọdụ n'akụkụ Margherita Sarfatti
N'afọ 1914, Dolens gara nzukọ banyere agha na-abịanụ na Europe nke International Peace Bureau na The Hague haziri
Ya na Rosalia Gwiss-Adami bụ ndị nnọchiteanya nke ndị na-eme udo n'Itali na nnọkọ na ụbọchị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Julaị na Brussels, nnọkọ nke jere ozi dị ka otu mgbalị ikpeazụ iji zere agha ahụ
N'oge agha ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ enyemaka maka ezinụlọ ndị agha chụpụrụ n'ụlọ ha n'ime Austria-Hungary
Mgbe Agha Italo-Turkish biri, ọ gara Belgium iji kụzie ihe
Ịhụ mbibi sitere n'agha ahụ kwusiri ike nkwenye ya na pacifism, o kwukwara n'otu n'ime nkuzi ya 'onye iro anọghị n'ókè; ọ gbara anyị gburugburu ọ bụ ịda ogbenye, ụkwara nta, enweghị ọrụ
Ọgwụgwọ maka ọrịa ndị a bụ njedebe nke ngwá agha dị egwu ma dị oke ọnụ
' O siri ọnwụ na iwu kwesịrị ịchọ ka mba ndị ahụ kpebie n'oge agha
Mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị, Dolens gara biri n'ụlọ enyi ya, Gilberto Gilioli na nwunye ya Myrthe Ripamonti, ebe ọ nwụrụ na 1948
Alma mater bụ ahịrịokwu Latin nghota zoro ezo a na-eji amata ụlọ akwụkwọ, kọleji, ma ọ bụ mahadum nke onye gara aga
A sụgharịrị ahịrịokwu a dịka 'nne na-enye ume', 'nne na-enye nwa ara', ma ọ bụ 'nne na-azụlite', na-atụ aro na ụlọ akwụkwọ na-enye ụmụ akwụkwọ ya nri ọgụgụ isi
Almazán bụ ime obodo dị na ndịda nke ala ana-kpo Soria
Almaz Ayana Eba (Oromo ; Amharic ኣልማዝ Florina Eba, amụrụ na 21 Nọvemba 1991) bụ nwanyị Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke na-asọmpi na 3000 mita, 5000 mita, na 10,000 mita
Ọ mebiri ihe ndekọ ụwa nke mita 10,000, nke e debere na 1993, mgbe ọ na-emeri ihe nrite ọla edo na 2016 Summer Olympics na Rio de Janeiro
Na 2017 World Championships na London, Almaz meriri nrite ọla edo na mita 10,000, na-emecha sekọnd 46 n'ihu onye nke
A mụrụ Almaz Ayana na Wenbera, Benishangul-Gumuz Region, Ethiopia
A mụrụ ya dị ka nwa ikpeazụ nke asaa n'ime ụmụnne itoolu, Ayana malitere ịgba ọsọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'ógbè ahụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 13-14
Ọ lụrụ enyi ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata na onye mmekọ ogologo oge, Soressa Fida
Dị ka ndị egwuregwu ndị ọzọ a ma ama dị ka Fatuma Roba na Derartu Tulu, Ayana bụkwa onye Oromo
Na mgbakwunye na asụsụ Oromo ya, ọ na-asụkwa Amharic
Aha Almaz pụtara Diamond na Amharic
Almaz bụ Onye Kraịst na-anụ ọkụ n'obi
Almaz ritere ọla nchara na mita 5000 na afọ 2013 World Championships in Athletics na Moscow, Russia
Almaz meriri n'asọmpi mita 5000 mbụ ya na afọ 2014 African Championships na Marrakech, na-emeri onye ọkacha mmasị Genzebe Dibaba na oge ndekọ nke 15 3272
Otu ọnwa mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị na IAAF Continental Cup na Marrakech, ọ meriri mita 5000 site na ihe karịrị 24 sekọnd

N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2015, Almaz gbara ọsọ kachasị mma nke 14 1432 karịa mita 5000 na nzukọ IAAF Diamond League na Shanghai, China, na-emeziwanye ihe kachasị mma nke 14 2584 nke e debere na afo 2013 na Paris
Nke a mere ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị nke atọ na-eme egwuregwu na ọsọ ahụ, n'azụ ndị obodo ya Tirunesh Dibaba, onye na-edekọ ihe ndekọ ụwa, na Meseret Defar
Na afọ 2015 IAAF World Championships na Beijing, ọ meriri mita 5000, na-emeri onye nrite ọla nchara Genzebe Dibaba ihe karịrị sekọnd 17
Na abalị abụọ na onwa isii, na afọ 2016, Almaz gbara ọsọ mita 5000 na 14 1259 na nzukọ Golden Gala na Rome
Nke a mere ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị nke abụọ kachasị ọsọ n'ebe a, na-esote naanị Tirunesh Dibaba nke ụwa nke 14 1115
Ọ gbara ọsọ 10,000 mita na asọmpi maka oge mbụ na ọnwa isii, na afo 2016 Ethiopian Olympic trials na Hengelo, Netherlands
O weputara oge izizi kachasị ọsọ nke 30 07 ma merie Tirunesh Dibaba
Na afọ 2016 Summer Olympics, o setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ ụwa nke 29 1745 na mita 10,000, karịa ihe ndekọ ụwa dị afọ 23 nke onye China na-eme egwuregwu Wang Junxia site na sekọnd 14
Ọ dịghị onye gbara ọsọ n'ime sekọnd 22 nke ndekọ Wang
10,000 mita bụ ọsọ ọsọ ọsọ ọsọ mgbe Ayana hapụrụ na agba iri na abụọ ka ọ ga-aga

Vivian Cheruiyot nke Kenya nke nọ n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ na-eme ihere nke ndekọ Wang na onye mmeri Olympic 10,000 mita abụọ Tirunesh Dibaba nwetara ọla nchara site na mmụba nke sekọnd 12 na oge kachasị mma ya na oge nke anọ kachasị ọsọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme
E debere ọtụtụ ndekọ mba, na ndị asọmpi iri na asatọ setịpụrụ ihe kachasị mma
Usoro nyocha ọgwụ ọjọọ na Ethiopia na ihe ihere doping nke metụtara egwuregwu egwuregwu tupu egwuregwu Olimpik nke Rio mere ka ụfọdụ nwee obi abụọ ma Almaz na-eji ọgwụ doping
Ndị na-akọwa ihe na Britain bụ Brendan Foster na Paula Radcliffe, ndị bụbu ndị nwere ihe ndekọ ụwa na ihe omume ndị dị anya, nwere obi abụọ banyere arụmọrụ Almaz
Ndị asọmpi ibe ha kọrọ na tupu asọmpi ahụ, onye Etiopia ahụ na-ekpo ọkụ ma o yighị ka ọ dị mma
Na mkparịta ụka ndị nta akụkọ ya mgbe agbụrụ gasịrị, Ayana kwuru na oge ya bụ naanị nsonaazụ ọzụzụ siri ike
N'abalị ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2017, ọ meriri 10,000 mita na World Championships na London
Alois Moyo (a mụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1966), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe na Zimbabwe
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri The Power of One na Iron Sky yana usoro TV Tatort
A mụrụ ya n'abalị 28 ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1966 na Bulawayo, Zimbabwe
Ọ bi na Germany ugbu a

Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri n' ihe nkiri n'afọ 1986 n' egwuregwu Citizen Mind N'afọ 1980, Moyo guzobere ụlọ ihe nkiri Africa mbụ a na-akpọ 'Amakhosi Township Square Cultural Center' (ATSCC) na Zimbabwe nke e ji mee ihe na mbụ dịka klọb karate ma ghọọ ụlọ ọrụ ọdịnala na ZimbabweKemgbe afọ 2005 ọ bi na Germany ma na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri maka ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri na TV
O mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'afọ 1992 na ihe nkiri Power of One nke John Avildsen duziri ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke onye ọkpọ Africa na onye na-alụ ọgụ nnwere onwe
Mgbe ọ bi na Germany, o mere mmepụta mbụ ya na German nke akpọrọ Die Zofen n'afọ 2005 na Afrika Montage n'afọ 2007
Mgbe ihe ịga nke ọma nke ahụ gasịrị, o mere mmepụta nke abụọ nke Germany Steinstunde der Menschheit n'afọ 2008

Aloisea Inyumba (Ụbọchị 28 Disemba 1964 6 Disemba 2012) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Rwanda, onye bụ Minista na-ahụ maka Mmekọahụ na Nkwalite Ezinụlọ na dịka onye isi odeakwụkwọ nke National Unity and Reconciliation Commission
Mgbe ọ na-amụ ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Mahadum Makerere na Uganda, ọ sonyeere Rwandan Patriotic Front
A mụrụ Aloisea Inyumba n'afọ 28 Disemba 1964 na Uganda, nne na nna a mụrụ na Rwanda
A mụrụ ya mgbe afọ 1959 Rwandan Revolution gasịrị, nke hụrụ ka e mepụtara mba nke ọtụtụ ndị Hutu na-achịkwa, na mkpagbu nke ndị Tutsi ka nta
Mgbe nne na nna ya ka bi na Rwanda, tupu a mụọ ya, e gburu nna ya na ogbugbu nke ndị Tuthi; nne ya na ụmụnne ya ise gbapụrụ na ezinụlọ ahụ gbagara na nchekwa nke Uganda
Inyumba biri n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Uganda, gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ, wee gaa Mahadum Makerere na Kampala, iji mụọ maka nzere na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na nchịkwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na eze
N'afọ 1985, ya na Paul Kagame, onye ọzọ gbara ọsọ ndụ na Rwanda nke na-eje ozi n'oge ahụ na ndị agha nnupụisi nke Yoweri Museveni
Otu afọ mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Museveni weghaara mba ahụ ma bulie Kagame na onye Rwandan ibe ya Fred Rwigyema ka ha bụrụ ndị isi na ndị agha mba ahụ
Kagame na Rwigyma weghaara ọnọdụ ndị a, mana ebumnuche ha kachasị mkpa bụ iji ike laghachi mba nke ha, iji mee ka ọ dịrị ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ Kagame na Rumbawandan mfe

Alonzo Davis bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe na agụmakwụkwọ a maara màkà ịtọ ntọala Brockman Gallery na Los Angeles na nwanne ya nwoke Dale Brockman Davis
N'ịzaghachi na enweghị ihe omuma banyéré nka ojii, Davis ghọrọ onye na-akwado nka ojii na ndị na-ese ihe
Ọrụ ya a kacha márá àmárá bụ Eye on '84 mural o sere iji cheta 1984 Summer Olympics
Davis tolitere na nso Mahadum Tuskegee ébé nnà ya bụ prọfesọ nké nkà mmụta akparamàgwà mmadụ
Ezinụlọ Davis si Tuskegee, Alabama kwaga Los Angeles, California na 1955 ébé a kpughere ya nka Eshia
Davis ghọrọ ónyé na-eme ntụgharị uche Zen ọ bụ ezie na ọ tọghataghị na okpukpe Buddha
Davis, ónyé na-amụ ihe osise na Pepperdine n'oge ahụ, ekwenyeghị na ihe na-acha ọcha nkè ọrụ ya ma chọọ ịghọta ihe osise ojii na America
Ya na nwanne ya nwoke Dale, ónyé bụkwa onye na-ese ihe, gara gafee mba ahụ iji zute ndị na-ese egwu ojii ndị ọzọ gụnyere 'Spiral Group' na Harlem nke Romare Bearden na Hale Woodruff duziri
Davis sere ihe osise, Eye on '84, otu n'ime ihe osise iri e nyèrè iwu n'okpuru ọrụ Los Angeles ' 1984 Olympic Murals
Ihe osise Davis dị na I-110 na-aga n'ebe ndịda na Third Street on-ramp gafee Judy Baca's Hitting the Wall
Ihe osise ya, acrylic na simenti, gosipụtara usoro akara ndị a na-ahụ na mbà ụwa gụnyere Mgbaaka Olympic
Ihe osise ahụ tara ahụhụ ihu igwe ma wéré ya dị ka ihe a na-apụghị iweghachite
CalTrans sere ihe osise ahụ na 2001
Davis kwagara Sacramento na 1987 wéé gaa ébé óbíbí na Hawaii na 1988

Seydou Koné (French pronunciation [sɛdu kɔne]; amụrụ na Jenụwarị 1, 1953 na Dimbokro), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Alpha Blondy, bụ onye na-agụ egwú reggae nke Ivorian na onye na-edekọ egwu mba ụwa

Ọtụtụ n'ime abụ ya na-akpali ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, a na-abụkarịkwa ya n'asụsụ obodo ya bụ Dyula, French na Bekee, ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-eji asụsụ ndị ọzọ eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ, dịka ọmụmaatụ, Arabic ma ọ bụ Hibru
Nwa mbụ nke ezinụlọ nwere ụmụ asatọ, nne nne ya zụlitere Seydou Koné n'ebe ọ kọwara dị ka 'n'etiti ndị okenye', nke ga-enwe mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ọrụ ya
N'afọ 1962, Alpha Blondy sonyeere nna ya na Odienné, ebe ọ nọrọ afọ iri, gaa Sainte Elisabeth High School, ma tinye aka na ụmụ akwụkwọ Ivory Coast
O guzobere otu egwu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, mana nke a metụtara agụmakwụkwọ ya ma chụpụ ya maka ịga nke ọma
Nne na nna ya zigara ya ịmụ Bekee na Monrovia, isi obodo Liberia, na 1973
Ọ nọrọ ọnwa iri na atọ n'ebe ahụ wee kwaga United States iji melite Bekee ya
N'afọ 1974, Seydou kwagara New York ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Bekee na Hunter College na Columbia University American Language Program, na-achụso ọrụ nkuzi
Na New York, a kọwaara ya Rastafari ma gaa kọntaktị nke ndị na-ese ihe na Jamaica gụnyere Burning Spear
Seydou tinyere aka n'ọtụtụ esemokwu tupu ọ laghachi Ivory Coast ebe ọ zutere nsogbu ọzọ ruo mgbe ya na enyi ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata, Fulgence Kassi, onye ghọrọ onye na-emepụta telivishọn a ma ama
Nke a bụ mmalite nke ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-agụ egwú, ọ nabatara aha ọzọ 'Alpha Blondy'
Mgbe ihe ngosi TV dị iche iche maka Kassi gasịrị, Blondy dekọrọ abọm mbụ ya n'onwe ya na 1982, nke akpọrọ Jah Glory
Abọm a ga-enwe nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma ma mesịa bụrụ ihe nnọchianya nke nguzogide n'ihi abụ 'Brigadier Sabari,' nke na-edekọ ahụmahụ ya nke ijide ya na Abidjan na 1980s na mmeso ọjọọ nke ndị uwe ojii
Alpha Blondy ghọrọ nnukwu kpakpando na Abidjan na ntụgharị Africa ya nke egwu Reggae, na-aghọ n'anya ndị na-akwado ya 'Bob Marley nke Africa'
Alpha Blondy bụ onye ime mmụọ, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nwere obi ụtọ dịka Marley n'onwe ya, ma dekọọ egwu Bob Marley bụ 'War'
Iji nweta ozi ya, ọ họọrọ ịbụ abụ n'ọtụtụ asụsụ Bekee; French; Baoulé, na asụsụ ala ya bụ São Dioula
Mgbe e mesịrị, o wetakwara ngwá egwu ọhụrụ na ụdị reggae ya dịka violin na cello
N'oge na-adịghị anya, aha ọma nke Alpha Blondy gbasara na Europe
N'ịgbaso ihe ịga nke ọma nke EP akpọrọ Rasta Poué, ọ gara Paris na 1984 iji mee abọm nke abụọ ya, Cocody Rock, na akara Pathe Marconi
'Bob Marley nke Africa' gara agwaetiti Jamaica wee dekọọ egwu aha nke abọm a na ndị na-akwado Marley, The Wailers
Laa azụ n'ụlọ n'afọ 1985, Blondy banyere n'ime ụlọ ihe nkiri iji dekọọ Apartheid Is Nazism; abụ aha bụ oku maka njedebe nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
N'afọ 1986, o dekọrọ Jerusalem na Tuff Gong studios na Jamaica, ọzọ ya na The Wailers gosipụtara Aston 'Family Man' Barrett
Blondy gbalịrị ịkwalite ịdị n'otu n'etiti okpukpe Islam, okpukpe ndị Juu na Iso Ụzọ Kraịst
O nwetara arụmụka ya na mkpali ya site na ihe ọmụma dị iche iche nke Bible, kor'an, na Torah
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ bụrụ abụ n'asụsụ Hibru n'oge egwu na Morocco
N'oge a, ọ nọgidere na-eme njem
Abọm ọhụrụ ya Revolution nwere ụda dị mfe, nke dị nro; abọm a gosipụtara cellos na ngwá egwu, na usoro ahụ gụnyere onye na-agụ egwu Ivory Coast bụ Aicha Kone
Abọm ahụ gụnyekwara 'Jah Houphouët parle', okwu ogologo nke onye isi ala Ivory Coast Félix Houphoute-Boigny na naanị obere ihe n'azụ ya
Blondy nọrọ n'afọ 1987 na-enye egwu ma na-edekọ SOS Guerre Tribale na Abidjan
Blondy n'onwe ya kwalitere nke a, ebe ọ na-apu iche na Pathe Marconi n'oge a

Nke a agaghị abụ ezigbo ihe ịga nke ọma mana ọ kwụsịghị Blondy na 1991 ọ laghachiri Europe maka njem egwu na idekọ abọm ya a ma ama Masada site n'enyemaka nke akụkọ egwu dịka Bocana Maiga na onye na-emepụta reggae na UK Dennis Bovell
Abọm ahụ, ya na egwu egwu ya 'Rendez Vous', bụ nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma, Blondy mechara nata Diski ọla edo mbụ ya na Paris
Na mbido afọ 1993, n'ịbụ onye ike gwụrụ site na njem ụwa, Blondy dara n'ọrịa ịda mbà n'obi ma kpọga ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ maka enyemaka ndị isi mgbaka
Mana ka ahụike ya na-agbake, o dekọrọ abọm Dieu ('Chineke'), nke ọ na-apụta na nke ime mmụọ na nke okpukpe, na egwu dịka 'Heal Me', banyere ọrịa na mgbake ya
Ọgwụgwọ ọrịa uche Blondy gara n'ihu mana na 10 Disemba, na afo 1994, ọ laghachiri na emume ahụ iji cheta Onye isi ala Houphouet, ma mesịa laghachi na Europe na kọntaktị na Le Zenith na Paris
N'afọ 1996, Blondy wepụtara nchịkọta egwu wee laghachi n'ime ụlọ ihe nkiri iji dekọọ abọm Grand Bassam Zion, na-abụ abụ n'asụsụ isii Malinke; Arabic; French; English; Ashanti na Wolof
Mgbe afọ abụọ ọzọ gasịrị na Paris, Blondy laghachiri n'ala nna ya na afọ 1998, na abọm ọhụrụ, The Prophet
N'ịbụ onye kwesịrị ike na akara ya lekwasịrị anya n'ahịa mba ụwa, o kpebiri ịmepụta akara nke ya

Kemgbe ahụ, o dekọrọ abọm na egwu, dị ka 'Yitzhak Rabin', iji cheta praịm minista Israel e gburu na afo 1995 (nke a so na njem na-agwụ ike na Europe), otu 'Journaliste en Danger' site na abọm ya nke afọ 2000 Elohim

Alpha Blondy mere emume afọ 20 dị ka onye na-edekọ egwu na mbipụta na afo 2002 nke CD MERCI, nke gosipụtara Ophelie Winter na Saian Supa Crew, nke mere ka ọ nweta nhọpụta Grammy Award nke afọ 2003 maka 'Best Reggae Album'
Otú ọ dị, n'ihi ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Ivory Coast, ọ pụghị ịga emume mmeri na New York City
N'ime ihe a na-ahụtụbeghị mbụ, Grammy Awards nyere ya ohere iziga onye nnọchi anya n'ọnọdụ nsọpụrụ ya
N'afọ 2005, a tọhapụrụ Akwaba
E wepụtara CD ya Jah Victory na Julaị, na afọ 2007
Ọ na-egosi Sly Dunbar na Robbie Shakespeare, yana Tyrone Downie bụbu nke Bob Marley na Wailers
'Mmeri' bụ iji sọpụrụ nkwekọrịta udo nke e nwetara ma tinye n'ọrụ na Ivory Coast na Machị, na afo 2007
[citation needed]
Otu n'ime egwu Blondy kachasị ewu ewu na nke na-aga nke ọma bụ 'Sébé Allah Y'é'
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2009, Blondy rụrụ ọrụ na Central Park nke New York n'ihu ìgwè mmadụ nke ọtụtụ ndị Afrịka, ndị Jamaica, na ndị America
N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2010, e kwere ka nnukwu ìgwè mmadụ banye n'egwuregwu Blondy na Ivory Coast iji mee emume udo na ịdị n'otu nke mba ahụ
Ọnọdụ ndị mmadụ jupụtara na kọntaktị ahụ mere ka ọ dịkarịa ala mmadụ 20 merụọ ahụ, abụọ n'ime ha nwụrụ
Na 27 June, na afo 2010, Alpha Blondy bụ ihe mmechi na Parkpop, The Hague, Netherlands
Ọ nọchiri Snoop Dogg na Beenie Man
Blondy abụwokwa mmetụta dị mkpa na ndị ọzọ na-ese egwu reggae n'Afrịka dịka Ismaël Isaac
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2014, onye na-agụ egwu / onye na-ede egwu Jonathan Wilson wepụtara EP akpọrọ Slide By nke gosipụtara egwu 'Alpha Blondy Was King'
E wepụtara ya na Jenụwarị, na afo 2015, Roots Reggae Library gosipụtara mbipụta na Alpha Blondy na nkọwa na ntụgharị nke egwu n'asụsụ niile, gụnyere ndị dị na Dioula
A mụrụ Alpha Blondy n'aka nna onye Alakụba na nne onye Kraịst, nne nne ya zụlitere ya 'onye kụziiri ya ịhụ onye ọ bụla n'anya'

A na-anụ nkwanye ùgwù Blondy nwere maka okpukpe niile na ọnọdụ ime mmụọ ọ sitere na ha n'egwú ndị a kpọrọ 'Chineke bụ One' ma ọ bụ 'Jerusalem' ebe ọ bụrụ abụ maka ịdị n'otu n'etiti okpukpe niile na afọ 1986
N'afọ 2005, a họpụtara Alpha Blondy dị ka onye nnọchi anya udo nke mpaghara United Nations maka Côte d'Ivoire
O mere mgbalị dị ukwuu iji weta ngwọta udo maka nkewa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nke anụ ahụ nke mba ya nke sitere na mgbalị nnupụisi na afo 2001
Ka ọ na-erule Machị, na afo 2007, a bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta udo ma tinye ya n'ọrụ, n'ihi ọrụ siri ike nke ọtụtụ ndị gụnyere Alpha Blondy

Alpha ugbu a na-aga n'ihu na ntọala ọhụrụ na-abụghị maka uru, nke na-abụghị nke gọọmentị, nke na na-abụghị ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nke ọrụ ebere, Alpha Blondy Jah Glory Foundation, nke na'arụ ọrụ iji kwụsị ikpe na-ezighị ezi na ịda ogbenye site n'inye ndị mmadụ ngwaọrụ ha chọrọ iji nyere onwe ha aka
O kwesịrị ike n'inyere ndị ogbenye aka (Jah Glory), nakwa na ekwesighi imerụ ụmụaka ahụ

Ntọala ahụ na-agba mbọ ịmepụta ma tinye n'ọrụ mmemme ndị dị n'ime obodo, dị ka Women's Self-Sufficiency Micro Loan Program, iji kụziere ụmụ nwanyị na-elekọta ọtụtụ ụmụ mgbei otu esi amalite ma jikwaa azụmahịa nke ha, iji nye ezinụlọ ha, yana ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-adịgide adịgide, dị ka Tafari-Genesis Retreat Camp for Children (Ivory Coast na Burkina Faso)

Ọ na-atụ anya karịsịa iweta ọṅụ na olileanya nye ụmụaka ndị agha obodo metụtara, ndị bụbu ụmụaka ndị agha, na ndị na-arịa ọrịa na-adịghị ala ala na-eyi ndụ egwu, dị ka ọrịa sickle-cell anemia, ịba, ụkwara ume ọkụ, wdg
Alpha Blondy na-aga n'ihu na-alụ ọgụ maka udo na ịdị n'otu gburugburu ụwa site na egwu
Ihe atụ na-adịbeghị anya bụ otu egwu ya na Ophélie Winter megide ogbunigwe
O sonyekwara n'ọtụtụ kọntaktị ọrụ ebere na ọrụ ebere, dị ka kọnttaktị na Senegal na Machị, na afọ 2006 maka iwepụ ịba n'Africa (ebe ya na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ a ma ama pụtara)
Ọ na-aga n'ihu n'ọrụ a na Ivory Coast n'onwe ya, na egwu egwu ya n'efu kwa afọ na ụsọ mmiri Bassam nke a na-akpọ ŌFESTA
N'afọ 2014, ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe na ndị mmadụ gụnyere Jocelyne Béroard, Harry Roselmack na Admiral T bụrụ On n'oublie pas (nke Serge Bilé dere) abụ a
Abụ a bụ ụtụ nye ndị 152 si Martinique nwụrụ n'ihe mberede nke 16 Ọgọstu, na afo 2005, iji cheta ihe omume a na iji nyere AVCA aka, njikọ nke ndị ọdachi ụgbọelu ahụ metụtara, iji nweta ego
Ihe ịga nke ọma mbụ ya bụ Brigadier Sabari
Ụfọdụ abụ ndị nnọchiteanya bụ
Ihe ndekọ nke onye na-ese egwu reggae nke Ivorian bụ Alpha Blondy nwere abọm studio iri na ise, abọm abụọ chịkọta asatọ, na iri na isii njikọ iri isii ndị nanị ya gụrụ
Alpheus Hamilton Zulu (29 Julaị 1905 26 Ọgọst 1987) bụ bishọp Anglịkan na ọkara nke abụọ nke narị afọ nke 20
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke South Africa, a họpụtara ya n'afọ 1940
N'afọ 1948, ya na Revd Philip Mbata, Iviyo loFakazi bakaKristu (The Legion of Christ's Witnesses) guzobere otu òtù na-adọrọ mmasị n'ime Chọọchị Anglican

N'ịgbaso curacy na St Faith's Mission, Durban ọ bụ onye ụkọchukwu na-elekọta ya site n'afọ 1952 ruo afọ 1960 mgbe ọ ghọrọ bishọp suffragan nke Diocese nke St John's (nke a na-akpọ Assistant Bishop of St John'S)
Nkwalite ka ọ bụrụ bishọp nke itoolu nke Zululand sochiri
Site n'afọ 1978 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1987, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu KwaZulu
Alphenal (Alphenal, Efrodal, Prophenal, Sanudorm), nke a makwaara dị ka 5-allyl-5-phenylbarbituric acid, bụ ihe sitere na barbiturate mepụtara na 1920s

Ọ nwere ihe ndị na eme na Ihe ndị na-egbochi isi ọwụwa, a na-ejikwa ya eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ maka ọgwụgwọ nke epilepsy ma ọ bụ mgbakasị ahụ, ọ bụ ezie ọrụ nkụzi afọ okuku na ọ bụghị dịka barbiturates a maara nke ọma dịka phenobarbital
Àtụ GABAAR PAMs
Aha nna Altaf (Arabic ) sitere na arabic nke bụ aha nwoke
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Altia Sthembile Hlongo bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị South Africa bụ onye bụ onye omeiwu (MP) maka African National Congress
Altocumulus floccus bụ ụdị ígwé ojii aha ya bụ màkà ọdịdị ya dị ka tuft, ajị anụ
Ntọala nke igwe ojii ahụ nwèrè ike ịghọ ihe dị ala dị ka mita puku abuo (ukwu puku isii na narị isií), ma ọ bụ ihe dị elu dị ka mita puku isii (puku iri abụọ)
Ha na-adịkarị n'ìgwè, ma ọ bụ patches, na ntọala nwere ike ịdịgasị iche na ịdị elu na ọnọdụ ikuku dị iche iche n'ime PBL
Ha yiri Altocumulus castellanus, mànà ha na-enwekarị oke dị ala ma e jiri ya tụnyere
Igwe ojii na-eto eto na-emepụta mgbè ọ dị n'ọnọdụ, nkè na-adịghị omimi, nké dị n'etiti
N'oge ụfọdụ, dị ka ọnụnọ nke okpokoro miri emi na-adịghị akwụsi ike, igwe ojii ndị a nwèrè ike itolite nkè ukwuu iji ghọọ égbè eluigwe
Alumu bụ asụsụ Plateau nke ihe dị ka mmadụ 7,000 na-asụ na Nassarawa State, Nigeria
Ọ tụfuru usoro aha aha nke ezinụlọ Niger Congo
Ụdị abụọ, Alumu na Tesu, dị iche naanị n'olu
E depụtara ozi maka Alumu na Tesu site na Blench (2004)
A na-asụ Alumu (ma ọ bụ Arum), nke nwere ndị na-asụru ya ọgụ ọnụ 4,000, n'obodo Arum-Kado (isi obodo), Arum-Tsabo, Arum-Sarki, Arum'Tumara, Arum - Chugbu, Arum (Gbira), na Arum-Chine

A na-asụ Tesu (Təsu) (Hausa Chessu), nke nwere ihe na-erughị ndị ọkà okwu 2,000, n'obodo abụọ nke Chessu Sarki na Chessu Madaki, nke dị ihe dị ka otu kilomita site na ibe ya n'okporo ụzọ Wamba - Fadan Karshi

Akpondu nwekwara njikọ chiri anya (nke a na-akpọkwa Babur, Nadeji na Nigbo) mana ọ na-anwụ anwụ ma ọ bụ na-apụ n'anya, na nhazi ya dị ka asụsụ dị iche ma ọ bụ dị ka asụsụ na-agbanwe agbanwe ma ọ bụ otu mmekọrịta nke asụsụ ndị yiri ya edoghị anya
Ọ bụghị ihe doro anya ma ụdaume nasality bụ phonemic na Alumu
Àtụ Languages of NigeriaÀtụ Platoid languages
Alusi ma ọ bụ Alushi (asụpekwara dika Arusi ma ọ bụ Arushi ) bụ mmụọ ndị a na-efe ma na ejere ozi n'okpukpe ndị Igbo
E nwere ọtụtụ Alusi dị iche iche nke nwekwara oru dikwa iche iche
E kewapụtara ụwa Igbo n'ọtụtụ jikọrọ ọnụ, onye bụ isi n'etiti ha bụ obodo dị ndụ, ala ndị nwụrụ anwụ ma ọ bụ nke ndị nna ochie, na ala nke ndị amụghị amụ
Ndị mmadụ biri ndụ kwesịrị nsọpụrụ ma nwetakwa olili kwesịrị ekwesị wee gaa n'ógbè nna nna iji nọrọ n'ọnọdụ ndị nna nna (' Ndichie '), ndị dị iche na ndị Alusi
Ha si ebe ahụ legide anya na-elekọtara ezinụlọ ha anya ma na-eleta ndị ha hụrụ n'anya n'etiti ndị dị ndụ site na ngọzi ndị dị ka ọmụmụ, ezi ahụ ike, ogologo ndụ na ọganihu
N’ime ekele, ndị dị ndụ na-achụrụ ha àjà n’ememe ezinụlọ, ma chọọ ndụmọdụ ha
Aluworks bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe dabere na Tema, Greater Accra
E hiwere ya na Febụwarị 24, 1978 ma gbanwee ya ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ụgwọ ọha na eze na Mee 28, 1996
Mgbe enyechara ọhaneze izizi na onwa Ọktoba 1996, e depụtara ya na Ghana Stock Exchange na Nọvemba 29, 1996 na ọnụ ahịa oke nke GH¢ 0135
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ ndepụta akụrụngwa nke GSE All-Share Index
Aluworks bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta akwa aluminom, eriri igwe, mkpuchi ụlọ, akwa akwa, wdg sitere na ingots aluminom raw
Ofu niime ndị isi na-ere ihe ndị Aluworks, ụlọ ọrụ Volta Aluminium, emechiri kpamkpam n'etiti Mee 2003 na mmalite 2006 n'ihi nsogbu dị na mkparịta ụka ọkụ eletrik
Aluworks bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe nke dị na Tema, Greater Accra
E hiwere ya na Febụwarị 24, 1978 ma gbanwee ya ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ụgwọ ọha na eze na Mee 28, 1996
Mgbe e nyere ya onyinye ọha na eze n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1996, edepụtara ya na Ghana Stock Exchange na Nọvemba 29, 1996 na ọnụahịa nke GH¢ 0135
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ ndepụta nke GSE All-Share Index
Aluworks bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-eme mpempe aluminum, coils, corrugated roofing, louver blades, wdg
site na ingots aluminum
Otu n'ime ndị na-ere ihe ndị bụ isi nke Aluworks, Volta Aluminum Company, mechiri kpamkpam n'etiti Mee 2003 na mmalite 2006 n'ihi nsogbu na mkparịta ụka ọkụ eletrik
Alva Rogers (amụrụ n'afọ 1959) bụ ónyé America na-ede egwuregwu, ónyé na-ede egwu, ónyé na'eme ihe nkiri, ónyé na na-agụ egwú, na ónyé nkuzi nka
A maara ya maka iji ụmụ bebi na ụmụ bebi eme ihe n'ọrụ interdisciplinary
Rogers rụrụ ọrụ Eula Peazant na ihe nkiri Julie Dash nke 1991 Daughters of the Dust
ma bụrụkwa onye na-agụ egwú na New York City alternative rock band Band of Susans
A mụrụ Rogers ma zụlite ya na New York City, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na itinye uche na egwu olu na The High School of Music & Art
O nwere nzere bachelọ na akụkọ ihe méré eme' nke America na Marietta College
N'afọ 1995, ọ natara Master of Fine Arts na ederede ihe nkiri egwu site na Tisch School of the Arts na Mahadum New York
N'afọ 1998, ọ natara Master of Fine Arts na nka édémédé site na Mahadum Brown, na 2013, ọ natara Masters of Arts na nkuzi na-elekwasị anya na akụkọ ihe méré eme' site na Bard College
Rogers bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Manhattan
Rogers abụwo akụkụ nke ọtụtụ ndị omenkà ama ama

Site na 1985 rụo 1989, ọ bụ ónyé guzobere Rodeo Caldonia, otu ndị inyom ojii na-ese ihe nke e guzobere na mpaghara Brooklyn nke Fort Greene nke gụnyere ndị na-ese egwu Lorna Simpson, Chakaia Booker na Sandye Wilson na ndị ọzọ
Ya na Lisa Jones, ónyé so na Rodeo Caldonia, dere usoro ihe nkiri redio - Aunt Aida's Hand (1989), Stained (1991), na Ethnic Cleansing (1993) - màkà New American Radio na National Public Radio
N'afọ 2015, Greg Tate kwadoro mkparịta ụka panel na Rogers na Lisa Jones banyéré Rodeo Caldonia na ihe nkiri 2011 Brooklyn Boheme
Alva Rogers na ọrụ ya na Rodeo Caldonia gụnyere na 2017 Brooklyn Museum exhibition We Wanted a Revolution Black Radical Women, 1965 rụo 1985 nké Rujeko Hockley na Catherine Morris haziri
N'oge ngosi Robert Colescott na 1989 na New Museum, e gosipụtara Rogers na Black to the Future Alva Rogers in Performance, mmemme ọha na eze nké wepụrụ nsogbụ ndị dị na ọrụ Colescott
Ọ bụ Kellie Jones haziri mmemme ahụ

Ya na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri Heather Henson na ónyé na'ede egwu Bruce Monroe, o mepụtara egwu atọ ịsa ahụ n'abalị, mermaid, na Sunday (nke emere Off-Off-Broadway dị ka akụkụ nke usoro New Works Now! na Public Theater)
Rogers mepụtara ihe ndekọ màkà ọrụ Whitfield Lovell bụ Whispers from the Walls
Rogers pụtara n'ihu mbipụta mara mma nke Essence Magazine na Jenụwarị 1993
Ọ bụ ónyé na-ese foto Lyle Ashton Harris na Dawoud Bey sere ya foto
Rogers's works as a playwright include The Bride Who Became Frightened When She Saw Life Open, The Doll Plays, and Scooping the Darkness Empty
Rogers enwetala onyinye site na Jim Henson Foundation, National Endowment for the Arts, New York Foundation for the Arts Fellowship in Playwriting na 2004, na Rockefeller Foundation
