Amaka Osakwe (amụrụ 1987) bụ onye na-emepụta ejiji nke Naijiria na onye mepụtara akara ejiji sitere na Africa aha ya bụ Maki Oh
O durula labelụ uwe nwanyị ya kemgbe afọ 2010 site na Lagos, ma ọ bụ akara sitere na Naijiria nke a nabatara n'ụwa niile
Osakwe bụ onye Igbo
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Arts Bournemouth ebe ọ nwetara BA na ọmụmụ ejiji
N'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ/oyi 2010 ọ malitere labelụ ya
Site na mkpali emume ime ime obodo Ghana, 'Dipo rites-of-passage' nke ụmụ agbọghọ na-ekere òkè na-agba ọtọ ma na-achọ ya mma, Osakwe ejirila ikwa akwa ọdịnala egwuri egwu
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ihe ngosi ejiji US chọtara akara ya na 2012, mgbe o gosipụtara atụmatụ ya na New York Fashion Week
Ihe mbinye aka nke ya bụ iji akwa indigo n'omenaala nke ndị Yoruba a na-akpọ adire, ọpụrụiche omenala ya gbadoro ụkwụ na steeti Ogun na Osun nke oge a na ọdịda anyanwụ Naijiria
Ihe ọzọ bụ ụzọ o si ejikọta silhouettes ọdịda anyanwụ na akwa ndị dị n'ime obodo na ihe ndị e ji emepụta ihe—iji mara, uwe elu lace-blouse na-pencil nke etinyere na bọọlụ anya raffia na-adịghị mma
Kpakpando mba ụwa dịka onye na-abụ abụ Beyoncé na Rihanna na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Hollywood bụ Kerry Washington eyiela ụwa ndị ejiji Naijiria mere
Nwanyị mbụ US, Michelle Obama, onye a ma ama maka ịbụ akara ngosi ụdị, yi uwe elu Amaka Osakwe chepụtara Maki Oh n'oge okpomọkụ 2013 na njem Ọ jere na South Africa
Ndị na-eyikwa ihe ngosi ya dịka Solange Knowles, Lady Gaga, Issa Rae, na Leelee Sobieski na onye na-eme ihe nkiri TV Nigeria bụ Eku Edewor
Ọ na-eresị mba ụwa uwe ya site na Farfetchcom, na United States na McMullen boutique na Oakland
Akpọrọ Osakwe aha 'Onye Nhazi nke Afọ' site na akwụkwọ akụkọ ejiji nke Africa a na-akpo ARISE
Kemgbe afọ 2010, a na-egosipụta ọrụ ya na Museum na Fashion Institute of Technology, Vitra Design Museum, na Brighton Museum & Art Gallery
Amal Ayouch (a mụrụ n'afọ 1966) bụ onye mba Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri nke kemgbe ngwụcha afọ 1990 na-eme n'asụsụ French ma n'elu ikpo okwu ma, karịa ihe niile, na ihe nkiri
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2015, e nyere ya ihe nrite na African Women's Film Festival na Brazzaville
Ayouch arụwo ọrụ dị mkpa na Fondation des arts vivants (Living Arts Foundation) nke Morocco
A mụrụ ya na Casablanca n'afọ 1966, Amal Ayouch gosipụtara mmasị n'ime ihe nkiri site na nwata, na-eme ihe nkiri na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, ọ bịarutere Montpellier ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ahụ maka ọgwụ
Mgbe ọ nọ na mahadum, n'afọ 1987 ọ sonyeere otu ihe nkiri nke dị na ngalaba akwụkwọ French
Ọ malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya site n'enyemaka nke onye ọzọ na-ahụ maka ọgwụ, Hassan Benjelloun, onye nyere ya òkè dị mkpa na Les Amis d'hier (1998)
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Hakim Noury kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Destin de Femme ya na Rachid El Ouali
N'ịbụ nwanyị jụrụ ido onwe ya n'okpuru di siri ike, o nyere aka na ihe ịga nke ọma nke ihe nkiri ahụ
N'afọ 1999, o kwetara igosipụta nwanyị na-enweghị omume ọma na Ali Zaoua nke nwa nwanne ya Nabil Ayouch duziri
Ọrụ yiri nke ahụ sochiri na Farida Belyazid's Casablanca, Casablanca (2002) na Chassan Benjelloun's Les lèvres du silence (2001) na Farida Beyazids Casa Blanca, Casa Blanca (2002)
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri na Driss Chouika's Le jeu de l'amour (2006), na-enye ya ohere ịchịkwa ọrụ siri ike na Younes Megri
O mekwara ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ na-aga nke ọma gụnyere Les Anges de Satan (2007)
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri abụọ nke Nabil Lahlou duziri, Les années de l'exil (2001) na Tabite or not Tabite (2004)
Ọ bụkwa Lahlou gbara ya ume ime ihe nkiri, na-akpọ ya ka ọ pụta na ihe nkiri ya, gụnyere Ophélie n'est pas Morte, Les Tortues, Antigone, na En Attendant Godot
Amal Kenawy (1974 - 19 Ọgọst 2012) bụ onye Egypt na-ese ihe nkiri nke oge a, nke a maara nke ọma maka vidiyo ya, arụmọrụ ya na ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike kemgbe afọ 1998
Ọrụ ya na-aga nke ọma nyeere ya aka inweta nkwado na mba ụwa
A mụrụ Amal Kenawy na 1974 na Cairo, Egypt
O gosipụtara mmasị na ihe nkiri, nka na ejiji site na nwata
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, Amal na-eji akwa ọ bụla ọ nwere ike ịchọta eme uwe nke ya
Nne na nna ya nwere nsogbu ego ebe Amal bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ anọ
Ọmụmụ nka ya malitere na Egypt Cinema Institute
N'afọ 1999, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na eserese, site na Faculty of Fine Arts na Mahadum Helwan
Ọ malitere ọrụ nka ya dị ka nwa akwụkwọ, ya na nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye, Abdel Ghany Kenawy
Njikọ ha mere ka ọtụtụ ihe osise sitere na ihe ọkpụkpụ, ihe osise na vidiyo
Ọrụ ha nwetara ọtụtụ onyinye na nkwado mba ụwa, gụnyere UNESCO's Grand Prize na International Cairo Biennale
Amal lụrụ Shady Elnoshokaty, onye na-ese ihe n'oge a nke nyeere ya aka na mbido ọrụ ya
Mgbe ha gbara alụkwaghịm, Amal na nwa ya nwoke, Yassin biri
Ọrụ ya n'onwe ya sitere n'ụzọ dị nso karị
O jiri ahụ nke ya na ihe ngosi nke ihe ndị na-emebi emebi, anụmanụ na ihe, iji gosipụta ihe mgbu uche na nke anụ ahụ ma kwuo okwu dịka ọmụmụ, alụmdi na nwunye, ọnwụ, nrọ na ncheta
Amal Kenawy nwụrụ n'abalị iri noolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2012, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ na asatọ mgbe ọ lụchara ọgụ ogologo oge na leukemia
A ka na-egosipụta ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na ụlọ ọrụ gburugburu ụwa
A na-echeta ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na-akpali akpali na Middle East
Ọ bụ nwanyị na-ese ihe, nke a na-akwanyere ùgwù maka ihe okike ya na nraranye miri emi n'ọrụ ya, ọ bụ ezie na ọ dị mkpụmkpụ

A na-anakọta ọrụ ya site na nnukwu nchịkọta ọha na eze, dị ka Mathaf Arab Museum of Modern Art na Qatar na Sharjah Art Foundation na UAE, ma gosipụta ya na nnukwu biennials dị ka Dakar Biennale na Sharjah Biennial
Amal Maher (amụrụ na 19 Febụwarị 1985) bụ onye na-agụ egwu n'Ijipt
Umm Kulthum nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ebe ọ nọ
Ọ malitere ịbụ abụ mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị ma ọha na eze chọpụtara ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise site n'ịgbaso abụ Umm Kulthum
N'ikpebi ịhapụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ọdịnala, Maher debanyere aha na otu Conservatory of Arabic music iji malite ọrụ ịbụ abụ
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ zutere onye na-ede egwu Mohamed Diae, onye ọ mechara lụọ ma mụọ nwa nwoke
Diae nyeere Amal Maher aka wepụta egwu na vidiyo maka Ely Binak W Binah
Abụ ahụ na-ewu ewu na redio na telivishọn egwu
Maher dekọrọ egwu mbụ ya na 2006 ma nweta nkwado nke Ammar El Sherei, onye ọ na-ewere dị ka nna ime mmụọ ya n'ihi na ọ bụ onye nkwado na onye nduzi na-eguzosi ike n'ihe n'ọrụ ya niile
N'afọ 2004, o wepụtara abọm mbụ ya, Isa 'Ini Ana na ọtụtụ egwu dịka Eini Aliki Ta Tiba, Makanak, Alo El Malayka, Ana El Basha Ghona, Ana Baadak na Ya Marsr
Maher emeela ọtụtụ egwu na Egypt na mba ndị gbara ya gburugburu
N'afọ 2009, ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ememme na mpaghara ahụ
O dekọrọ abọm nke abụọ nke a ka na-ebipụtabeghị
Na mbụ, e mere nkwado maka iweputa ya n'afọ 2010, e yigharịrị ụbọchị ntọhapụ ahụ gaa n'afọ ọhụrụ, mgbe ahụ gaa n'etiti Jenụwarị, na ihe ndị ọzọ
O weputara abọm akpọrọ Araf Mnein n'afọ 2011, ọ nwetakwara ihe nrite maka 'Abọm Kasị Mma site n'aka Onye Nwanyị Na-eme Ihe'
Maher nwere otu nwa nwoke 'Omar' site na alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya na onye na-ede egwu Mohamed Diaa
O tinyere akwụkwọ ịgba alụkwaghịm mgbe otu afọ nke alụmdi na nwunye ahụ gasịrị
E mechara kọọ na ọ lụrụ Saudi Turki Al-Sheikh na 2017
Na June 2021, ọ kwupụtara ezumike nká ya na ụlọ ọrụ egwu, n'ihi ihe onwe ya

Amal Abdulrahim Othman (amụrụ na 13 Febụwarị 1934) bụ onye bụbu minista Ijipt, onye otu National Democratic Party na onye bụbu onye otu Egyptian People's Assembly (Parliament) site na mpaghara Dokki nke Giza

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Inshọransị na Mmekọrịta Ọha na Eze na ozi 15 na-esote site na ozi nke atọ nke Mamdouh Salem ruo Kamal al-Ganzouri mbụ ruo ihe dị ka afọ 20 n'oge site na 3 Febụwarị na afọ 1977 ruo 8 Julaị afọ 1997 n'okpuru onyeisi oche nke ndị isi ozi itoolu dị iche iche
Ikike nke Iwu Mahadum Cairo, afọ 1955
Diploma na sayensị mpụ na Masters site na Mahadum Cairo, afọ 1958
PhD na okwu mpụ, Mahadum Cairo, afọ 1964
PhD site na Mahadum nke Rome, n'echiche nke prọfesọ omume na iwu ntụnyere, afọ 1964
National Democratic Party - Ọfịs ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Kansụl Mba Maka Ụmụ nwanyị (Ijipt)
Prọfesọ na Ngalaba iwu, Mahadum Cairo, ma lekọta ọtụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ doctoral na master na ngalaba mpụ
Amal Ramsis (Arabic أمل رمسيس) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'Ijipt
Ọ gụrụ iduzi na International Film and Television School nke dị na Madrid
Ọ duziri Silence na Plateau

E nyela ihe nkiri 'Forbidden' nke Ramsis onyinye ndị na-ege ntị maka Best Feature Documentary na Drac Magic (May 2011), Best Film na Arab Film Festival nke Rotterdam (September 2011), Best Movie for Human Rights na Festival Internacional de Cine Invisible de Bilbao (September 2011), Best Film in the Festival of Political Cinema nke Women of Madrid (December 2011) mere na Best Documentary Film na Festival Internacional nke Cine Pobre (April 2012); e gosikwara ya na Millennium Film Festival na Arab Film nke Berlin

The Trace of the Butterfly ya, ihe nkiri kwụụrụ onwe ya kpamkpam na-enweghị ego si mpụga, enwetala onyinye ndị na-ege ntị na Dortmund na Cologne's International Women's Film Festival ma gosipụta ya na Istanbul Film Festival, CINEQUEST Film Festival na California, Her Africa Film Festival na IAWRT African Film Festival

N'afọ 2008, o guzobere Caravan of Arab and Latin American Women's Films (Arabic قافلة سينما المرأة العربية واللاتينية) ma ọ bụ Entre Cineastas (Arabic بين سينمائيات), nke mechara ghọọ Cairo International Women's Film Festival (Arabic مهرجان القاهرة الدولي لسينما المرأة)
Ọ bụ emume mbụ nke ụdị ya n'ụwa Arab
Ramsis na-edukwa usoro One-Minute Workshop ebe ọ na-azụ ụmụ nwanyị na-abụghị ndị ọkachamara na isi ihe nkiri na ntụziaka ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi
Ramsis jere ozi na Rwe Film Award selection jury na 2015
Amalia Uys (a mụrụ na 14 Ọktoba 1984) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
Ọ pụtara dịka San-Mari van Graan na ihe nkiri ncha 7de Laan site n'afọ 2006 ruo 2013
A mụrụ Uys na Springbok, Northern Cape
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Hoërskool Menlopark na Menlo Park, Gauteng
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Stellenbosch n'afọ 2003, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ kwagara Johannesburg
Na Satọdee 31 Mee 2008, Uys merụrụ ahụ mgbe helikọpta ya na ndị otu 7de Laan abụọ (Sekoati Tsubane na Hazel Hinda) na-eme njem na-adaba n'ụgbọala obere oge ka ọ kwụsịrị
Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nọ na Kroonstad maka ụbọchị mbụ nke njem nkwalite ọnwa 12 maka SABC2
A tọhapụrụ Tsubane na Hinda n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe a kpọgara ha n'ụlọ ọgwụ mana Uys ga-anọ n'abalị maka nkwarụ aka ya
Ma onye ọkwọ ụgbọelu ma ọ bụ onye ọkwọ ụgbọala merụrụ ahụ n'ihe ahụ merenụ
Amamihe, utu aha Sayensị (búrú Science na asụsụ bekee) bu ihe éjị ẹ tu ihe ómárí màkà ihe nor nà àlà há gí jí ẹ ké íwú na ihe kààkà maka uwa nke há mùrù
Mgbe ómárí kárùrù, ọ dị ọtu hé shị né mé ihe gi gbanwe kà nke ọtu ė shì nẹ mẹ ihe nke bu nke di nma gị bu nke ndi amamihe gi ji e me ihe na amamihe
Iheȧ bu nlė na nlė, í lé otụ ihe dị, Í mà ihe, ómúmú-ónúọgụgụ, na Í jé ihe
Í bu amamihe bu Í nwéré ómárí zírí na ȯ bụ ézíbóté ihe nà ihü mádụ dí íche íche (ńdíá gà dírí ndi amamihe)
Í ji ihe è tú ézíbóté uzọr é jị nė mė ihe ga bu ihe éjị na kpo mádu onye amamihe
Amanda Petronella Austin (1859 - 1917) bụ onye America na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe
Nwa amaala Carrollton, Missouri, Austin gụrụ akwụkwọ site n'afọ 1877 ruo afọ 1879 na Mahadum nke Missouri, wee bụrụ nwa akwụkwọ George Caleb Bingham, onye o nyere abụọ n'ime ihe osise ya
N'afọ 1879, ọ kwagara Sacramento, ụlọ nwanne nna ya, Jefferson Wilcoxson; ọ na-arịa ọrịa, na nloghachi maka nlekọta ya, o nyere ya ego iji gaa n'ihu na ọzụzụ ya, nke o mere na studio nke Norton Bush
Ngosipụta mbụ ya bịara n'afọ 1880 California State Fair, ebe eserese ya nwetara otuto site n'aka onye nkatọ nke The Sacramento Bee
N'afọ sochirinụ na Fair, ngosi nke Morning Glories ya wetara ya aha ọjọọ

Na Mee nke afọ1882 ọ debara aha na San Francisco School of Design; ọ gara n'ihu na-egosipụta mgbe niile na Sacramento n'oge a, nakwa na San Francisco Art Association, ebe ọ natara nrite ọla edo na nsọpụrụ
Mgbe e mesịrị na 1885 ọ kụziri ihe ọnwa ole na ole na School of Design na Sacrament; na Jenụwarị 16, 1886, o mepere ụlọ ọrụ nke ya na ụlọ Oddfellows nke obodo ahụ
Klas eserese ya dọtara ọtụtụ ụmụ akwụkwọ
N'afọ 1908 Austin gara Paris, ebe ọ debere ụlọ ọrụ ruo 1912 ma soro Jean Escoula na Emile Renard mụọ ihe
N'ebe a, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ihe ọkpụkpụ, n'afọ 1909 a nabatara marble bust nke Miss Quinn maka ngosi na Société Nationale des Beaux-Arts
Ihe ngosi ya mere ka ọ nweta ohere na Union Internationale des Beaux-Artes et des Lettres
N'afọ 1912 ọ laghachiri Sacramento; Miss Quinn tinyere ọrụ ndị ọzọ, gosipụtara na Panama-Pacific International Exposition
Site na ihe ọkpụkpụ ọzọ, ọ gara ihe ngosi na Buffalo Fine Arts Academy na Ụlọ akwụkwọ nka nke Chicago
N'afọ 1916, ya na ọrụ sitere n'obodo Sacramento, Austin laghachiri ọzọ na Paris iji mee ihe ncheta, naanị dọkịta ya gwara ya ka ọ laghachi ebe ọ na-anwụ n'ihi ọrịa kansa
Ka ọ na-aga, ọ nwụrụ na New York City, ụbọchị atọ tupu ọ gbaa afọ iri ise na asatọ
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ọnụ ọnwụ, Austin lụrụ E
Lee Allen
Ọ hapụrụ ya ihe onwunwe ya niile n'uche ya, mana ezinụlọ ya zọrọ ya
Ihe si na ya pụta bụ na e kewara ọrụ ya ma ihe nketa ya daa n'ọchịchịrị
Morning Glories, nke dị ugbu a n'etiti ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke Crocker Art Museum, gụnyere na ngosi mmeghe nke National Museum of Women in the Arts, American Women Artists 1830–1930, n'afọ 1987
Amanda Benedicta Antony ( ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị 24 Julaị 1993), nke a maara dịka Amanda Black, bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu na South Africa
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Gcuwa ọrụ ya malitere na 1999 mgbe ọ dị afọ 6 na-abụ abụ na ndị ukwe chọọchị
Amanda bụ onye asọmpi na Idols South Africa oge 11
Black kwagara Johannesburg na 2016 iji chụsoo ọrụ ya na egwu
Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Ambitiouz Entertainment na 2016 wee nweta nkwado n'otu afọ ahụ mgbe a tọhapụrụ egwu egwu ya 'Amazulu', nke a họpụtara maka ọtụtụ onyinye egwu
Abọm studio mbụ ya Amazulu (2016), nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ahịa ma bụrụ nke meriri 'Album of the Year', 'Best Newcomer of the Year,' 'Best Female Artist of the Year' na 'Best R&B Soul/Reggae Album'
N'afọ 2019, a kpọrọ ya onye na-ese ihe kachasị na Apple Music
Ebipụtara abọm studio nke atọ nke Amanda, Mnyama na 2021
E bu ụzọ nwee egwu abụọ; 'Kutheni Na' na 'Let It Go'
Amanda Benedicta Antony bụ onye Xhosa
A mụrụ ya na 24 Julaị 1993 na Mthatha, Eastern Cape, South Africa, ma too na Butterworth, Eastern Cape

O mechara kwaga Port Elizabeth, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Kabega Christian School, Port Elizabeth, tupu ọ gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Nelson Mandela Metropolitan, ebe ọ mụrụ Music Education
Ọ malitere ịgụ egwu mgbe ọ dị obere n'ụlọ ụka na n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ruo mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri na abụọ, mgbe ọ malitere ịsọ mpi na ịchụ akara aka ya bụ nke kpughere ya maka ime ihe nkiri
O sonyere na mbipụta atọ nke Idols South Africa mana ọ ghọrọ ọkacha mmasị ndị na-akwado ya na Oge 11 nke ngosi nkà nke o mere ka ọ banye n'elu 7
N'ihi ịchụso ọrụ egwu ya, ọ kwagara Johannesburg na Jenụwarị 2016, ebe Ambitiouz Entertainment bịakwutere ya, bụ ndị nyere ya nkwekọrịta ndekọ
N'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2016, ọ wepụtara egwu mbụ ya, 'Amazulu' bụ egwu sitere na abọm studio mbụ ya, Amazulu Egwú ahụ nwetara ihe karịrị nde mmadụ anọ lelere ya na YouTube
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2016, ọ wepụtara abọm izizi ya a na-atụ anya ya Amazulu site na Ambitiouz Entertainment ka ọ bụrụ ihe ịga nke ọma na nyocha dị mma
N'okpuru otu ọnwa mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya, abọm ahụ rere ihe karịrị 31,000 nke mere ka ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ nke South Africa kwado ya platinum
O nwetakwara nhọpụta ya n'ụdị ise ma na mbipụta nke iri na isii nke Metro FM Music Awards, na 2017 South African Music Awards nke ọ bụla
A họpụtakwara ya maka Viewers Choice Best International Act na mbipụta 2017 nke BET Awards
N'abalị nke 20 ọnwa Julaị 2018, ọ wepụtara 'Kahle', nke nwetara ihe karịrị otu nde nlele na YouTube
Anthony Hamilton mara ọkwa na Disemba 2018 na ya na Amanda Black na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na egwu
Na 30 Jenụwarị 2019 Amanda kwupụtara na ya na Sony Music Entertainment bịanyere aka na ya
O mechara wepụta egwu ya 'Thandwa Ndim', nke bụ nke mbụ ya wepụtara n'ime afọ abụọ
Egwú ahụ malitere na Metro FM's Fresh Breakfast Show na DJ Fresh na Somizi Mhlongo wee ruo n'ókè nke 1 na chaatị iTunes dị n'ógbè ahụ n'ụbọchị a tọhapụrụ ya
N'afọ 2020, ya na Berita rụkọkwara ọrụ na egwu, 'Siyathandana' site na album Songs in the Key of Love
Abọm ya bụ Power meriri Best Album of the year na South African Afro Music Awards (Saafma)
Na 4 June 2021, ọ wepụtara egwu 'Kutheni Na' nke gosipụtara Kwesta dị ka egwu nke abụọ site na abọm ya
Na 2 Julaị 2021, a tọhapụrụ egwu nke atọ ya 'Let It Go'
A tọhapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ya nke atọ bụ Mnyama na 6 Ọgọst 2021
Amanda Black malitere ịbụ abụ mgbe ọ dị obere na chọọchị ma mesịa gaa n'ihu na-abụ abụ maka ndị omenkà kachasị amasị ya, gụnyere Beyoncé, Whitney Houston, Brandy Norwood, na Brenda Fassie
Ọ na-abụ abụ na Xhosa na Bekee
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Patience Bambalele nke The Sowetan, ọ kọwara ụdị egwu ya dị ka Afro-soul na njikọta nke hip-hop na obere mkpụrụ obi na R&B
Na 29 Mee 2017 onye na-agụ egwu ahụ pụtara n'ajụjụjụ ọnụ na SuperSport TV show Homeground Xia nke Minnie Dlamini na Lungile Radu Xiajust kwadoro ọnwa ole na ole mgbe a tọhapụrụ album ya Amazulu
N'akụkụ ya bụ onye na-emepụta egwu ya bụ Christer Kobedi, onye kwuru na e mepụtara abọm ahụ ma mechaa ya n'ihe karịrị otu ọnwa
Onye na-agụ egwú ahụ kwukwara na abụ aha abọm 'Amazulu' bụ, n'ezie, abụ mbụ o dere n'asụsụ obodo ya, Xhosa
Amanda Black na-ejikarị Stipples nke Xhosa na-acha ihu chọọ ihu ya mma dị ka ngosipụta nke etu o si nwee obi ụtọ maka mgbọrọgwụ ya
'A na-eji ihe osise ihu nke Xhosa eme ihe iji nọchite anya ndị Xhosa
E nwere ụdị dị iche iche nke ụkpụrụ, nke ụmụ nwanyị na-emepụta
Mgbe m na-etolite, a na-emekarị ha n'oge pụrụ iche mana n'ime ime obodo ụfọdụ nke Eastern Cape, dịka ọmụmaatụ, umchokozo bụ omume kwa ụbọchị
Ihe osise ihu Xhosa m na-eyi n'ihu m aghọwo akụkụ nke akara m dị ka Amanda Black
Mana ọ malitere dị ka ụzọ isi gosipụta onwe m na ịnakwere onye m bụ
Nye m, ọ na-eweghachi ọdịbendị m dị ka nwanyị Xhosa ma na-enwe mmetụta mara mma mgbe m na-eme ya
Ọ na-ekwu maka m ibi ndụ dị ka m si ghọta ọdịbendị m
Ọ bụ ụzọ isi gosipụta mgbọrọgwụ m na ebe m si
Ka ọ na-etolite, Amanda enweghị mmasị n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na o nwere akpụkpọ ojii, ọ na-ekwu n'ihi na TV na-eme emume akpụkpọ ahụ na-acha ọcha ma ọ dị ya ka ọ dịghị mma n'ihi ya nwere akpụkpọ anụ ojii
Ọ malitere ịmụ banyere mgbọrọgwụ ya dị ka nwanyị Xhosa, akụkọ ihe mere eme ya na mmalite ya
Ime nke a nyeere ya aka ịghọta onye ọ bụ ma nyere ya aka ịhụ onwe ya n'anya dị ka nwanyị Afrịka
Nke a mekwara ka o kpebie ịmalite ise ihu ya na nka agbụrụ, ụzọ o si ede, egwu ọ na-eme na akụkọ ọ na-akọ n'ụzọ ụda
Amanda malitere ịmakụ onye ọ bụ mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Steve Bikoz Black Consciousness
Amanda Deyo (Ọktoba 24, 1838 ruo Nọvemba
Nọvemba 1, 1917) bụ onye ozi America Universalist, onye na-ahụ maka udo, na onye nta akụkọ
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere òtù ndị inyom
A mụrụ Julia Amanda Halstead na Clinton, Dutchess County, New York, ụbọchị iri abụọ na anọ, n'ọnwa October n' afọ 1838
A zụlitere ya na Society of Quakers, ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ọ bụ onye na-ekere òkè na nzukọ ha
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ruo oge ụfọdụ, ọ gara Poughkeepsie, New York, Collegiate Institute, ebe ọ gụsịrịụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1857
N'afọ 1857, ọ lụrụ Charles B
Deyo, onye ọrụ ugbo nke ndị Huguenot
O nyeere nwunye ya aka na mbọ ọ na-agba iji meziwanye ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ
Ezinụlọ ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Deyo nọ n'otu n'ime ncheta mmalite nke Universal Peace Union na New York City, ebe ọ zutere Lucretia Mott, Alfred H
Love, na ndị ọzọ nke ndị enyi udo
N'ebe ahụ, o mere akara ya dị ka onye na-akwado ozizi nke nzukọ ahụ, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ bụ onye na-agbachitere ihe kpatara ya
Ọ gara emume ncheta udo niile na United States, gaa ọtụtụ ebe, kwuo okwu ugboro ugboro ma hazie ọtụtụ òtù udo
Deyo ghọrọ onye ụkọchukwu a họpụtara ahọpụta na chọọchị Universalist na 1885
N'afọ 1888, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ ụkọchịrị nke Chọọchị Universalist na Oxford, New York, ebe ọ bụbu ụkọchịa nke Chọọlụ Universalist na Poughkeepsie
O mechara bụrụ onye ụkọchukwu nke All Souls Universalist Church na Scranton, Pennsylvania, na afọ 1893, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ụtụ isi nke Universalist Church dị na San Diego, California
Ọ bụ onye a na-ejikọta ya na òtù ndị raara onwe ha nye iwepụ agha nke na a kpọrọ ya 'Onye Na-eme udo'
Deyo bụ otu n'ime ndị nnọchiteanya nke Universal Peace Union na International Peace Congress na Exposition Universelle nke 1889, ma rụọ ọrụ ụfọdụ dị irè na udo
E bipụtara adreesị ya na nnọkọ ahụ ma kesaa ya na ngosi ahụ
Ọ nọkwa ebe ahụ ma gosipụta akwụkwọ na Women's Rights Congress na Paris
Ọ nọchitere anya njikọ ahụ na Kansụl Ụmụ nwanyị nke e mere na Washington, D
na Machị, 1888, ma gosipụta oge ahụ site n'ịkpọ nnukwu nzukọ udo na Chọọchị Nna Anyị, ebe ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị a ma ama kwuru okwu

Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya n'ozi, na-ekwusa ozi ọma ugboro atọ na Sunfsy ọ bụla ma na-aga ememe olili ozu na agbamakwụkwọ, ọ bụ onye ọrụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ihe gbasara ịṅụbiga mmanya ókè na mmachibido iwu, ma n'otu oge, ọ gara ma kwuo maka mmasị ahụ ma hazie ọrụ ya
Otú ọ dị, e mere mgbalị ya kachasị ukwuu iji dochie udo maka agha na ime ka ihe isi ike na-ebilite mgbe niile n'ezinụlọ, agbata obi na ụka kwekọọ

Site na mgbalị ya na nke di ya, Dutchess County Peace Society, otu n'ime nnukwu alaka na-aga nke ọma nke Universal Peace Union, haziri na 1875 ma nọgide na-arụsi ọrụ ike ruo mgbe ọrụ ozi ya mere ka ọ dị mkpa inyefe ndị ọzọ ọrụ ahụ
Mgbe Deyo lara ezumike nká, ọ laghachiri n'okwukwe Quaker
Ọ nwụrụ na Nọvemba 1, 1917 na Glen Cove, New York
Amanda Dillon bụ agwa akụkọ ifo sitere na opera ncha ihe onyonyo ehihie America All My Children

Ọ bụ ada onye uwe ojii / onye nchọpụta Trevor Dillon na ogologo oge usoro villain Janet Marlowe aka 'Janet si Ọzọ Planet'; Otú ọ dị, e chere na Amanda bụ nwa nwanne mama ya bụ́ Natalie Marlowe, bụ́ onye mesịrị kuchiri ya
Alexis Manta gosipụtara agwa dị ka nwata site na 1996–2000, Chrishell Stause akọwawokwa agwa dị ka onye toro eto site na 2005 ruo na njedebe nke usoro a na 2011
Ụdị Amanda nke Stause malitere aghụghọ, onye na-eduhie eduhie, ma emesịa ghọọ onye tozuru okè
onye na-ekpo ọkụ ma dị obiọma n'ihi mmekọrịta ya na Jake Martin
Nne Amanda, bụ́ Janet, gbanwere àgwà ara ya ma gbalịa ịdị ka Natalie
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, Amanda ghọrọ enyi Jamie Martin na JR Chandler
Ezinụlọ Dillon mechara kwaga Colorado
Amanda kpebiri ịlaghachi na Mee 2005 ịga akwụkwọ na Mahadum Pine Valley
Ọ na-agbakọtakwa na azụmahịa JR na Jamie, na-achọ nwoke ga-egbo mkpa ya n'ụzọ ego, nke ukwuu na-ewe iwe nke Babe Carey, onye bụbu nwunye JR na enyi nwanyị Jamie
JR gwara Amanda ka ọ kewaa ha, o kwetakwara
N'ikpeazụ, Babe na Jamie tisara mgbe Phoebe Tyler Wallingford nwụrụ wee hapụ Jamie ego ya ma ọ bụrụ na ya na Babe kee
Amanda mere ka ọ kwaga, ma ọ dịghị anya Jamie jidere ma tụfuo ya
Janet bịara n'obodo mgbe a kpọgara Amanda n'ụlọ ọgwụ mgbe JR kụrụ ya, ọ bụ ezie na Babe na-ekwu na ọ nọ n'azụ wiil ahụ

Mgbe ihe mberede Amanda gasịrị, ọtụtụ ihe mere; A na-akwagharị Babe na steepụ, a hụrụ Kendall Hart ka ọ na-anọdụ n'elu ụlọ, a na-etinye nsí na ofe ekele Chandler, a tọọrọ Adam Chandler III (Little Adam)
Amanda na-atụ egwu na ọ bụ ya kpatara ya, ma kọọrọ Josh Madden banyere ya
Josh na-eji ohere ahụ ma na-aṅụ ọgwụ ọjọọ Erica Kane, wee tụba Amanda maka ya
Otú ọ dị, Amanda ghọtara na ọ bụ Janet kpatara ihe ndị ahụ, mana ọ gbachiri nkịtị maka nne ya
Mgbe e jidere ya maka ịṅụ ọgwụ ọjọọ Erica, Janet kpebiri ịbọ ọbọ na Erica's Mardi Gras ball
Amanda na-apụ, mana oge agafeela
Bọl Mardi Gras gbawara, gbuo Ethan Cambias
Janet tọọrọ Babe na nwa ya nwoke, Little Adam, ebe Amanda na-eme ike ya niile iji nyere JR, Jamie, Tad Martin, na Aidan Devane aka ịchọta ha
N'ikpeazụ, ha chọtara Janet, mana mgbe a napụtara Babe na Little Adam, Tad na Aidan ga-agwa Amanda na Janet egbuola nna ya, Trevor
Mfu a wutere Amanda, ọ maghịkwa otu esi emeso ya
Mgbe e mesịrị, Brooke English, nne Jamie, meghere ụlọ ya maka ya iji nyere ya aka ịgbake
Amanda laghachiri ọnwa ole na ole ka e mesịrị, nweta ọrụ na Fusion Cosmetics na ọbụna iwulite ọbụbụenyi na Babe
Ọ malitere mmekọrịta 'ndị enyi nwere uru' (mgbe ụfọdụ mmekọahụ) na Jonathan Lavery
N'ikpeazụ, ọ malitere ịzụlite mmetụta maka ya
Otú ọ dị, ọ ka hụrụ nwunye mbụ ya, Lily Montgomery, n'anya, Amanda na-aghọta na ọ pụghị ịbụ onye mmekọ ọzọ, na-eme ka ya na ya kwụsị
Mgbe Satin Slayer na-eyi ndụ Babe egwu, Amanda gakwuuru nne ya maka enyemaka iji chọpụta onye ogbugbu ahụ bụ
Ka oge na-aga, Adam Chandler duziri Janet ka ọ tọọrọ nwanne nwanyị Babe, Jenny Martin
Amanda na-ejide onwe ya ọzọ na ara Janet ma gbalịa ime ka nne ya kwenye inyeghachi Jenny nne na nna ya, Tad na Krystal Carey
Ka e mesịrị, a napụtara Jenny site n'enyemaka nke Jamie na Babe
Amanda mechara malite mmekọrịta ya na Jake Martin, mana ha na-anọgide na mmekọrịta ha n'ụzọ anụ ahụ
Mgbe Jake nwere esemokwu n'etiti Amanda na Taylor Thompson (mmasị ịhụnanya ọzọ), Amanda na-ewepụ ihe

Nna Babe na-akpa nkata, David Hayward, chọrọ inweta ikike nke Little Adam n'aka nna ya, JR
Ọ na-akwụ Amanda ụgwọ iji mee ka JR malite ịṅụ mmanya ọzọ
Amanda nwere ihe ịga nke ọma, mana ọ na-akwa ụta mgbe e mesịrị, ma gwa David ka ọ ghara ịnọ ya anya
Mgbe Amanda chọpụtara na ọ dị ime, ọ maghị ma David ma ọ bụ JR bụ nna
Jake laghachiri, ma bụrụ enyi ya mgbe ọ chọrọ enyemaka
Na mgbakwunye, onye ọrụ ibe ya, Randi, na di Randi, Dr
Frankie Hubbard, na-enyere ya aka mgbe ọ chọpụtara na David bụ nna nwa ya ma na-achọsi ike ịhapụ ya
Jake nọ ebe ahụ ka o nyere aka gbochie David, ha abụọ mechara hụ onwe ha n'anya; ha lụrụ na June 11, 2009
A mụrụ nwa nwoke Amanda mgbe ya na Jake nọ na njem ezumike ha
Ha abụọ na-eme atụmatụ iji mee ka David chee na nwa ahụ anwụọla ka ọ ghara itinye aka na ndụ nwa ahụ
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Jake nyere nwa ahụ onye bụbu enyi ya nwanyị, Liza Colby
Ka e mesịrị, a kpughere na Jake zoro nwa ahụ n'ezie n'ụlọ ime obodo na onye na-elekọta nwa ma nye Liza nwa ọzọ maka nkuchi
Amanda gụrụ nwa ya nwoke, Trevor, n'aha nna ya
Amanda na-eme atụmatụ ịchọta Trevor gbahapụrụ ma kuchie ya dị ka nke ya
Otú ọ dị, atụmatụ ya dara mgbe Randi weere nwa ahụ, ebe ọ tụfuru ime nke ya, David wee chọta nwa ahụ tupu ya na Jake enwee ike
Ruo ọtụtụ ọnwa mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, David mere ka ndụ ya bụrụ ihe mwute, na-amanye ya ka ya na Trevor biri, ma ọ bụ naanị ya ga-elekọta ya
Ọ kpachapụrụ anya na-anwa imebi alụmdi na nwunye Jake na Amanda, ebe Amanda na-alụ ọgụ iji chekwaa alụmdi na ụba ya
Nkwado David na-agbawa agbawa na Jenụwarị 2010, mgbe Amanda mere ka Trevor nwalere ọrịa ọbara David kwuru na ya nwere
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na-adịghị mma, Amanda nwere ule nna ma chọpụta na Jake bụ nna Trevor
Amanda chụpụrụ David, ya, Jake, na Trevor wee nwetaghachi ndụ ha, n'ikpeazụ ghọọ ezinụlọ ha na-arọ nrọ mgbe niile
Amanda gara rụọ ọrụ na Fusion dị ka ihe nlereanya
N'ime usoro nke inweta aha ọma, ọ nwetara onye na-eso ụzọ aha ya bụ 'Amandafan'
Onye na-eso ya mechara bụrụ Janet, onye si n'ụlọ ọgwụ ndị isi mgbaka pụta, kpebisiri ike ịbụ akụkụ nke ndụ nwa ya nwanyị na nwa nwa ya
E jidere ya ma zighachi ya, mana Amanda na-ajụ ikike nke ya dị ka nne n'ihi isi mgbaka nne ya
Jake na-anwa ime ka o kwenye na ọ bụ ezigbo nne
N'ụbọchị ncheta agbamakwụkwọ mbụ ha, ọ tụbara Amanda agbamakwụkwọ nke nrọ ya n'ememe mmezigharị nkwa, na-enyere ya aka iweghachite obi ike ya

Amanda na Jake nwere ike ịnọgide na-esikwu ike mgbe ha na ndị enyi ha na-eche ọnọdụ siri ike ihu, dị ka Angie Hubbard na-enweghị anya ya na Greenlee Smythe na-aga ikpe maka igbu David (di Greenlee n'oge ahụ)
O mechara pụta na o mebiri ọnwụ ya
Amanda ghọrọ enyi Annie Lavery mgbe Annie chere na ndụ ya na-amalite ịda
Otú ọ dị, mgbe nwunye mbụ Jake, Cara Finn, bịara n'obodo, ya na Griffin Castillo, nwoke Cara hapụrụ Jake, Amanda enweghị obi ụtọ na nke a ma gbalịa imekọ ihe ọnụ n'ebe Cara nọ iji lekwasị ya anya
E mechara kpughee na Griffin bụ nwanne Cara n'ezie
Amanda malitere iche ma ọ bụrụ na nke a emetụtala Jake karịa ka ọ kwenyere
N'ikpeazụ, mgbe Cara kpebiri ịnọ na Pine Valley, Amanda malitere ịchọ ka ọ pụọ ma kpọọ INS ka ọ kọọ na Cara ebiwo na Pine Valley na paspọtụ aghụghọ
Otú ọ dị, o mechara chọpụta site n'aka Tad na otu ndị na-ere ọgwụ ọjọọ na-achụ Cara; ya mere, Tad, Jake, na Griffin na-agba izu iji mebie ọnwụ Cara iji zọpụta ndụ ya

N'ịbụ onye ụjọ na-atụ ma na-enwe obi amamikpe, Amanda kpọrọ INS na mgbalị ịkagbu nchegbu paspọtụ ya, mana emeela mmebi ahụ; otu ndị ọrụ nchekwa Homeland rutere n'ụlọ ọgwụ iji jide Cara maka wayo paspọtụ
Tad na-ekwu na ya na Cara na-agba akwụkwọ iji chebe ya
Jake mechara chọpụta na Amanda kpọrọ INS ma iwe, mana ọ maghị otu esi enyere Amanda aka
Tad na Cara lụrụ na Machị 8, 2011, ozugbo Cara chọpụtara ma tie Amanda mkpu maka ịnye ya
Amanda mechiri na-aṅụbiga mmanya ókè na ConFusion tupu JR ewere ya laa n'ụlọ
N'ikpeazụ, ọ nwetara ọrụ na Chandler Enterprises iji nyere ya aka mee ka ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike
Ọtụtụ nsogbu bilitere na Jake na Cara, mgbe e jidere Griffin maka igbu ọchụ, wakpo ya na cell ya, wee pụọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ n'oge mgbaàmà ọkụ ụgha
Amanda chọpụtara na Jake ghaara ụgha banyere ọnọdụ Griffin iji mee ka ọ nọrọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ na n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, iwe wee na-ewe ya na ọ na-etinye ọrụ ya n'ihe ize ndụ maka nwunye mbụ ya
Iji gbalịa iweghachi Jake, Amanda tụfuru ọgwụ mgbochi ọmụmụ ya
Amanda na-enyo Jake enyo mgbe ọ malitere ịpụ n'ebe ọ nọ, wee pụta n'azụ oge na baptism Lucy Hubbard
Ọ malitere iche na Jake na Cara dinara ọnụ
Mgbe ọ nwetara ihe akaebe, ọ na-enwe nkụda mmụọ ma gwa JR banyere ihe ọ chọpụtara
Ha na-emecha hie ụra ọnụ, Amanda na-akwa ụta ozugbo
Ka e mesịrị, ọ chọpụtara na Jake susuru Cara ọnụ, mana ya na ya dina, na-eme ka ọ nwekwuo obi amamikpe
Ọ bụ ezie na Amanda chọrọ ịgwa Jake banyere ekwesịghị ntụkwasị obi ya, JR gwara ya ka ọ ghara
Otú ọ dị, n'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ malitere inwe isi ọwụwa na agbọ onunu, ọ na-atụkwa egwu na ọ nwere ike ịdị ime nwa JR
Ọ na-abanye maka ule, nke na-abịaghachi na-adịghị mma, mana Cara mechara gwa ya na enwere ohere ọ nwere ike ịnwe STD, na-echegbu Amanda
Ule na-esote na-alaghachi na-egosi, Amanda na-atụkwa egwu banyere otu ọ ga-esi gwa Jake banyere ọrịa STD ya
Amanda chọpụtara na ya nwere HPV, nke nwere ike ibute ọrịa kansa cervical
O mechara gwa Jake gbasara STD ka o nyere aka chebe ya, ma gwakwa ya ihe gbasara ya na JR
Mgbe ọ kọwara ọnọdụ ndị butere ya, Jake kwuru na ya ga-agbaghara ya, mana Amanda ka na-ama ya ikpe wee pụọ
Na-echegbu onwe ya banyere ihe nwere ike ime, ọ gwara Jake ka ọ gaa n'ihu na ndụ ya ma lekọta Trevor ma ọ bụrụ na ihe emee ya
Otú ọ dị, Jake gwara ya na ya ga-anọnyere ya ma nyere ya aka ịlụso ọrịa cancer ọgụ ma ọ bụrụ na o nwere ya, na-ekpebisi ike ịnọnyere ya
Amanda nwere ule ndị na-esote, nke na-egosi na o nwere ọrịa kansa cervical
Jake na-anọ n'akụkụ ya mgbe ọ nwetara nchoputa ahụ wee kwuo maka nhọrọ ọgwụgwọ
Amanda na-emekwa udo na Cara, onye ghọtara agha Amanda dị ka o nwere ọrịa cancer mgbe ọ bụ nwata, nakwa
Amanda kpebiri ime hysterectomy iji kwụsị ọrịa kansa ịgbasa
Ka ọ na-ejikere maka nke a, a nabata Janet n'ụlọ ọgwụ mgbe a gbachara Oak Haven ọkụ ma na-akwado mmerụ ahụ ọkụ
Ọ na-eme ka nne ya mara maka nchọpụta ọrịa kansa
N'ụzọ dị ịtụnanya, Janet bụ onye na-enye Amanda ndụmọdụ iji nyere ya aka inye ya obi ike ịnọgide na-alụ ọgụ
Amanda na-abanye maka ịwa ahụ na Jake kwere nkwa ịnọ ebe ahụ mgbe ọ pụtara
N'agbanyeghị na ha enweghị ike ịmụ ụmụ ọzọ, Jake kwere Amanda nkwa na ha ga-eleba anya na nkuchi
Amanda chọpụtara na ọrịa kansa apụọla ma ọ dị ya mma
Ya na Jake ji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-ewughachi ndụ ha mgbe ihe niile ha mesoro n'afọ gara aga
Jake na Amanda chọpụtara Dixie Cooney, ezi ịhụnanya Tad ka dị ndụ ma gbalịa inyere ya aka ịgbake ọzọ
Na njedebe nke usoro ahụ, Tad na Dixie kwupụtara na ha na-emekọrịta ihe, ebe Jake na Amanda na-amalite ileba anya na nkuchi, na-enwe nchekwube banyere ịmalite ezinụlọ ọnụ
Àtụ All My Children
Amanda Sinegugu Dlamini (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 1988) bụbu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ South Africa
Ọ gbara bọọlụ na JVW FC dị ka onye egwuregwu n'anọ n'etiti
Ọ nọchitere anya otu ụmụ nwanyị South Africa na 2012 na 2016 Summer Olympics
Amụrụ Dlamini na Harding na KwaZulu Natal
Ọ malitere ịgba bọọlụ n'afọ 1999 maka otu ụmụ nwoke, akpọrọ Young Callies
Na ọkwa klọb, Dlamini agbarala Durban Ladies na Mahadum Johannesburg bọọlụ
Dlamini na-agbara JVW FC bọọlụ ugbu a ma soro n'otu ndị meriri na Sasol League Championship nke afọ 2019
Ọ gbara egwuregwu mbụ ya nke ndị otu sịniọ nke mba n'afọ 2007 na mmeri ọkpụ ise anaasataghị otu nke Naịjirịa na asọmpi Olympic
O nyere goolu mbụ ya na mba Netherlands
Ọ bụ onye kachasị nye goolu na egwuregwu Sasol Women's League nke afọ 2008

O so na ndị otu meriri ọla nchara na ọla ọcha na African Women's Championship nke afọ 2010 na African Women's Championship nke afọ 2012; na asọmpi 2010, a kpọrọ ya onye otu egwuregwu kacha naa uru bụ Most Valuable Player
Ọ bụ onye isi ndị otu mba ahụ n'agbata afọ 2011 na afọ 2013

Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị bọọlụ nke ise meriri otu narị iko nyere South Africa site n'egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide United States na July 2016, na-esote Janine van Wyk, Nompumelelo Nyandeni, Portia Modise na Noko Matlou
Tupu egwuregwu ahụ, o kwuru 'Ọ bụ nrọ m mgbe niile isonye n'egwuregwu nke otu mba, ọ dịtụbeghị mgbe m chọrọ ime ihe ọ bụla ọzọ ma e wezụga igba bọọlụ
Abụ m ihe m bụ taa n'ihi egwuregwu ahụ
Enweela m ọtụtụ ihe n'egwuregwu ahụ ma ịhụ onwe m na nweta okpu otu narị na-eme ka m nwee mmetụta uche
' N'otu egwuregwu ahụ, onye na-eche goolu America bụ Hope Solo meriri okpu nke otu narị ya nke United States
N'afọ 2012, ọ tọrọ hiwere Amanda Dlamini Girls Foundation na-nzube inye ụmụ agbọghọ nọ n'ime ime obodo enyemaka
Ọ bụzi onye nyocha bọọlụ na Supersport
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi njikwa azụmahịa na ahịa nke South African Football Association (SAFA)
Àtụ South Africa squad 2010 African Women's Championship
Amanda Mike-Ebeye (onye amụrụ na 30 Eprel 1986) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria na- eme kwa ihe nlere oge
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya na ihe gbasara ụlọ ọgwụ na ibu akụkọ
Ọ mere ihe nkiri ya izizi na Weeping Tiger (2008)
N'ajụjụ ọnụ n'afo 2013 nke ozi Najiria dere, Ebeye gosipụtara na dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-eme egwuregwu, ọ nwere ike ịga n'enweghị ihe ọ bụla maka nde naira iri ise
Ebeye si n’agbụrụ Agbor nke Delta steeti
Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mba Mmuta na diplọma na Mahadum Benson Idahosa
N’afọ 2016, ọ mụrụ nwa nwoke na Kanada
Ebe ikike kpughere na Instagram post na mbụ ọ naghị atụ anya echiche nke inwe ụmụ nke aka ya, mana kemgbe ọ mụrụ nwa ya, ọ nwere ekele maka Chineke maka ịgọzi ya na ya
N'afo 2016, nne Ebeye lụrụ ọzọ
Amanda Johnston (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1977) bụ onye Afrịka na Amerịka na-ede uri
A mụrụ ya na obodo East St
Louis, Illinois, ma o bi ugbu a na Round Rock / Austin, Texas
Amanda Johnston nwetara nzere Master of Fine Arts na edemede okike na Mahadum nke Southern Maine
Ọ bụ onye otu Stonecoast MFA, onye isi nchịkwa na onye guzobere Torch Literary Arts, na onye guzobere #BlackPoetsSpeakOut

Onye Affrilachian na-ede uri, onye bụbu Cave Canem Foundation Board President, na Austin Project Fellow, Torch Literary Arts founder na Black Poets Speak Out cofounder, Johnston bụ onye na-ede uri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri

Dị ka onye na-eme ihe ike na Black Poets Speak Out, ọrụ vidio nke gụnyere ndị African American na-ede uri na-eme mkpesa maka omume ọjọọ ndị uwe ojii na uri, o gosipụtara ikpe na-ezighị ezi agbụrụ na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na mba United States
Johnston bụ onye kere ụdị uri a maara dị ka Genesis

Ọ bụ ụdị nke nwere uri ise edere na ogidi, ma gụọ site n'elu ruo na ala, tinyere uri nke isii ọzọ nke e kere site n'ịgụ kọlụm ise niile ọnụ, site n'aka ekpe gaa n'aka nri, na uri nke asaa nke e kere site na okwu na ahịrịokwu ndị dị na kọlụm ise, nke a na-agụkwa site n'aka ekpe gaa n'aka nri
Abụ ndị ahụ aghaghịkwa ịgagharị n'usoro oge site na oge
Amanda Martín bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ na pati ndị ọrụ Ọ bụkwa onye nkuzi akụkọ ihe mere eme na onye ọrụ otu ndị ọrụ
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu ụlọ omebe iwu nke Obodo kwụụrụ onwe nke Buenos Aires na June 2021, dị ka onye ndoro-ndoro nke Fronters' Left Front; ọ ga-ejide oche ahụ ruo Disemba 2023
Amanda de Lange bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa nke na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu Gauteng Provincial Legislature maka Freedom Front Plus kemgbe Mee, na afọ 2019
Tupu a họpụta ya na ndị omeiwu, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye kansụl nke Mogale City Local Municipality
De Lange bụ onye otu Freedom Front Plus
A họpụtara ya ọzọ dị ka onye kansụl nke Mogale City Local Municipality na ntuli aka ime obodo nke afọ 2016
A họpụtakwara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye kansụl nke West Rand District Municipality
N'ụbọchị nzukọ kansụl nke ime obodo, onye ọrụ IEC gwara De Lange na e mehiere ihe nakwa na FF Plus enweghị oche na kansụl ahụ
Ọ gara nzukọ ọzọ na 24 Ọgọstụ iji kwupụta nchegbu ya, mana e wepụrụ ya n'ike n'ọkwa ahụ
Mgbe ntuli aka mpaghara Gauteng nke afọ 2019 gasịrị, a họpụtara De Lange ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke Gauteng Provincial
A ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka onye otu na 22 Mee, na afọ 2019
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2018, onye isi oche nke Novare Consultants wakporo nwa nwanyị De Lange dị ime
Amandina Lihamba (a mụrụ n'afọ 1944) bụ onye nkuzi Tanzanian, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na'ede egwuregwu na onye nduzi ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ prọfesọ na Mahadum Dar es Salaam na Ngalaba Fine and Performing Arts ma jee ozi dịka dean ya, onyeisi ngalaba, na onye otu kansụl mahadum
N'afọ 1989, o guzobere National Children Theatre Project na emume
O guzobekwara otu ihe nkiri ụmụ nwanyị Tuseme (Let's Speak Out) na Penina Muhando n'afọ 1998
A mụrụ Lihambra na Morogoro District, Tanzania n'afọ 1944
Ọ nwetara PhD ya na Mahadum Leeds
Nkwupụta doctoral ya n'afọ 1985 lekwasịrị anya na 'Politics and Theatre in Tanzania after the Arusha Declaration 1967-1984'
N'ebe ahụ, ọ na-akọwa etu mgbe Arusha Declaration gasịrị, ihe nkiri amaokwu Tanzanian ngonjera si malite site na ngwá ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke pati na-achị achị gaa n'ụdị na-agbanwe agbanwe na syncretic
Ewezuga egwuregwu na akwụkwọ ụmụaka, Lihamba dekwara Hawala ya fedha, dabere na onye nduzi ihe nkiri Senegalese Ousmane Sembène The Money-Order
Amandla bụ ihe nkiri 2022 nke Nerina De Jager duziri ma dee ya na Thabo Rametsi na Israel Matseke-Zulu mere E wepụtara ihe nkiri a na Jenụwarị 21, 2022 na Netflix
Amane Gobena Gemeda[nb] (amụrụ na 11 Septemba 1982) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke na-asọ mpi okachasi n'ihe omume ịgba ọsọ n'okporo ụzọ
O nwere marathon kacha mma nke 2 23 50 awa
Ọ malitere ọrụ mba ụwa ya na ịgba ọsọ mba ụwa ma bụrụ akụkụ nke ndị otu Etiopia nke meriri nrite ọla edo na ọsọ dị mkpirikpi na 2002 IAAF World Cross Country Championships
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ala n'okporo ụzọ ahụ, ọ nwetara ihe ịga nke ọma site na ịgbanwee asọmpi okporo ụzọ na 2007
Oge 2009 hụrụ ọganihu dị ịrịba ama ka ọ meriri Cooper River Bridge Run na Monument Avenue 10K agbụrụ
Ọ gara n'ihu merie mmeri marathon mbụ ya na Toronto Waterfront Marathon, na-agbawa ihe ndekọ ahụ site na opupu ya na ebe di anya
Ọ nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na East Asia na mbido afọ 2010, na-emeri ma Osaka Ladies Marathon na Seoul International Marathon
Amane nwetakwara mmeri mbụ ya n'ebe ndị ọzọ dị anya n'afọ ahụ site n'ịnọ n'ọnọdụ mbụ na Göteborgsvarvet ọkara marathon ma merie aha mba mbụ ya na mita 10,000

oKwa di elu mbu onwetara bu mgbahari mba nke uwa ma omechakwara mechaa asato na ihe gbasara ọsọ na ewee nwa oge 2002 iAAF world cross country championship na Dublinihe ntinye nke nyeere umunwanyi ndị Ethiopian aka(sonyekwara werknesh kidane abebech negussie nakwa genet gebregiorgis inweta ihe nrite gold medal na ihe nsoritampi o soritakwara MPI na ihe mgbarita ọsọ na Europe na afọ 2003 ruo afọ 2004 ma ìhè ndị omerela bu 5000 metres kacha onwe ya MMA na15 1950 na grand prix region lombardia na afọ 2004 ebe omechara mechaa ihe nke anona otu afọ ahụ ogosiputara ala ya na world countryihe nke abuo
Na agbanyeghi ihe nke irinaotu omechara na obughi onye nke mbu kama obu onye nke ano so na ndị izizi di elu bu ndi Ethiopian nwetara gold team
O mere nke mbụ ya na 10K na 2005 wee bụrụ onye nke abụọ na asọmpi na Ratingen, na-agwụcha n'azụ Teyba Erkesso
Ọ gbakwara ọsọ na nzukọ Golden Spike Ostrava na June wee bụrụ onye nke ise n'elu 5000 m
Mgbe ọ wepụsịrị oge n'egwuregwu na 2006, ọ laghachiri iji lekwasị anya na agbụrụ okporo ụzọ ma nwee obi ụtọ na njedebe podium na United States
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Peachtree 10K na Bolder Boulder races, yana Cooper River Bridge Run, ebe onye obodo ya Rehima Kedir kụrụ ya ma setịpụ ihe kacha mma nke 32 12 maka 10K
O merikwara ọsọ Nacht von Borgholzhausen nke dị kilomita isii na Germany na June n'afọ ahụ
N'afọ 2008, o meriri n'okporo ụzọ ụwa na Abu Dhabi 7K na Wharf to Wharf 6-miler
Ọ gara n'ihu ruo ọkara marathon n'afọ ahụ wee gbaa ọsọ ugboro abụọ na France ọ meriri Le Lion Half Marathon na Montbéliard (na-etinye ihe kacha mma nke 1 12 16) ma merie asọmpi ọzọ na Vemux
Amane mere nke mbụ ya na marathon na Jenụwarị 2009 na Houston Marathon ma o jisiri ike mechie n'ọnọdụ nke ise
Na Ras Al Khaimah Half Marathon n'ọnwa na-esote, o setịpụrụ ihe kacha mma nke 1 08 16 iji nweta ọnọdụ nke isii na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị
Njem ọzọ ọ pụtara na Los Angeles Marathon na Machị wee gaa n'ihu ìgwè ahụ, mana Tatyana Petrova meriri ya na njedebe ikpeazụ nke ọsọ ahụ
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, oge ya nke 2 26 53 maka ọnọdụ nke abụọ gosipụtara mgbanwe gara nke ọma na ogologo oge
O meriri nke ukwuu na United States n'oge ọkọchị ahụ, malite na mmeri na Cooper River Bridge Run na Monument Avenue 10K
Ọnọdụ nke ise na Peachtree Road Race sochiri nke atọ na Boilermaker Road Race
Amane gbara ọsọ marathon nke atọ ya n'afọ na Toronto Waterfront Marathon

Ọ lụrụ ọgụ megide Mulu Seboka, onye ọzọ na-agba ọsọ Etiopia na onye na-agbachitere onye mmeri, na mbido mana ọ dọpụrụ ihe dị ka kilomita 40 iji nweta mmeri mbụ ya n'ebe dị anya, na-agbaji ihe ndekọ nke 2 28 30 na usoro ahụ
O wetara afọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na njedebe na ọsọ abụọ na Septemba, na-ewere nke asatọ na Delhi Half Marathon tupu ọ nweta ọnọdụ nke abụọ n'azụ Koreni Jelila na Great Ethiopian Run 10K

N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ laghachiri na mmalite na 2010 wee melite akara ya kachasị mma n'ụzọ iji merie Osaka Ladies Marathon na Jenụwarị, na-aghọ onye Etiopia mbụ mere ya n'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri atọ nke asọmpi
Ọ pụtara na Zayed International Half Marathon n'ikpeazụ n'ọnwa ahụ, mana ọ nọ n'ebe dị anya karịa onye mmeri Mary Keitany ma mechie na nke ise
Ọ gara n'ihu na njem Asia ya na Seoul International Marathon wee nweta mmeri nke abụọ ya n'afọ ahụ, karịa Zhou Chunxiu ma setịpụ ọrụ kachasị mma nke 2 24 13 maka anya
Amane meriri n'asọmpi mba mbụ ya na asọmpi egwuregwu nke Ethiopia site na mmeri 10,000 mita na Genet Getaneh
Amane abiaghi ihe isoritampi ruo ihe dika Onwa iri na asato ma batakwa na November 2012 ma burukwa onye mechiri ọsọ na Istanbul marathonna Onwa na esote ya bu Jenụwarị na afọ 2013 Dubai marathon
maburu Kwa Onye nke ATO na ọsọ 2 23 50 awama meta asaa na Paris marathon burukwa onye nke ATO na Bogota half Marathon
Amani Lewis (amụrụ n'afọ 1994) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nké bi na Baltimore, Maryland
Lewis tolitere na Columbia, Maryland
Ha nwetara BFA na Maryland Institute College of Arts na 2016
Na Septemba, 2019, Lewis gosipụtara Amani Lewis Subjective Nature na August Wilson African American Cultural Center na Pittsburgh, PA
Ha nwèrè mmasị na ikpe ziri ezi na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ọrụ ọbọdọ
N'afọ 2019, Lewis gosipụtara ihe ngosi otu akpọrọ Conjuring Wholeness na De Buck Gallery na New York City
Lewis bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na Fountainhead Residency na Studios na Miami, Florida
N'afọ 2020, ha nọ n'otu ihe ngosi akpọrọ Black Voices/Black Microcosm na CFHILL Art Space na Stockholm, Sweden nke Destinee Ross haziri
Amar Ben Belgacem (June 18, 1979 - August 24, 2010) bụ onye France-Tunisia na-ese ihe
Amar Ben Belgacem bụ onye nne na nna Tunisian, ọ tolitere na France ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ ise
N'afọ 1984, ndị mụrụ ya kpebiri ịlaghachi Tunisia, na-akpọrọ Belgacem na ejima ya
Ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu, ọ biri n'otu obodo nke ọ kọwara dị ka 'ihe osise' n'ihi na o nwere ogige mara mma, ọtụtụ ihe osise, nchịkọta ihe, akwụkwọ nka, na ihe ndị ọzọ metụtara nka
Onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya, a na-anọchite anya ọrụ ya na nchịkọta ọha na eze na nke onwe na mba iri abụọ
N'abalị abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2006, minista na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị na ihe nketa mere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọrụ nke ọdịbendị Tunisia

Ọ bụ onye otu International association of plastic arts, European association for plastic arts, mba ụwa academy nke Lutèce, njikọ nke ndị na-ese plastik nke Tunisia, na njikọ nke ndị omenkà plastik nke Hammamet
Ọ nwụrụ na 2010 na Paris
Amar Ezzahi (1 Jenụwarị 1941 30 Nọvemba 2016) bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu na onye na-akpọ mandole
Ọ bụ onye isi nke Chaabi, egwu ọdịnala nke Algiers
A mụrụ Amar Ezzahi dị ka Amar Ait-Zaï na Ain El Hammam, obodo nta nke Kabylie, Algeria, na 1 Jenụwarị 1941
Ọ tolitere na Casbah nke Algiers
Ọ bụ nwa mgbei mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị
Ezzahi bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-akpọ mandole
Ọ malitere idekọ egwu na 1963
N'afọ 1976, o dekọrọ abọm abụọ
O nyere naanị otu egwu, na 10 Febụwarị 1987 na Algiers
Kama nke ahụ, ọ na-eme ihe n'ebe mepere emepe dị ka ebe oriri na ọṅụṅụ, karisia n'oge nnọkọ ezinụlọ
Ọzọkwa, ọ gbapụrụ mgbasa ozi ma jụ nyocha ikike nwebisiinka
Ọ bụ onye isi nke Chaabi, egwu ọdịnala nke Algiers
Ezzahi biri ndụ ịta ahụhụ ọ lụghị nwanyị, ọ nweghịkwa ụmụ
Ezzahi nwụrụ na 30 Nọvemba 2016
Mgbe ọ nwụrụ, Azzedine Mihoubi, Minista Ọdịbendị nke Algeria, gara n'ụlọ ya iji sọpụrụ ya
E mere emume olili ozu ya n'ụlọ alakụba n'ụbọchị na-esote, 1 Disemba, e lie ya na ili ozu El Kettar
Emere emume iji sọpụrụ Ezzahi, nke Abdelkader Chaou na Kamel Aziz mere, na Arab World Institute na 3 Disemba 2016 na Paris, France
Amar Laskri (22 Jenụwarị 1942 - 1 Mee 2015) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Algeria
Ọ gụrụ gbasara ihe nkiri, redio, telivishọn na ihe nkiri na Belgrade
A mụrụ ya na Aïn Berda, Algeria, ọ duziri ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na otu ihe omume telivishọn
Amara Karan (amụrụ afọ 1984) bu onye ome ihe nkiri bekee nke mere ihe nkiri ya mbụ dika Rita na ihe nkiri Wes Anderson bu The Darjeeling Limited
Emere ihe nkiri a na 2007 Venice Film Festival
Ọrụ ihe nkiri nke abụọ Karan bụ dị ka ụmụ akwụkwọ Peaches na ihe nkiri 2007
O mere ihe ngosi ọgbọ mbụ ya na 2008 dị ka Jessica na mmepụta RSC nke The Merchant nke Venice yana dị ka Bianca na mmepụta RSC nke The Taming of the Shrew
Na nke ikpeazụ, ọ mere mpụta mbụ West End ya na Novello Theatre
N'afọ 2016, ọ rụkọrọ ọrụ na obere usoro ihe nkiri mpụ HBO, The Night Of
N'afọ 2012, o tinyere aka na fim A Fantastic Fear of everything
A mụrụ Karan na Wimbledon, London na 1984 nye nne na nna Sri-Lankan Tamil ndị si Zambia kwaga Britain afọ abụọ tupu a mụọ ya
A zụlitere ya na Wimbledon wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Wimbledon

Karan gara n'ihu na-agụ akwụkwọ na St Catherine's College, Oxford na mgbe ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri amateur gụnyere Sunday Morning na Center of the World na Burton Taylor Theater nke ọ nwetara nyocha dị egwu ma bụrụkwa onye a họpụtara ahọpụta
maka arụmọrụ ya na When We Are Married na Ụlọ ihe nkiri Old Fire

Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-etinye ego na ụlọ akụ (na Hawkpoint na CIBC World Markets) ọkachamara na njikọta na ịzụrụ tupu ọ mụọ maka akara MA na ime ihe na The Arts Educational Schools London
O buru Torch Olympic nke 2008 n'oge ya na London
Kemgbe 2016, ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Jamie de Courcey na-enwe mmekọrịta
Amarachi Uyanne (ọnye amụrụ na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na asaa n' ọnwa asaa n' arọ 2004 nke eji Amarachi wee mara bụ nwada onye Nigerian na-agụ egwú, na-ete egwu ma na-akpọ ụbo oyibo
A maara ya nke ọma maka ịde mbiputa mbụ nke Nigeria Got Talent
Amarachi bụ onye Delta State
O tolitere na Edo Steeti, ebe ọ bidoro ịgba egwu mgbe ọ dị afọ 5
Na 2012, o ritere ihe nrite ego nke N10,000,000 mgbe ekwuputara ya dị ka onye mmeri nke mbipụta mbụ nke Nigeria Got Talent
E mechara kpọọ ya 'odị na wata guba nde ego na Nigeria '
Ọ gara University Preparatory Secondary School na Benin City, Edo State
Onye a ma ama na-eto eto gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji na July 2019 ma bụrụ nwata akwukwo na Benson Idahosa University , Benin City, Edo State, Nigeria
Mgbe Amarachi mechara pụta dịka onye mmeri nke Nigeria Got Talent, Amarachi wepụtara egwu izizi ya nke akpọrọ 'Amarachi Dance'
Ọ gara n’ihu gosi Phyno n’abụ akpọrọ “Ova Sabi”; egwu na abo izizi otiri bu nke ndị mmadu huru na anya ma na etikwa ya na redio
Ọ bu ọnye is Amarachi Talent Academy bu ụlọ akwụkwọ obidoro maka ịzụlite na ịzụ ụmụntakịrị nwere nkà igu egwu ma obu ịte egwu

Amarachi Nwosu (a mụrụ na 29 Septemba 1994) bụ onye Naijiria-Amerika na-ese foto onye, onye na-ese ihe na-ahụ anya, onye na-ese ihe nkiri, onye odee akwụkwọ na ọkàa okwu dabere na New York City ugbu a

Akwụkwọ akụkọ mpụta mbụ ya 'Black in Tokyo ' ewepụtara na International Center of Photography na ICP Museum, New York City na 2017 ma gosikwa ihe nkiri ahụ na Tokyo, Japan na Ultra Super New Gallery na Harajuku

Nwosu gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Temple University dị na Filadelfia mana ọ kwagara Tokyo n'ime afọ nta ya ka o nwetachara akwụkwọ mmụta isii ka ọ nwee ike ịgụ akwụkwọ otu afọ na mba ofesi dị ka nwa akwụkwọ mba ofesi ebe o nwetara akara ugo mmụta na International Communications

Amarachi Favour Obiajunwa (amụrụ na 10 Ọktoba 1989) bụ nwaada mgba nke nwanyi si Naịjirịa so na egwuregwu Olimpik Na asọmpi Olympic nke afọ 2008 ọ gbara aka na asọmpi egwuregwu nke ụmụ nwanyị na-agba ọsọ nke n'aro iri asaa na abuo
Ọ nwụrụ na 1/8 nke ikpeazụ Ali Bernard si United Steeti
N’egwuregwu Olimpik n’afọ 2012, ọ sonyekwara ọzọ n’ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị na-agba ọsọ n’arọ nke iri asaa na abuo, ma Wang Jiao nke China meriri ya na iri na isii nke ikpeazụ

Amarachi Okafor onye amụrụ n'afọ 1977 bụ Omenka nke Naịjirịa ,onye ọrụ ya lekwasịrị anya n'omenala, okpukpe, akụkọ ihe mere eme, ihe gbasara jenda, mmekọahụ nke mmadụ, na ọtụtụ okwu akpụ n'ọnụ dị ka mgbasa nke Ebola virus na Afrika
Amụrụ Okafor na Umuahia

Okafor bụ onye òtù nke El Anatsui si Atelier na ngwụcha 1990s
Okafor na-aru oru eserese Ọ bụ onye nlekọta na NGA (National Gallery of Art) na Abuja n'etiti 2008 na 2014

Na 2014, ọ bụ onye mbụ na 2014 National Art Competition, wee merie ihe ngbata nke mkpebi n'afọ ahụ
O gosipụtara na 2015 Jogja Biennale

Amarachi Grace Okoronkwo (a mụrụ ya na ụbọchị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Disemba nke afọ 1992) Ọ bụ onye Naịjirịa n'egwu egwu bọọlụ nke na agbara ndị Nasarawa Amazons na Ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria Premia League nke otu bọọlụ
Ọ na-egwuri egwu na Kokkola F10 na Naisten Liiga nke Finland
Maka ọrụ ya na idu ndị Nasarawa Amazons iji merie 2017 Ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria Premia League, Okoronkwo so na ndị egwuregwu anọ ahọpụtara dị

Maka ọrụ ya na idu ndị Nasarawa Amazons iji merie Ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria Premia League nke afọ pụkụ abụọ na ịrị na asaa, Okoronkwo so na ndị egwuregwu anọ ahọpụtara dịka onye ọkacha mma na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ NWPL nke afọ pụkụ abụọ na ịrị asatọ, mana e mechara Rasheedat Ajibade nara ya bụ ugo
Na Mee afo pụkụ abụọ a ịrị na asatọ , a họpụtara ya dịka onye ọkpụkpọ kachasị mma na afọ pụkụ abụọ na ịrị na asaaa na otu ụmụ nwaanyị na Asọmpi Naịjirịa nke Nkowa, mana Ajibade nara ya bụ nturu ugo
Okoronkwo nochitere anya Naịjirịa na afọ pụkụ abụọ na ịrị na Asọmpi Ntụrụ ugo na Africa
Akpọrọ ya ka ọ soro egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide ndị mba Germany dịka nkwadebe maka nsonye Ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa na Asọmpi FIFA World Cup
N’afọ pụkụ abụọ na ịrị na asatọ, Okoronkwo pụtara na Naijiria n’egwuregwu WAFU nke Ụmụ nwanyị n’afọ puku abụọ na asatọ, ọ rutere wee medalu nwete nchara nchara maka otu ahụ
E gosikwara ya ndị otu egwu bọọlụ nke ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa na asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke afọ pụkụ abụọ na asatọ Ọ wee soro ndị otu ahụ merie n'asọmpi ahụ
Amariyanna 'Mari' Copeny (amụrụ na Julaị 6, 2007), nke a makwaara dị ka Little Miss Flint, bụ onye na-eto eto na-eme ihe ike si Flint, Michigan
A maara ya nke ọma maka ịkwalite mmata banyere nsogbu mmiri Flint na ịnakọta ego iji kwado ụmụaka na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na obodo ya na gafee mba ahụ
Mgbe Copeny dị afọ asatọ, o degaara Onye isi ala Barack Obama akwụkwọ ozi iji dọta uche na nsogbu mmiri n'obodo ya bu Flint, Michigan
Akwụkwọ ozi ya kpaliri nzaghachi sitere n'aka onye isi ala ebe o kwuru na 'akwụkwọ ozi sitere n'ụmụaka dị ka gị bụ ihe na-eme ka m nwee nchekwube banyere ọdịnihu'
Na Mee 4, 2016 ọ gara Flint iji hụ n'onwe ya mbibi nke ndụ ụmụ amaala Flint n'ihi mmiri ha na-egbu egbu
Nleta ahụ dugara na nkwupụta nke ọnọdụ mberede gọọmentị etiti na Jenụwarị 2016 ma nye aka n'ịmata mba niile banyere ọnọdụ dị egwu nke obodo ahụ
Obama mechara nye ikike nde dọla otu narị iji dozie nsogbu ahụ
Kemgbe ahụ, e meela ihe iji nyere aka kpochapụ nsogbu ahụ, mana ndị bi na Flintz na-enwe mmetụta na nrụzi dị mkpa, na akụrụngwa agaghị arụcha ruo 2020 n'oge

N'ịgoro n'elu ikpo okwu mba, na Eprel 13, 2017, ọ gwara otu nnukwu ìgwè mmadụ okwu na nnọkọ 'Stand Up to Trump' n'ihu White House na Washington, DC, na-agwa ha na, n'oge mkpọsa ya na 2016, onye na-azọ ọkwa Donald Trump kwere ndị Flint nkwa, gụnyere onwe ya, na ọ ga-edozi nsogbu mmiri
O kwupụtara na Onye isi ala Trump emezughị nkwa mkpọsa ya
N'ejighi nkwado ya n'obodo ya, ọ kwukwara okwu megide iwu mbata nke Trump

Na mgbalị iji mee ka ọgụ Flint na-aga n'ihu n'anya ọha na eze na inye mmiri dị mma, na 2018, Copeny na Pack Your Back jikọtara ọnụ ọzọ maka The Little Miss Flint & PYB Water Drive, mgbalị GoFundMe iji nweta ego maka mmiri a na-etinye na karama, dịka Gọvanọ Michigan Rick Snyder kwụsịrị mmemme mmiri a na karama n'efu maka ndị bi na Flint
E nwetara ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ dọla pụkụ ịrị ise n'oge mkpọsa otu ọnwa, nke zuru ezu maka ihe karịrị karama mmiri pụkụ narị abụọ

N'afọ 2019, Copeny malitere mkpọsa onyinye ọhụrụ, Little Miss Flint Clean Water Fund, na-arụkọ ọrụ na Hydroviv, ụlọ ọrụ nzacha mmiri, na-enye onye na-anakọta ego ohere ịbawanye mmetụta nke ego enyere ma wepụ otu ihe mkpofu plastik metụtara mmiri a na-etinye na karama

O mezuru ebumnuche mbụ ya nke inweta dọla pụkụ otú narị na Septemba 2019, ma mesịa mezuo ebumnuche nke inweta dọla pụkụ narị abụọ na ịrị ise na June, 2020, nakwa inweta dọla pụkụ narị ịse na iri ise na Earth Day 2021
Nchịkọta ego ya na-aga n'ihu na ebumnuche ọhụrụ ya nke otu nde dọla n'ihi na ọtụtụ obodo dị iche iche gafee mba ahụ chọrọ nzacha iji nwee mmiri dị ọcha gafee pukumba ebe a na-emelite akụrụngwa mmiri
Mgbasa ozi gbasara ọrụ Copeny akpọwo ya 'Little Miss Flint', aha njirimara nke e chepụtara mgbe ọ meriri na asọmpi ịma mma na 2015

Tupu mmeghe nke afọ agụmakwụkwọ na 2016 na 2017, Copeny sonyeere Pack Your Back, otu na-enweghị uru nke ụmụ akwụkwọ Mahadum Central Michigan guzobere na 2016, wee nweta ego iji nyere ụmụ akwụkwọ si Flint aka
Copeny na-anakọta onyinye iji nye akpa azụ jupụtara na ihe ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'afọ 2016, ọ nwetara ego zuru ezu maka 100 backpacks, na, n'afọ 2017, ọ nwetara dọla pụkụ ịrị iji kwado akpà akwụkwọ otu puku maka ụmụaka obodo

Ọ malitere mkpọsa GoFundMe ọzọ na 2018 dị ka akụkụ nke # BlackPantherChallenge, na-akpata ihe karịrị dọla pụkụ ịrị na isii iji nye ọtụtụ narị ụmụaka na-enweta ego dị ala ohere ịhụ Black Panther na inweta ngwaahịa ihe nkiri, na-enwe olileanya inye ọtụtụ ndị Black na-ege ntị ezigbo onwe ha na ọchịchọ

Ihe omume ndị ọzọ Copeny na-eme gụnyere ọrụ Dear Flint Kids, arịrịọ maka akwụkwọ ozi agbamume nye ụmụ Flint; mgbalị nke ndị mmadụ iji kesaa akwụkwọ ahụ n'efu, A Wrinkle in Time; oriri Krismas na nkata Ista maka ndị na-enweghị ọ bụla; yana ịkwado usoro ụlọ akwụkwọ mpaghara iji nye mmemme mgbochi mmegbu
Amaro kọfị bụ Turki kofi ụlọ ahịa ụlọ ọrụ, nke bụ nnukwu ụlọ ahịa kọfị na ụwa nwere nnukwu netwọk nke alaka 20 na mba dị iche iche
Amaro Coffee Company tọrọ ntọala na 1998 site na Ali Sharifi na Mohammad Masumzadeh
Isi ụlọ ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ a dị na Tehran, Iran

Emeghere ụlọ ahịa kọfị mbụ nwere aha Kọfị na Machị 31, 2019 na Tehran site na nkwado nke ndị enyi atọ, onye nkuzi akụkọ ihe mere eme aha ya bụ Mohammad Baqer Masumzadeh, onye nkuzi akụkọ ihe mere eme aha ya bụ Ali Sharifi na onye edemede aha ya bụ Gordon Jaran zutere na Mahadum nke San Francisco
Ha malitere ọrụ ha
Ihe mere mmadụ atọ a ji guzobe ebe dị n'elu ebe a na-ere kọfị kọfị na ihe dị iche iche metụtara ya bụ onye aha ya bụ Alfred Peet bụ onye kụziiri ha ka esi esi kọfị
Ụlọ ahịa a dị na mpaghara Tajrish
N'afọ 1982, onye mbụ malitere ụlọ ọrụ a, Reza Bahram, kwere nkwa ire espresso na kọfị, ma sonye n'òtù ndị mmekọ
N'oge ahụ, ihe ka ọtụtụ ná ndị mmadụ kweere na kọfị kwesịrị ịkwadebe naanị n'ụlọ ndị mmadụ; Ya mere, ndị mmekọ atọ ndị ọzọ anabataghị atụmatụ Schultz
Dị ka ha si kwuo, ịbanye n'ọhịa a na-ere ihe ọṅụṅụ ga-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe dị iche ma gbochie ha iru ihe mgbaru ọsọ ha chọrọ

This was the first coffee association in Iran for the Iranian coffee industry and is one of the oldest trade associations formed in this country
Amaro Coffee Academy members are mainly small and medium-sized companies, including coffee producers, roasters, retailers, as well as importers/exporters and wholesalers/suppliers

Amarula bụ ihe ọṅụṅụ na-atọ ụtọ sitere na South Africa
A na-eji shuga, mmiri ara ehi na mkpụrụ osisi marula nke Africa (Sclerocarya birrea) eme ya nke a na-akpọkwa osisi Elephant ma ọ bụ osisi Alụmdi na Nwunye
Ọ nwere mmanya na-aba n'anya nke 17% site na mpịakọta (30° ihe akaebe)
O nweela ihe ịga nke ọma na asọmpi nyocha mmụọ nke mba ụwa, merie ihe nrite ọla edo na 2006 San Francisco World Spirits Competition

Amarula bụ nke Southern Liqueur Company nke South Africa (ndị nwe akara ahịa ugbu a na onye enyemaka nke Distell Group Limited) bu ụzọ ree dị ka mmanya na Septemba 1989, ebe a malitere mmụọ Amarula na 1983
Ọ na-atọ ụtọ nke obere mkpụrụ osisi caramel
Akara ahụ na-akwado nyocha enyí iji chebe enyị ma chekwaa ndị bi na ya
N'afọ 2002, a malitere 'Amarula Elephant Research Program' (AERP) n'okpuru nduzi nke onyeokachamara Rob Slotow si Mahadum KwaZulu-Natal na Durban / South Africa
Nke a na-enyocha ụzọ ndụ, ụdị mmegharị na omume nke pachyderms Africa na ebumnuche nke ichebe ebe obibi nke enyị na ichebe ọdịnihu ha n'ọhịa
Elephants na-enwe mmasị iri mkpụrụ osisi marula

[citation needed] N'ihi njikọ osisi marula na enyí, onye na-emepụta mmiri emeela ka ha bụrụ nnọchianya ya ma na-akwado mbọ nchekwa enyí, na-akwado Amarula Elephant Research Programme na Mahadum Natal, Durban
Maka mbọ ahịa, ọ na-emepụta ihe nchịkọta nke nwere isiokwu enyị
Amatoritsero Ede bụ onye Naijiria-Canada na-ede uri

O dere n'okpuru aha 'Godwin Ede' mana ọ kwụsịrị iburu aha mbụ ya nke Onye Kraịst dị ka ụzọ iji mee mkpesa megide xenophobia na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ọ chọpụtara na Germany, mba 'Ndị Kraịst', na ruo n'ókè, iji mee mkpasu iwe megide ọchịchị ọdịda anyanwụ n'ozuzu
Ede ebiela na Canada kemgbe afọ 2002, nke PEN Canada kwadoro dị ka onye edemede na-agba ọsọ
Ọ bụ onye Hindu Monk na Hare Krishna Movement, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akwụkwọ na nnukwu onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na Naijiria,
Akwụkwọ Spectrum
Ede bụ onye na-ebipụta ma na-achịkwa nchịkọta akụkọ nke
Osisi mapl ea
eMgbakwunye akwụkwọ (MTLS)
n'agbata 2005 na 2007 o deziri akwụkwọ akụkọ uri n'ịntanetị nke mba ụwa, uri sentinel n'ịntanetịLTree Literary Supplement (MTLnline
Ọ bụ onye edemede bi na Mahadum Carleton, Ottawa, Canada, n'okpuru nkwado nke PEN Canada's Writer-in-Exile network
Ọ bụkwa onye SSHRC Fellow na Doctoral Candidate na akwụkwọ Bekee na Mahadum Carleton, nke o nwetara na PhD ya na 2013
[citation needed] Akwụkwọ edemede doctoral ya akpọrọ 'The Global Literary Canon and Minor African Literatures,' nyocha ọdịbendị nke ịdị n'okpuru akwụkwọ edemede Africa nke oge a na nnukwu obodo
[citation mkpa] O nwere BA na MA na Postcolonial Anglophone Literatures and German Linguistics site na Mahaduma Hanover, Germany

Amaza Lee Meredith (Ọgọọst 14, 1895), bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, onye nkuzi na onye na-ese ihe

Meredith enweghị ike ịbanye n'ọrụ ahụ dị ka onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ n'ihi 'agbụrụ ya na okike ya' dị ka nwanyị Afrịka-Amerịka, ma rụọ ọrụ dịka onye nkuzi nka na Mahadum Virginia State (nke Virginia State College / Virginia Normal and Industrial Institute), ebe o guzobere ngalaba nka
A maara ya nke ọma maka ebe obibi ya, Azurest South, ebe ya na onye mmekọ ya, Dr
Edna Meade Colson, biri
Ọzọkwa, o guzobere Azurest Syndicate Inc, ebe ezumike maka ndị isi ojii Amerịka nọ n'etiti na Sag Harbor NY
Dị ka nwanyị ojii gụrụ akwụkwọ, Meredith bụ ihe atụ a na-adịghị ahụkebe nke nwanyị ojii nwere onwe ya n'ụzọ ego na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na-ebi n'oge Jim Crow Segregation Laws
A mụrụ Meredith na Lynchburg, Virginia dị ka nwa nwanyị Samuel Peter Meredith Na Emma Pink Kenney
O nwere ụmụnne atọ, ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ na otu nwanne nwoke
Meredith na nwanne ya nwanyị tọrọ ya bụ Maude nwere mmekọrịta dị mma
Samuel, nna Amaza, bụ ọkwá nkà, na Emma, nne ya, bụ onye na-akwa ákwà
Nna ya bụ onye ọcha na nne ya bụ onye ojii, ndị mụrụ ya bụ ndị iwu mgbochi nke ịlụ di na nwunye na Virginia
Na asambodo ọmụmụ Amaza Lee Meredith, a na-akọwa ya naanị dị ka nwa nwanyị Emma Kenney
A hapụrụ aha nna ahụ
Ka o sina dị, Samuel Meredith lekọtara ezinụlọ ya ma wuoro ha ụlọ ebe ọ kwagara afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị
Ọ kwadokwara ha ego
N'ikpeazụ, ndị mụrụ ya gara Washington, DC
na ụgbọ okporo ígwè dị iche iche iji lụọ di ma mesịa biri ọnụ mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, nna ya malitere ịla azụmaahịa n'iyi n'ihi alụmdi na nwunye na-ese okwu ma n'oge na'oge na na-adịghịkwa anya ọ nọ n'ụgwọ
O gburu onwe ya na 1915
N'agbanyeghị ndụ ezinụlọ siri ike n'ezinụlọ agbụrụ, nne na nna abụọ ahụ nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na Meredith
Nna ya, onye ọkwá nkà, kụziiri ya otu esi ese ụkpụrụ ma wuo ihe nlereanya
O kụnyere n'ime ya ọchịchọ ịghọ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Nne ya, onye rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwa akwa tupu ya amụọ ụmụ ya, kwenyere na agụmakwụkwọ bụ isi ihe na-emegide echiche ọha na eze
Nne Amaza gụrụ akwụkwọ nke ọma n'onwe ya
Ọ bụ nwanyị kwenyesiri ike, nke na-agba mbọ ma o wuru netwọk nkwado na ụlọ ụka Baptist nke Eight Street nke Lynchburg, nke bụ ebe ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ kwadoro agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ ya site n'iziga ha na kọleji
Ọ bụ n'ebe ahụ ka Amaza Lee Meredith zutere onye ga-abụ enyi ya, Dr
Edna Meade Colson, onye ya na ya na-ederịta akwụkwọ ozi n'oge agụmakwụkwọ ọrụ aka ya niile ma mesịa soro ya biri n'ụlọ ha 'Azurest South'
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị ihe doro anya (ma o yighị ka ọ ga-abụ na ha biri na ya) ma ha biri dị ka di na nwunye na-edina ụdị onwe ha n'ihu ọha, ọ dị mma ikwu na mmekọrịta ha na-agba mbọ ma na-ahụ n'anya
Ma Meredith na Colson bụ ndị otu nsọpụrụ nke Gillfield Baptist Church
Ha biri ọnụ ruo mgbe Meredith nwụrụ na 1984 ma lie ha n'akụkụ ibe ha na Petersburg, Virginia, na Eastview Cemetery
N'ozuzu, Amaza Lee Meredith nọgidere na-ebi ndụ nke oge a, nke na-eri onwe ya n'agbanyeghị ihe mgbochi mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke ọ ga-emeri
Njem agụmakwụkwọ Amaza Lee Meredith malitere site na ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị ọha na eze Lynchburg
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Jackson ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'elu klas ya na 1912
N'ịbụ onye kpebisiri ike inweta asambodo nkuzi ya, ọ gara Virginia Normal and Industrial Institute (Ugbu a Virginia State University)
Ọ bụ n'afọ mbụ ya ka ọ zutere Dr
Edna Meade Colson onye nwere mmetụta na agụmakwụkwọ Meredith site n'ịkwado ya na ndụmọdụ na ịtụ aro akwụkwọ nkuzi
Meredith mechara nweta 'Summer School Professional Certificate' maka ndị nkuzi
Ugbu a na-enwe ike ịkụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị, ọ were ọrụ nkuzi mbụ ya wee laghachi Petersburg na 1922 iji nweta akara ugo mmụta nkuzi ya
N'oge a, ọ bụ onye na-ekwu okwu ikpeazụ nke klas ya na Virginia Normal and Industrial Institute
N'afọ 1926, ọ kwagara New York City, ebe ya na nwanne ya nwanyị biri na North Harlem
Ọ gara kọleji ndị nkuzi na Mahadum Columbia iji mụọ nka mara mma na ekele nka ma nweta nzere bachelọ na 1930
N'etiti ndị ọzọ, ọ gara nkuzi na ime ụlọ na ịchọ ụlọ mma ma gaa nkuzi, mkparịta ụka, ọrụ bara uru na njem na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie nke kpụrụ ya nghọta ya banyere usoro imewe nke oge a
N'oge a, ọ bịakwara na ndị isi ojii ọhụrụ wee too n'ime ya dị ka nwa agbọghọ ojii, nke gụrụ akwụkwọ nke na-ekwenyeghị na echiche ndị dị ugbu a
Ọzọkwa, ọ ruru eru dị ka onye otu nke iri nwere nkà, nke mgbe WEB
Du Bois gasịrị bụ otu ndị isi ojii Amerịka gụrụ akwụkwọ na omenala, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na sayensị nke ga-eje ozi dị ka ụdị onye ogbugbo n'etiti ndị isi ojii nke agụmakwụkwọ dị ala na ndị ọcha
Ọ laghachiri New York iji nweta nzere masta ya na Mahadum Columbia na 1934
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị 'Summer School Certificate,' Meredith malitere ịkụzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ nwere otu ọnụ ụlọ na Botetourt County, Virginia, nke a na-akpọ Indian Rock
Ọ nọrọ afọ abụọ n'ime obodo dị na West Virginia n'agbanyeghị eziokwu ahụ bụ na ọ hụrụ ọnọdụ ahụ dị njọ na ndị isi ojii 'enweghị ihe, enweghị ikike na obi ụtọ'
N'ebe a ka o wuru Parents-Teachers-Association, nke e bu n'uche imeziwanye ọnọdụ ụlọ akwụkwọ
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ laghachiri Lynchburg ma kụzie ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị, tupu ọ laghachi na kọleji
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1922, ọ kụziri mgbakọ na mwepụ na Dunbar High School na Botetourt County ruo afọ isii
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị nzere bachelọ ya, ọ laghachiri Virginia ebe onye isi oche nke Virginia Normal and Industrial Institute were ya n'ọrụ ịkụzi nka
N'afọ 1935, mgbe ọ laghachiri Virginia na nzere masta ya, o guzobere ngalaba nka nke Mahadum Virginia State wee bụrụ onyeisi oche ngalaba, nke ọ nọgidere na ya ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 1958
Mmụta nka Meredith kụziiri dabeere na mmụta eserese eserese, nka mara mma na ụkpụrụ nke ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Ọzọkwa, o guzobere agụmakwụkwọ nka abụọ ma bụrụ akụkụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike nke Alumni Association
Nkwado Meredith na ezinụlọ ya, ndị enyi ya, na ọganihu nke Black cultural equity bụ ihe nduzi n'oge ọrụ ya niile
Meredith natara onyinye ala mbụ nke Virginia maka ndị ọkà mmụta Afrịka Amerịka

N'agbanyeghị eziokwu ahụ bụ na Amaza abụghị onye na-ede aha, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ ojii ole na ole na-arụ ọrụ n'oge ahụ, yana otu n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị ojii ole na ise na-ese ihe na mba ahụ

(Dị ka ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị US nke 1910, ọ bụ naanị ndị ojii na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ iri ise na itoolu na ndị isi ojii iri anọ na asaa na-ese ihe ka e were n'ọrụ) Eziokwu ahụ bụ na ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Meredith efunahụla, Mahadum Virginia State na-aga n'ihu na-asọpụrụ ihe ndị a ma ama ọ rụzuru
Ọ bụ ezie na a maghị kpọmkwem ọnụ ọgụgụ ọrụ ya, a na-ekwu na Amaza nwere ụkpụrụ ụlọ maka ụlọ na Virginia, Texas, na New York
Ndị a ma ama n'ime ha bụ nnukwu ụlọ abụọ dị na Azurest North
N'agbanyeghị enweghị ọzụzụ ọ bụla n'ihe owuwu, Meredith rụrụ ọtụtụ ụlọ maka ezinụlọ ya na ndị enyi ya na Virginia, New York na Texas
Ihe owuwu mbụ ya bụ Azurest South, nke e wuchara na 1939 ma Meredith chepụtara ya kpamkpam na International Style
Ya na onye ya na ya na-arụkọ ọrụ, Colson, kwagara n'otu mgbe ọ gwụchara ma ọ ga-abụ ebe obibi ha maka ndụ ha niile
A na-ewere Azurest South dị ka ihe atụ a na-adịghị ahụkebe nke International Style na Virginia ma gosipụta mmasị ya na imewe avant-garde
Meredith jikwa Azurest South mee ihe dị ka ụlọ ọrụ nka nke ya
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'idepụta ụdị ndụ ya na ihe ọ rụzuru na Azurest site na foto
Ihe ndekọ echekwara na ihe fọdụrụ na Azurest akpaliwo nyocha intersectional banyere agbụrụ, queerness, na imewe oghere n'oge Jim Crow Era
Ọzọkwa, o jiri nkà ya mara mma na nka mee ihe iji hazie atụmatụ agba ma see ụkpụrụ maka ọtụtụ ụlọ ụlọ akwụkwọ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ya na Kọmitii Alumni House rụkọtara ọrụ site na 1949 gaa n'ihu n'ịtụ aro ka e mepụta Alumni House
Mgbe a jụrụ aro ya, o kpebiri inye ọkara Azurest South na Alumni Association mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, na-enwe olileanya na a ga-eji ya mee ihe dị ka Alumni House, dịka ọ dị taa
Meredith rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ nke ịchọ mma ime ụlọ na Kọmitii ụlọ ka mma
N'afọ 1947, Meredith malitere ịmepụta mpaghara otu narị na iri abụọ na Sag Harbor nke a na-akpọ Azurest North ya na nwanne ya nwanyị tọrọ ya Maude
E kere Azurest North dị ka ebe ezumike maka ndị Africa America nọ n'etiti
Iji zụlite Azurest North, ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ ahụ na ndị mmepe ndị ọzọ guzobere otu, nke a na-akpọ Azurest Syndicate, nke rụrụ ọrụ iji mepụta obodo ntụrụndụ Afrịka Amerịka
A na-ere ọtụtụ ndị na-etinye ego na Sag Harbor
Meredith rụrụ ma ọ dịkarịa ala abụọ n'ime ụlọ ndị a
Terry Cottage, nke bụ nke nwanne ya nwanyị Maude Terry ma wuo ya na 1949 ka e mere ya na akụkụ yiri nke Azurest South
Edendot, nke ndị enyi ya Ed na Dot Spaulding bụ ụlọ Prairie Style
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, ọ were ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke Azurest Syndicate Inc
Azurest South ghọrọ ebe obibi nke Virginia State University National Alumni Association na 1986, a gbakwunyere ụlọ ahụ na National Register of Historic Places na 1993
Ngalaba na-ahụ maka ihe ndị mere eme kwadoro akara okporo ụzọ Meredith n'afọ 2008
Meredith bụkwa onye mepụtara ihe
N'afọ 1955, ọ natara ikike ikike maka ihe eji etinye ya na akpa golf
Ọzọkwa, ọ mepụtara 'Kant Drop', elu nke enwere ike itinye na akpa ọ bụla a na-emegharị
Ọ gara n'ihu na-ese ụlọ ma na-ese ihe n'afọ ndị 1960
E gosipụtara ụfọdụ n'ime ihe osise ya na Virginia Museum of Fine Arts na gallery na New York na North Carolina, ụfọdụ ka na-egosi na Gillfield Baptist Church ma ọ bụ na-akwụnye n'ụlọ ndị bi na ya
N'afọ ndị 1970, Meredith mepụtara akara ngosi iji mee ihe maka mgbanwe aha maka National Association for the Advancement of Colored People (NAACP)
Amazoncom, Inc
(/ ˈæməzɒn/ AM-ə-zon) bụ ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ mba America na-elekwasị anya na e-azụmahịa, igwe ojii, mgbasa ozi n'ịntanetị, nkwanye dijitalụ, na ọgụgụ isi
A na-akpọ ya 'otu n'ime ndị agha akụ na ụba na omenala kachasị emetụta n'ụwa', na ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ụdị kachasị ọnụ ahịa n'ụwa
Ọ bụ otu n'ime nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ ozi nke America, yana Alphabet, Apple, Meta, na Microsoft
Ambo bụ asụsụ Tivoid nke obodo Naijiria
Àtụ Languages of NigeriaAsụsụ ndi Naijiria
Asụsụ ndị TivoidÀtụ Tivoid languages
Ambra Gambale bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa na Ịtali na ónyé na-emepụta ọla màrà mmá
E gosipụtara ma ree ihe osise ya nke ihe osise memento mori nké sitere na okpokoro isi anụmanụ, ọla na nkume dị oké ọnụ ahịa na London, Notting Hill & Dover Street, Mayfair
A na-eji aka emepụta ọla ya dị mma ma na-elekwasị anya n'iji ọlaedo, ebony na diamond
Ndị na-anakọta ya gụnyere ndị dị ka ónyé mmeri nke Pulitzer Lauren Beukes
Ihe osise ya Silvered Crocodile Skull, bụ okpokoro agụ iyi na platinum na diamond nke gosipụtara na Casa Vogue nke Brazil nke ruru Euros otu nde
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-ere akụkụ okpokoro isi ahụ na ọla ya na Wolf & Badger na Mayfair na Merchants na Long, Cape Town
A mụrụ ya na South Africa nkè ndị nnà nnà Sicilian na Venetian
Ambra gara n'ihu na-amụ imepụta ihe na Central Saint Martins na Inchbald School of Design na London tupu o guzobe akara ọla nke ya
Ambra Gambale guzobere Ambra Fine Jewellery na 2010, na-eji diamond dị mma na ọla dị oké ọnụ ahịa dị ka ọlaedo na platinum
A na-emepụta ọrụ ya màkà ahịa okomoko dị elu, mànà ọ nwekwara ihe na-atọ ụtọ na nke na-atọ ọchị
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2013, a na-ere ọla ya ma depụta ya n'akụkụ ndị dị ka Anoushka Ducas & Theo Fennel ma tinye ya na mbà ụwa na London, UK na Cape Town, South Africa

Nchịkọta ya nke afọ 2013 'Diamond Dreaming' gụnyere ọla aka, ihe olu na ihe nkedo sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke Islam Hamsa yana mkpịsị ugodi, okpueze na akara udo na 9ct na 18ct ọcha, odo na ọla edo rose
A na-etinye okpokoro isi anụmanụ dị íchè íchè nke Skullchmey nke agụ iyi, baboon, caracul n'ime ọla dị oké ọnụ ahịa na usoro ọ mepụtara n'onwe ya
Usoro nchara nchara ya na-ahapụ okpokoro isi anụmanụ dị íchè íchè na patina ochie nke ndị ọzọ na-edepụtaghachi
Akụkụ nke Ambra's Skullchemy sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke mmetụta na-enweghị isi nke ozu ọ hụrụ n'okporo ụzọ South Africa na ọchịchọ ya ịgbakwunye olileanya na ìhè na ọnọdụ ọnwụ a
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya ma depụta ya na mgbasa ozi mbà ụwa dịka Casa Vogue nke Brazil, Top Billing TV show na South Africa, British GQ & Grazia Magazine
Ọrụ ya gụnyere
Ambroise Oyongo Bitolo (ka amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa nke ise n'afọ 1991) bụ onye Cameroon na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbara ndị otu mba Cameroon bọọlụ
Ọ nọ n'okpuru nkwekọrịta na klọb French Montpellier
Ambroise Oyongo malitere ọrụ egwuregwu ya na Moussango FC nke Yaoundé na 2008
O guzobere onwe ya ngwa ngwa na klọb ahụ na-emeri aha egwuregwu na afọ mbụ ya na Coton Sport
N'afọ 2011, o nyeere klọb ahụ aka na league na iko ugboro abụọ
N'afọ 2013, o meriri otu egwuregwu ọzọ ma nyere aka duru Coton Sport gaa ọkara ikpeazụ nke 2013 CAF Champions League
N'oge 2013, Oyongo gara ikpe na Lille nke France ma a kọrọ na ọ ga-esonye na Ligue 1 n'oge windo mbugharị nke Jenụwarị 2014
Ọ dịghị mgbe ọ bụla ma na Jenụwarị 2014 Oyongo gara ikpe na New York Red Bulls
Ọ masịrị ya n'oge ikpe ya na 7 Machị 2014, ọ bịanyere aka na klọb ahụ

N'oge mbụ ya na New York, Oyongo bụ onye isi egwuregwu maka klọb ahụ n'oge ọkara nke abụọ nke oge ahụ ka ọ malitere ma n'azụ aka ekpe ma n'etiti etiti na-enyere ndị otu ya aka iru eru maka egwuregwu egwuregwu

Na 30 Ọktoba 2014, Oyongo nyere aka na Bradley Wright-Phillips merie goolu na nkeji ikpeazụ nke egwuregwu ahụ na-enyere New York aka imeri Sporting Kansas City ma gaa n'ihu na Eastern Conference Semifinals
N'ụbọchị 27 Jenụwarị 2015, a gbanwere Oyongo na Montreal Impact na Eric Alexander, onye na-ahụ maka ndị egwuregwu mba ụwa na ego nkesa maka Felipe na nhọrọ nke mbụ na ọkwa MLS
Nkwekọrịta Oyongo gwụrụ na njedebe nke oge 2017, ọ họọrọ ịkwaga Europe kama ịmegharị nkwekọrịta ya na Montreal
Ọ bịanyere aka na klọb French Montpellier HSC na Disemba 2017
Na 22 Febụwarị 2021, ọ kwagara Krasnodar na Russian Premier League ruo na njedebe nke oge 2020-21
O mere egwuregwu izizi ya na Krasnodar na 28 Febụwarị 2021 na egwuregwu Russian Premier League megide FC Ural Yekaterinburg, mgbe ọ gbanwere Yevgeni Chernov merụrụ ahụ na nkeji iri atọ na atọ
Otú ọ dị, na ọkara oge, a ghaghị dochie Oyongo n'ihi mmerụ ahụ n'onwe ya
Na 4 Machị 2021, onye nnọchi anya ya kwupụtara na a ga-awa ya ahụ na Spen ma ọ gaghị enwe ike igwu egwu maka Krasnodar maka oge mgbazinye ego ahụ ma ọ gaghị alaghachi na klọb ahụ
Krasnodar kwụrụ ụgwọ ọrụ niile tupu oge eruo n'oge ahụ
Oyongo gbara bọọlụ na mba Cameroon na 2011 FIFA U-20 World Cup
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2013, o mere nke mbụ ya na ndị otu ndị isi Cameroon, malite na mmeri 1–0 megide Gabon na Stade Ahmadou Ahidjo
Na 2015 Africa Cup of Nations, Oyongo nyere goolu mbụ ya na mba ụwa na 1–1 megide Mali na 20 Jenụwarị 2015

A kpọrọ ya aha na ndị otu Cameroon maka 2017 FIFA Confederations Cup mana e mechara chụpụ ya na asọmpi ahụ mgbe ọ tara ahụhụ na akwara patellar gbawara agbawa n'oge mmeri 1–0 meriri Morocco na 10 June
Camaroon
Ambrose Lomax (ụbọchị irí n'ise n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 1867 rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1943) bụ onye na-ese foto na onye na-emepụta kemịkal na South Africa
A mụrụ Ambrose Lomax na England mana o tolitere na Cape ógè ezinụlọ ya kwagara
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ dị ka onye na-emepụta ọgwụ na Queenstown, Eastern Cape, ruru eru ógè ọ dị afọ irí abụọ n'otu, tupu ọ bídó ịrụ ọrụ enyemaka
Ọ biri na Molteno, ebe ọ bịdọrọ azụmahịa nke ya na ụlọ ọrụ foto
Ụlọ ọrụ ya, nke a na-ejikwa dị ka ụlọ ọgwụ, ka dị ma bụrụ ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ugbu a
A makwaara Lomax n'ihe banyere foto mbụ ya na nke dị elu nke Molteno na ndị ya
N'oge na-adịghị anya, o mepụtara nchịkọta nka a ma ama, ọ bụ ezie na ọ nwere mmasị na usoro sayensị nke ịzụlite ogo nke ihe oyiyi ya
N'oge Agha Boer, o sere ọtụtụ narị foto nke ndị agha Britain na isiokwu ndị agha
A chọtara nchịkọta ya n'afọ 1960 ógè ụlọ ọrụ ọgwụ ọhụrụ weghaara ụlọ ọrụ foto ochie ya na Molteno
A chọtara ihe dị ka ọmụmụ 1400, na-enye foto siri ike nke South Africa na ngwụcha narị afọ nke iri na itoolu na mmalite narị afọ nke iri abụọ
Ebe ngosi nka foto ya na Molteno bụ ihe na-adọrọ mmasị taa
Ọ bụ nwoke dị jụụ nke na-adịghị ekwu okwu
Ihe ntụrụndụ ya bụ ihe ọzọ na-abụghị ọrụ ya bụ mmasị ya na golf
Ọ lụrụ n'ubochí isé n'ọnwa Mee 1904, Ellen Augusta Dodd, nke Molteno
N'ime ụmụ ha asatọ, ụmụ nwoke atọ ghọrọ ndị dọkịta na nke anọ ruru eru dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ọgwụ
Amdang (nakwa Biltine; autonym sìmí amdangtí) bụ asụsụ nwere njikọ chiri anya na Fur, nke mebere alaka ezinụlọ asụsụ Nilo-Saharan
A na-asụkarị ya na Chad, n'ebe ugwu nke obodo Biltine, na mgbe ụfọdụ n'ebe ndị ọzọ na mpaghara Ouaddaï
E nwekwara obere obodo ndi na asu asusu Darfur di nso na Woda'a na Fafa, na Kordofan na mpaghara Abu Daza na Magrur n'ebe ugwu Bara
Ọtụtụ n'ime agbụrụ ahụ na-asụ Arabic ugbu a
A na-akpọkwa asụsụ ahụ Mimi, Mima ma ọ bụ Biltine; Otú ọ dị, a na-etinyekwa aha 'Mimi', na asụsụ Maban abụọ na-adịghịzi adị n'ógbè ahụ; Mimi nke Nachtigal na Mimi nke Decorse
Wolf (2010) na-enye data okwu maka asụsụ Kouchane, Sounta, Yaouada, na Tere nke Amdang
Amel Baccouche (Arabic) bụ onye mba Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri
Amel Bouchoucha nke a makwaara dị ka Amal Bouchoucha (amụrụ na 24 Julaị 1982) bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Bouchoucha na Oran
N'afọ 2015, Bouchoucha lụrụ onye ọchụnta ego Lebanọn bụ Waleed Awada, onye si Nabatieh
Ọ mụrụ nwa ya nwanyị Lea na 2017
Amal malitere ịpụta mgbe ọ sonyere na oge nke ise nke Star Academy Arab World, na-anọchite anya obodo ya Algeria
N'oge ọ nọ na ihe ngosi ahụ, iwu ewu Amal na ndị na-akwado ya toro ngwa ngwa nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama maka olu ya siri ike yana ọnụnọ ya pụrụ iche na nke dị egwu
N'oge ọ nọ na Star Academy, ihe ndị ọ na-agụ bụ abụ Arabic na French
A họpụtara Amal ugboro atọ n'oge oge ahụ, nke mbụ bụ na 8th Prime nke ihe ngosi ahụ megide onye na-asọmpi Palestine Zaher Saleh na onye Morocco na-asọmpi ahụ, Asma Bassite
N'oge a na-ahọpụta ya, ọ rụrụ ihe a ma ama site na Najwa Karam nke a na-akpọ 'Shou Hal Hala'
Ka e mesịrị n'otu oge ahụ, ya na onye asọmpi Ijipt Mirhan Hussein na onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Haifa Wehbe ga-ekere òkè n'ọkwa ahụ na mkpuchi nke egwu Warda Al-Jazairia 'Ana Andi Baghbagan'
Amal mechara bụrụ abụ 'Nadini' nke Myriam Fares
Na ngwụcha nke onye isi ala, Amal meriri ọtụtụ vootu ọha na eze nke ọ zọpụtara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ ọzọ n'izu
Nhọpụta nke abụọ ya na oge nke iri na abụọ nke ihe ngosi ahụ mere ka ọ megide onye Morocco na-asọmpi Diaa Taybi na onye Tunisia na-azọ ọkwa, Amal Mahalaoui
Na ngwụcha nke oge kachasị mma, ọha na eze zọpụtara ya ọzọ

Nhọpụta nke atọ ya na nke iri na atọ nke ihe ngosi ahụ mere ka e wepụ ya n'asọmpi ahụ dị ka onye Morocco a họpụtara, Diaa, onye a na-emegide ya na nke gara aga meriri ọtụtụ vootu ọha na eze nke hapụrụ ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ ịhọrọ n'etiti ya na onye Palestine na-asọmpi Zaher
Ọtụtụ n'ime vootu ụmụ akwụkwọ gara Zaher

Ọ bụ ezie na e wepụrụ ya, Amal ka jisiri ike mee akara ya site n'inye ihe dị egwu n'oge mbụ site n'ịrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ onye Egypt-Canada na-agụ egwú bụ Chantal Chamandy na mkpuchi nke Dalida 'Helwa Ya Baladi'

Oge ndị ọzọ dị ịrịba ama a ga-ekwu maka ya bụ ọtụtụ ihe osise ya nke ọ rụrụ dị ka onye otu Academy's Angels, mmadụ atọ mejupụtara onwe ya, Mirhan Hussein na Amal Mahalaoui nke bụ ihe ngosi ahụ na Charlie's Angals

N'oge ihe ngosi ikpeazụ nke hụrụ mmeri nke onye Tunisia Nader Guirat dị ka onye mmeri Maghrebi nke ihe ngosi ahụ, Amal putakwara n'ọgbọ ọzọ site n'ịrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ onye ọbịa mba ụwa Tina Arena na-eme mkpuchi nke egwu ya 'Aimee Jusqu L'Impossible' yana n'akụkụ enyi ya Academy Angel Mirhan Hussein na mkpuchi nke abụ Sherine Abdel Wahab 'Ana Sabry Aleel'
Ka oge na-aga, ya na ndị asọmpi ibe ya sonyeere n'ọkwa n'oge ikpeazụ n'asọpụrụ onye Ijipt Icon Abdel Halim Hafez site n'ịrụ egwu ya 'Wehyat Albi Wefraho'
Afọ abụọ mgbe Star Academy Tenure gasịrị, Amal wepụtara otu 'Batal El Alam Arabi' nke bụ otu mkpọsa na-egosi nkwado maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Algeria n'oge 2010 World Cup
